The telescopic handle makes pulling it along possible, even for kids!Your Chillest comes with two organizing baskets so you can pack it full but still find items on the bottom without unloadingThe Chillest has inside lighting so you can find exactly what you’re looking for at night or during a power outage.Prep your meal on the GoSun Chillest cutting board that lives inside the cooler lid. When you need to use it, it pops out and docks onto the top of the lid.GoSun Chillest comes equipped with a mount where you can slide in the umbrella or Elbow Solar Table, making it a complete relaxation or food prep station.Keep chilling in your hammock, tent or by the grill—you can control the Chillest’s temperature settings right from your phone with the complementary App!Nothing enhances time outside like some tunes! Our optional bluetooth speaker kicks out amazing sound while connecting to your smartphone from up to 50 feet away!Create an oasis of chill with the Slide-In Sun Umbrella that attaches right to your Chillest or comes with a sand anchor so you can park it at the beach.⛱️The outdoors is where we go to reset and reconnect. Feel the grass under your feet, jump in the water or play your favorite sport—we could all use more quality time in nature and that’s the core reason we built the GoSun Chillest.Anytime you spend more than three hours outside, you need refreshments at a minimum, but who has time to go buy ice for their grimy old cooler? It starts melting immediately!GoSun Chillest inspires you to get outdoors more by giving you a hassle-free way to bring all your drinks, snacks and outdoor necessities. And when you’re all done? There’s virtually no cleanup with this cooler. Remove what you didn’t use and charge the battery so you can do it all over again tomorrow.Rain or shine, GoSun gives you the ultimate portable fridge to enjoy the outdoors more.If you already have a GoSun Solar Panel or solar setup, this package is for you. The Chillest Base package comes with one GoSun Chillest Cooler and all its integrated features, including: tie downs, free app, dual cooling zones, inside lighting, 87wh built-in battery, cutting board, bottle opener, accessory pouch, waste bag hooks, mount for umbrella or table, wheels and telescope handle.Get everything in the Chillest Base plus our GoSun Elbow Solar Table that extends the life of your Chillest's internal battery. 20 watt solar table that attaches right onto your cooler and extends your refrigeration time by 5+ hours.You can’t have an outside outing without tunes! Add this bluetooth speaker to your GoSun Chillest and you can bring the jams anywhere you roll your cooler.Enjoy power for all your devices. The Power 266 (266wh) detachable power bank gives your Chillest 30 hours of power and can fully charge your phone over 10 times!Stay cool on the hottest day with the GoSun Chillest umbrella. It attaches right to your cooler and comes with a sand anchor for setting up on the beach.At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your GoSun Chillest when manufacturing is complete!   GoSun is committed to making the highest quality and most accessible solar powered products.  We build products to be relied on, day in, day out so you can get the most out of them.  Take a deep look at the Specs or FAQ's and then send us a message if you don't find your answer.Chillest Portable Fridge:
Dimensions: 28" x 17" x 20.5"
Weight: 42lbs (19 kg)
Capacity: 45 Liters
Insulation: R-10 Closed Cell Foam
Compressor: DC Brushless (runs on 12V or 24Vdc), draws 45-55 Watts
Refrigerant: R1234yf
Temperature Control: -4°F to 68°F (-20°C to 20°C) [each section independently controlled], backlit LCD display, bluetooth functionality
Power Control: two modes (eco and max), three pre-set battery protection levels (AC adaptor, lead acid, and lithium ion) with low voltage disconnect (LVD) and compressor delay protection
Built-In Battery Runtime: up to 10 hours, wide range based on several factors
Effective Environmental Protection: Compressor/Electronics enclosure IP 32, Cold Goods area IP 65 
Package Includes: 87wh integrated lithium ion battery, AC Adapter, 12 Volt Power Cord and Features listed above
Elbow Solar Table:
22" x 13" x 1" (solar panel with attached table wings)
5 lbs
Mounting post: 1" diameter
Solar panel/Table Height range: From 22" to 33"
Tilt angle: Flat +/- 90 degrees
Rotation: 360 degrees adjustable
Power rating: 20W monocrystalline solar panel (36 cells in series) nominal 12V (max power voltage 18.5Vdc)
Bluetooth Speaker:
Speaker power: 5W x 2
Speaker battery: 400 mAh x 2
Speaker runtime: 6hrs
Bluetooth: V 5.0, 50ft range (line of sight)
Water resistant: IPX6 (rain and splash proof)
Umbrella:
Diameter when open: 80"
Height range: 65" - 80"
Tilt rage: +/- 45 degrees
packaged dimensions: 4" x 4" x 48"
Weight: 5lbs
Includes carrying bag, steel sand spike for base, and 3 x sand stakes with adjustable guy wires
GoSun is a young company comprised of designers, engineers, and change-makers intent on serving the world with accessible, clean technology. We are passionate about our products and how they power our customers’ lives.

story:
OneLife X is a high-performance air purifier with revolutionary plasma technology that filters your air with clinical precision. It uses a high-precision laser sensor to track even the smallest detectable particles in your air. Unlike other air purifiers, OneLife X produces no harmful ozone and has no costly filters to replace. 

To say Onelife X is the best air purifier to hit the market would be an understatement—it’s the future of air purification!

 

Our next-generation air purifying plasma filter eliminates 99.99% of airborne particles without the need to replace the filter, ever.

OneLife X uses a high-precision laser sensor that detects particles as small as 1 micrometer, then the plasma technology removes particles down to 0.01 micrometers, meaning it removes even viruses and ultrafine particles out of your breathing air that most purifiers miss.

Most air purifiers use standard HEPA filters that are incapable of capturing particles smaller than 0.3 micrometer. 

OneLife X has metallic plates in the filter that act like giant magnets for all the pollutants in the air. When air is pulled into the device, it passes through the plasma field where pollution particles get charged up (ionized) so they stick right to the collector sheets.

Using this plasma field to ionize the particles instead of forcing air through a thick filter means there's no restriction of airflow, so One Life X requires very little energy, runs virtually silently, and generates no harmful ozone.

 

 
 

The independent lab test by IUTA shows that “OneLife X can provide per hour, on average, about 121 cubic meters of air free of particles, including viruses and small exhaled droplets that are potentially virus-laden. The filtration efficiency for larger exhaled droplets is even larger, resulting in a CADR of 131 cubic meters per hour.”

The independent lab also tested for Ozone Emission. IUTA concluded that OneLife X does NOT add ozone to the room even after 60 minutes of constant purification. The lab stated: “The amount of emitted ozone lies with (1.6 ± 1.8) ppb substantially below the limit of 50 ppb specified by UL 867-37.”

In the graph below you see the ozone concentration as a black line (with the OneLife X running full speed) and a red line (the natural background levels of ozone that are always present). They are almost identical and far lower than the officially accepted concentration of ozone in a room.

HEPA? No thanks—sounds like a bad infection.


The OneLife X plasma filter never needs to be replaced. It’s washable and dishwasher safe, meaning it won’t pollute the environment with non-recyclable plastics and filter waste.

This is as sustainable and affordable as it gets.

Other air purifiers use pricey HEPA filters that need to be changed often and cost more to operate. HEPA technology hasn't been updated in more than 70 years!

OneLife X delivers the highest purification performance with the lowest energy consumption. At just 6 watts, it consumes less than an average LED lamp! This means you get the most clinically clean air while saving money on energy bills.

Other air purifiers cost $30-120 per year because they require a high-speed fan to press air through fibreglass mats inside the air filter. High-speed fans and pressure means loud, disrupting noise levels plus increased energy consumption, resulting in higher energy bills.

Our technology purifies the air without restricting airflow, so it doesn't need high-energy fan pressure. This enables us to run the fan at a super low ventilation rate, making the purifier absolutely silent

It’s so quiet you can run it right next to your bed—try that with a HEPA filter!

OneLife X looks and feels like a piece of furniture. Our team of designers crafted OneLife X to fit effortlessly and beautifully into any modern-day home or office.

 

Plus, it operates standing or laying flat, so it fits in any space.

The textile cover is made from recycled PET plastic bottles, keeping that discarded plastic out of landfills and from breaking down into microplastics that can cause serious health issues.

 

OneLife X’s renewable filter design makes it the most sustainable filter on the market, purifying your air while protecting the plant.

OneLife X alerts you when it is time to wash the filter, and has three air-purifying modes:

OneLife X provides clinically pure air exactly where you want it with a tilt feature that lets you deliver clean-air immediately within your personal air space.

The OneLife X app gives you detailed data on indoor air quality and outdoor pollutants so you can monitor your air quality from anywhere, effortlessly.

Plus, the app lets you input your personal air purification needs (like if you have asthma, allergies or pets) and OneLife X adjusts its settings automatically!

 

In addition to measuring pollutants in your air, OneLife X also measures temperature and humidity.

The OneLife X app displays indoor AND outdoor air quality levels using the BreezoMeter. By getting the live outdoor pollution data from local air quality indices (AQIs), we are able to recommend if the air quality is good enough for your outdoor activities or for you to open the windows.

 

The average human takes 17,000 breaths a day and inhales 2,000 gallons of air. Pure air is for everyone—and so is OneLife X.

*Add a carbon filter to your OneLife X to ensure that in addition to all the particles, all odors get absorbed from your air. Gases will get trapped and retained inside the activated carbon to provide you with clean air without any bad odors. 

New to Indiegogo? No problem. Follow these simple steps to get your own OneLife X.

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your OneLife X when manufacturing is complete!

 

Our story started over five years ago in Germany. We’re a team of scientists, engineers and dreamers who recognized that the air that we breathe is harming our health—and no health tech company was going to fix it (they just love their business models around filter replacement too much to upgrade the technology).

So we started OneLife X with one simple goal: to create clean air with a clear conscience. Our mission to improve air home quality around the globe wouldn’t be meaningful if it harmed the environment (like HEPA filters do), so we set out to create a completely new generation of air purification.

With no filter to replace, the lowest energy profile in the market, the greenest technology available and a high performance plasma filter that catches even the smallest pollutants, the OneLife X you see today has exceeded our wildest expectations.

story:
Still suffering from waiting hours and hours for your power bank fully charged??

Be trouble with when your backup portable power is empty or struggling to spend extra hours to charge it to full before an exciting trip? Not anymore…

Introducing PowerBen - World’s First PD 200W Input Powerbank
To match your busy mobile lifestyle, PowerBen can be recharged in 30 minutes from zero to full. It's the truly ready-to-go backup power by your hand. Combined with a super large battery capacity of 24000mAh, you can get your iPhone 12 capacity in ONLY 3 minutes!  

Recharge your PowerBen by using a car, solar power, AC Adapter, or PD Adapter. With a maximum power input of 200W! You can fully charge the PowerBen Lite 24000mAh in 30 minutes. There are some ways to reach 200W speed：

  • SmartDC 200W
  • SmartDC 100W+MagicDC 100W
  • C1 PD100W+C2 PD100W
  • MagicDC 100W+C2 PD100W
  • SmartDC 100W+C1 PD100W
  • MagicDC 140W+C2 PD65W
  • SmartDC 140W+C1 PD65W
  • ......

Let's see how fast it would be (10 times speed playback, PD100W+PD100W)

3minutes for 17%=4080mAh
10minutes for 50%=12000mAh
20minutes for 96%=23040mAh
30minutes for 99%=23760mAh

*Data above is calculated from PowerBen 48000mAh.
24000mAh's data needs to be divided by 2.

PowerBen Lite is airline safe version which is an ideal choice for travel or business trip, and PowerBen Plus comes with a larger 48000mAh capacity to offer more power. They are equipped with exactly the same fast charge technology and charging ports. You can make the choice depending on your needs. 

Click to check the review

Click to check how powerful the PowerBen from Cymye 

Click to check how powerful the PowerBen from Sami 

Click to check how powerful it is of the PowerBen  from HOBOTECH 

Click to check how powerful it is of the PowerBen from Alaska Prepper
Click to check how powerful it is of the PowerBen from KhanFlicks
 
 

 

With a strong power of 360W and six charging ports (2*USB-C 3.0, 2*USB-A, 2*Adjustable DC), you will always have enough power to carry around.

With two 100W USB-C power delivery 3.0 ports, your MacBook Pro 16” can be charged whenever you need it.

48000mAh and 24000mAh huge capacity can even provide continuous power to your high-performance gaming computer. 

The 1st revolutionary stackable design allows you to connect up to 20 PowerBens together to maximize your power backup.

PowerBen offers more flexibility than any other power station on the market, you can choose to take a single one or stackable PowerBens to fit all your different needs.

Here is a short demo video of PowerBen powering 5 devices at the same time with a 200W AC inverter connected.

 
Connecting 6 PowerBens powering a 1000W microwave easily combined with a 1500W AC inverter.
 
Chainsaw can be powered effortlessly when 2 PowerBens are connected.
 

*The 200W AC Inverter is included in the 'Team Package' and the 'Work Station Pack'.
 
The 200W AC Inverter offers 2x USB-A ports, 1x USB-C port, 2x international AC wall outlets, and 1x wireless charger. With this expansion, you can easily power more devices simultaneously.
 
*The 1500W AC Inverter only available in 'Team Package' and the 'Work Station Pack'.
 
The 1500W AC Inverter offers a 1x international AC wall outlet. With this expansion, you can easily host a parallel circuit and connect with up to 6x PowerBens together and increase its max power output to 1500W.

The Magic DC output (5 ~ 25.5V, up to 5A) can be fully adjustable, the configurable voltage aspect is the coolest and most useful feature for DIY players. 

Just add the corresponding adapter in the perk you claim and we will prepare it for you. If you are not sure about the right type of laptop plug, simply choose the 'Not Sure' option then our engineer will assist you on the eve of delivery.
 

We designed PowerBen to be a durable and reliable power source. The high-density 18650 lithium-ion rechargeable battery packs retain 80% of their original capacity after 1000 charging cycles, which means you can use it up for at least 2 years with 80% of its capacity remaining.

 

 

Based in the US, our team is made up of twelve members from different Asian backgrounds. Combined, we have over ten years of experience working with green energy. As this is our first crowdfunding campaign, we appreciate your patience while we work through any issues that may come up and provide you with a great product. We thank you and hope you continue to support us in the future!

Just add the corresponding adapter in the perk you claim and we will prepare it for you. If you are not sure about the right type of laptop plug, simply choose the 'Not Sure' option then our engineer will assist you on the eve of delivery.

Combined, we have over ten years of experience working with green energy. As this is our first crowdfunding campaign, we appreciate your patience while we work through any issues that may come up and provide you with a great product. We thank you and hope you continue to support us in the future!

story:
When you need power, light and instant charging on the go, you need Harbor. This wireless battery pack is your go anywhere, anytime power companion.

HARBOR can charge your iPhone 9 times at one charge with the 30,000mAh capacity.

Harbor has 3.6x faster PD 3.0 port,  built-in Solar Charger, 10W Wireless Charger, 30 hours LED Light, and SOS Flashlight, which makes it a great everyday power companion anytime anywhere.

 

Enjoy the freedom of wireless charging and never worry about “Low Battery” again. With the 10W Qi Wireless Charger, Harbor is THE fastest iPhone wireless charger on the market. Just place your phone on the pad and watch it charge!

As well as Harbor’s wireless charging pad, there are an additional 18W PD3.0 USB-C port, one 18W QC 3.0 USB-A port, and three 15W USB-A fast charging ports, which means no more fighting over who can plug in their phone, tablet or gaming device while you’re in the car or roughing it in the great outdoors. Harbor can power up to six devices, at lightening speed, simultaneously.

1 Week of Worry-free Power: The 30,000mAh capacity of Harbor can fully charge your iPhone 11 9 times, Nintendo Switch 7 times, Samsung S20 7 times. A Must-have for unlimited gaming,  camping, hiking and all kinds of adventures.

No more battling over who gets to charge their device first. With the 10W wireless charging pad, 18W Type-C PD output and 4x USB fast charging outputs, you can charge 6 devices at the same time at lightning speed. 

 

Harbor’s robust and rugged design means it’s built to go wherever you go. It’s splash-proof and dust-proof too, perfect for a camping trip or a trek along the beach.

 

And when the sun goes down you can keep on exploring or light up your campsite, with the 900 lumens LED light that can last up to 30 hours!

If you’ve ventured too far off the path and need to urgently find your way back home, the SOS Flash mode can be used in two speeds to light up the path or attract attention in an emergency.

 

You can rely on the safety of Harbor as it is backed by more than a dozen international certificates and safety features which ensure its ultimate reliability. 

When Harbor finally needs a recharge, just place it face up in the sun and let the built-in solar panels do the work. Even without direct sunlight the Solar Charger only needs to soak up a few hours of sunshine to have sufficient power to charge your iPhone. And if you choose the Solar Bundle, with the 10W Foldable Solar Panel, Harbor can be fully charged in one day.

Credit card size Harbor GaN charger is the world's smallest Gallium Nitride charger to offer 100W charging power. With 100W, there is plenty of power to share around with 2 x USB-C ports (supporting Power Delivery 3.0).

100W power provides the ability to quick charge a laptop (MacBook Pro), a tablet (iPad Pro), smartphone (iPhone), and mobile device (AirPods, Watch) at the fastest charging speed.

A single Harbor charger can power 2 laptops (two 15" MacBook Pro) simultaneously.

 

 

Harbor Dynamics was created by a team with a mission to bring the best portable charging products to everyone. Our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency ensured that we can create cutting edge products like never before. We persues the fastest wired/wireless charging speed at the most portable size, and with the best safety features.

Harbor wireless solar power bank is the first baby that we bring for Indiegogo backers. It is the first in the world to combine 10W Qi wireless charger, built-in solar panel, 900 lumens LED light, 18W PD 3.0 capability, and 4 fast-charging USB port, including an 18W QC 3.0 port.

We've completed the molding and produced the first batch of Harbor before the campaign started. We need your support to start mass production.

Just place your phone on the pad and watch it charge!As well as Harbor’s wireless charging pad, there are an additional 18W PD3.0 USB-C port, one 18W QC 3.0 USB-A port, and three 15W USB-A fast charging ports, which means no more fighting over who can plug in their phone, tablet or gaming device while you’re in the car or roughing it in the great outdoors. Harbor can power up to six devices, at lightening speed, simultaneously.1 Week of Worry-free Power: The 30,000mAh capacity of Harbor can fully charge your iPhone 11 9 times, Nintendo Switch 7 times, Samsung S20 7 times. A Must-have for unlimited gaming,  camping, hiking and all kinds of adventures.No more battling over who gets to charge their device first. With the 10W wireless charging pad, 18W Type-C PD output and 4x USB fast charging outputs, you can charge 6 devices at the same time at lightning speed.  Harbor’s robust and rugged design means it’s built to go wherever you go. It’s splash-proof and dust-proof too, perfect for a camping trip or a trek along the beach. And when the sun goes down you can keep on exploring or light up your campsite, with the 900 lumens LED light that can last up to 30 hours!If you’ve ventured too far off the path and need to urgently find your way back home, the SOS Flash mode can be used in two speeds to light up the path or attract attention in an emergency. You can rely on the safety of Harbor as it is backed by more than a dozen international certificates and safety features which ensure its ultimate reliability. When Harbor finally needs a recharge, just place it face up in the sun and let the built-in solar panels do the work. Even without direct sunlight the Solar Charger only needs to soak up a few hours of sunshine to have sufficient power to charge your iPhone. And if you choose the Solar Bundle, with the 10W Foldable Solar Panel, Harbor can be fully charged in one day.Credit card size Harbor GaN charger is the world's smallest Gallium Nitride charger to offer 100W charging power. With 100W, there is plenty of power to share around with 2 x USB-C ports (supporting Power Delivery 3.0).100W power provides the ability to quick charge a laptop (MacBook Pro), a tablet (iPad Pro), smartphone (iPhone), and mobile device (AirPods, Watch) at the fastest charging speed.A single Harbor charger can power 2 laptops (two 15" MacBook Pro) simultaneously.  Harbor Dynamics was created by a team with a mission to bring the best portable charging products to everyone. Our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency ensured that we can create cutting edge products like never before. We persues the fastest wired/wireless charging speed at the most portable size, and with the best safety features.Harbor wireless solar power bank is the first baby that we bring for Indiegogo backers. It is the first in the world to combine 10W Qi wireless charger, built-in solar panel, 900 lumens LED light, 18W PD 3.0 capability, and 4 fast-charging USB port, including an 18W QC 3.0 port.We've completed the molding and produced the first batch of Harbor before the campaign started. We need your support to start mass production.

story:
Zendure has been in the portable power industry for some time now, with premium, durable power banks designed to easily charge your mobile devices on the go. But what if you're camping, or preparing for a power outage, and you need a simple way to charge over a dozen products, including heavy-duty appliances?

We think situations like this should be just as easy to navigate. That's why we made SuperBase Pro. SuperBase Pro is designed for portability and peace of mind. Let's talk about a few of the reasons you'll love SuperBase Pro.

 

No one likes waiting around for their power station to charge up before going on an adventure. SuperBase Pro can be charged up to 80% in just one hour.

With our patented GridFlow technology, you can charge SuperBase Pro 2000 at up to 1,800W from an adequate AC outlet or generator. A full charge is just two hours away.

 

GridFlow unlocks superfast charging potential by taking advantage of Integrated AC Direct Charging (IACDC) using a Texas Instruments processor.

If green energy is your thing, SuperBase Pro 2000 can handle solar arrays of any size up to 1,800W. Our patented PVMax tech means your solar setup can charge SuperBase Pro 2000 with the same superfast performance you'd get from conventional charging. That's one hour for an 80% charge, and two hours for a full charge.

PVMax is a patented protocol utilizing High Voltage Solar Technology (HVST) conversion to deliver up to 1,800W from solar arrays that provide 60-160V. SuperBase Pro 2000 comes with an MC4 to AC female cable, so setup is really simple.

You can also charge SuperBase Pro 2000 using solar DC power at up to 600W. We use the latest MPPT technology, enabled by a Texas Instruments processor, so SuperBase Pro 2000 can be charged at 12-60V, up to 600W, through the XT60 port.

Want even more speed? If you hook SuperBase Pro 2000 up to a wall outlet and a solar array at the same time, you could get up to 2,400W of charging power. There's fast, and then there's fast.

At home, SuperBase Pro 2000 has you covered. With 2,000W of AC output and 4,000W surge capability, you can power your microwave, washing machine, coffee maker, or other essentials around the house, worry-free.

If you like camping, you'll love SuperBase Pro 2000's 2,096Wh capacity. Use your off-grid camping gear for hours on end. SuperBase Pro 2000 is the perfect power solution for on-the-go events. Devices such as laptops, led lamps, drones, mini fridges and projectors can be powered by it for a prolonged period.

SuperBase Pro 2000 can even be an emergency backup for your Starlink and electric vehicle. According to our test, SuperBase Pro 2000 can add an extra 12 km for a Tesla Model 3. What's more, SuperBase Pro 2000 can also be recharged at any EV charging station up to 1800W, 80% in an hour using our EV-AC adapter.

While SuperBase Pro's maximum output is 2,000W, it can power devices that typically need up to 3,000W, thanks to the AmpUp feature. This means SuperBase Pro is even compatible with heavy-duty appliances and power tools.

AmpUp* is our patented Dynamic Voltage Output technology. When power-hungry devices need a high starting current, AmpUp can lower the output voltage to compensate, allowing for higher current at the same output power. And since a pure sine wave output is maintained, it's completely safe.

*AmpUp is enabled through SuperBase Pro 2000's companion app. Device compatibility may vary.

An unexpected blackout can be a huge headache. If you're working on your computer, you could lose important progress. Even worse, a sudden power interruption can actually damage sensitive electrical equipment.

That's why SuperBase Pro has household grade Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS*) functionality built right in. And it's super easy to use. Just connect SuperBase Pro 2000 to a power outlet, connect your essential devices to SuperBase Pro 2000, and you're done. If the power goes out, SuperBase Pro will switch over to battery power automatically.

*UPS is applicable to electrical appliances below 2,000W.

With industrial-grade wheels, a telescopic aluminum handle, and a low center of gravity, SuperBase Pro is designed with "anytime, anywhere" in mind. And as you're rolling it across the terrain, you'll find that it's sturdy enough to stack another item on top if you need to.

The ridges along the top and back aren't just for looks. Zendure has a reputation for durable products, and SuperBase Pro is no exception. The outer shell is shock resistant, and the interior is reinforced against collisions, making SuperBase Pro a rugged and reliable outdoor companion.

Are 14 output ports too many? We didn't bother to ask when we designed SuperBase Pro. Better to have them than to need them.

And these aren't vanity ports. Case in point: SuperBase Pro's 100W USB-C ports can charge a power-hungry 16" MacBook Pro at the same speed that users are already accustomed to, without the need to carry around a proprietary power brick.

SuperBase Pro's 6.1" display shows real-time information about power usage, remaining charge, environmental conditions, and so much more.

SuperBase Pro 2000’s battery can run 3,000 cycles to 60% capacity, or 1,500 cycles to 80% capacity.  It uses the most advanced EV-grade NMC batteries, which have been widely used in high-end electric vehicles. The high energy density and stable performance of NMC batteries offer high capacity in a compact package.

Another new member of the SuperBase Pro series, SuperBase Pro 1500, uses LiFePo4 batteries to achieve longer life cycles with a large 1,456Wh capacity. This unit can run 6,000 cycles to 60% capacity, or 3,000 cycles to 80% capacity.

Some power stations on the market have controls that can only be accessed when you're physically near the device using Bluetooth or a direct Wi-Fi connection. That's very limiting. What if you're using it remotely, and you want to check its status? What if you want to track the position of your power station to protect against theft?

Fortunately, SuperBase Pro has built-in GPS and 4G IoT (Internet of Things) hardware, so as long as you've got a 4G signal, you can manage your power station from anywhere. Check the location, remaining charge, and output power of your SuperBase Pro, all in real time.

SuperBase Pro supports Wi-Fi network connection as well as direct connection using the built in Wi-Fi module. So even if there's no Wi-Fi network available, you'll still have easy access to your SuperBase Pro through the app.

 

When you buy SuperBase Pro, you get a free year of 4G service, which works in 120 countries. That's a $99 value!

Amazing hardware deserves equally amazing software. Theft protection and remote status updates are just the tip of the iceberg. Our companion app for SuperBase Pro gives you remote control, location services, and access to lots of advanced features. Here are just a few of the things you can do with the app:

Our goal is to provide the best possible user experience and the best possible performance with our products, so we're constantly innovating. That innovation shouldn't stop after you receive your SuperBase Pro. That's why our new power station supports Over The Air updates (OTA).

Zendure is committed to making our planet better for the next generation. As a direct competitor to fuel-powered generators, SuperBase Pro is already a green-energy product. But we knew we could go even further. Now, environmentalism isn't just in our DNA; it's also in our source code.

When you use green energy, you're reducing the amount of carbon that would otherwise be released into the atmosphere. SuperBase Pro keeps track of your carbon reduction and puts that data into your personal ZenForest. You can compare your green energy use with friends across the globe.

But your ZenForest isn't just some pixels on a screen. As you collect carbon reduction points in the app, real trees will be planted around the world on your behalf. We're working with OneTreePlanted.org to make this happen. With your help, we're hoping to plant 10 million trees by 2025.

With so much power and so many features, SuperBase Pro has a lot going on under the hood. That's why we used the best components we could get our hands on.

Patented Power Management System: converts DC to AC, and AC to DC in the most efficient way, with an overload protection switch and a clear ground indicator.

Intelligent Temperature-Activated Fan: keeps SuperBase Pro cool, further protecting the battery.

Solid Craftsmanship: SuperBase Pro was designed to have a low center of gravity, mitigating rollover risk. The industrial wheels and aerospace-grade aluminum drawbar are built to handle difficult terrain.

Advanced BMS (Battery Management System)

Certification

High Efficiency

Our solar panel uses advanced technology to soak up as much sunlight as possible. New-generation monocrystalline solar cells maximize the conversion efficiency, performing up to 22.5% better than similarly rated polycrystalline solar panels in low-light conditions. It also has an adjustable kickstand to put the panel at the ideal angle for maximum yield.

Portable, Durable, and Waterproof IP67

We wanted to make sure our solar panel could keep up with SuperBase Pro. This meant it had to be easy to carry around, but also built to withstand the elements, as well as the hazards of travel. Whether it's folded up for transport and storage, or unfurled and ready for action, our solar panel is a rugged and capable companion for any outdoor excursion.

Strength in Numbers

If you want even more power, our solar panel can be connected in series with other solar panels. SuperBase Pro can charge at up to 1,800W. You can assemble your own solar array for maximum charging performance!

*50HZ is the default setting.

SuperBase Pro is a fully developed product, and pilot production has already begun. With your support, we can do our first round of mass production and get SuperBase Pro out into the world.

Zendure is an outdoor electronics company based in Silicon Valley in the US and the Greater Bay Area in China. Zendure was launched in 2013 with the goal of making power available everywhere with products that exceed customer expectations. Today, Zendure sells in dozens of countries around the world. We regularly deliver innovative products that surprise and delight our rapidly-growing customer base.

With SuperBase Pro and our new Solar Panel, we are expanding our mission, with a focus on unrestricted access to power while minimizing our negative effects on the planet. Our international team is excited and ready to meet this challenge.

story:
*Video transcript is available here for anyone who needs it*

 

*Many people have been asking if we accept contributions without them purchasing a perk. Yes we do - please click on Back It (the pink button) and under Make a Contribution you can specify how much you would like to contribute*

 

What we are doing

Hi, we are Ecotone Renewables.

This crazy journey started out as a passion project and turned into a business that we are incredibly passionate about. Founded in 2019 by Elliott Bennett, Kyle Wyche, and Dylan Lew, our mission addresses the ever-growing issue of food waste and the best way to process it for the environment and our communities. Our first system we call the Seahorse, is a sustainable and environmentally conscious solution where we leverage anaerobic digestion technology to provide a closed-loop solution. To date, our first Seahorse system has successfully processed over 20,000 pounds of food waste, diverting 80,000 pounds of CO2 equivalent to produce electricity and organic liquid plant fertilizer. This organic plant fertilizer, our "Soil Sauce" is then sold and donated in Pittsburgh, PA and beyond.

This is how we do it!

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Going into the winter months, we know how difficult it is to keep your plants alive and healthy, but Soil Sauce can help. With this campaign, we are testing the market for our Soil Sauce. We are interested in the feedback on a national scale. To date, we've been selling jars at a local farmers' market, however, Indiegogo gives us a chance to prove demand for a national market.

As we mentioned in the video, our goal is to build a herd of Seahorse systems across the country but it all starts here. The profits from this campaign will go towards funding our next Seahorse system. While we have a presumptive list for our next system location, we plan to weigh in the interest and support generated by this campaign to help determine its location. Who knows...maybe the next one will be in your neighborhood. A new unit costs about $55,000 so we are hoping for the best!

Check out the perks we came up with just for you. We have stretch goals and secret perks waiting to be shared as well :)

 

 

The Impact

Our Seahorse solution is impactful and the reason is twofold. 

1. WASTE: All the food that you would typically throw away is being repurposed. It is no longer rotting in our landfills, taking up space, filling our air with carbon dioxide and methane gas. It is turned into something useful, all while reducing carbon emissions and literally creating energy!

2. NO BAD RUNOFF: Fertilizer can be dangerous. In fact, many farms are not certified organic based on the fertilizer they use. The organic Soil Sauce is jam-packed with nutrients and healthy microbes which improve the long-term soil health for your land, animals, and you. You can use it on your indoor plants and outdoor garden! Additional areas of use for Soil Sauce:

  • Hydroponics (3-6% concentration)
  • Indoor and outdoor plants (diluted for 5x the volume!)
  • Compost accelerator poured on top of your compost pile

See for yourself!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We know our system can only produce about 2,600 gallons of Soil Sauce per year. This presents a challenge. If this campaign does better than we expect, production and shipping becomes more complicated. Ideally, we are aiming to deliver all rewards prior to the holiday season. We have two backup plans:

1. Start capping rewards to assure timely delivery

2. Open up a second round of shipment dates which will take us into the spring

It is also very challenging to meet any sales goal when our product cost is not very large. This is why we are hoping that people are willing to buy multiple packs of Soil Sauce for multiple months of use, which will help us reach our goal faster and prove product demand.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some of you might not have plants or farms, but maybe you still want to help?

  • You can still kick in a few bucks without a reward and we will greatly appreciate it!
  • Follow us on social media @ecotonerenew (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter).
  • Share this campaign with your friends, family and work colleagues...possibly on an appropriate work Slack or Teams channel. 
  • Send us a message - where do you think the next Seahorse system should go?

 

Meet the Team

Hi! We are Elliott, Kyle and Dylan. We've been working on Ecotone Renewables since 2019 and are very excited to begin this next stage of expansion! We would also be remiss if we did not mention our team of wonderful interns that have been helping us all year long and our mentors who, for years, have been a pillar in our company.

We thank you for supporting our campaign and we are excited to get to know all of you!

story:
The best portable composting toilet 

to GO and EXPLORE

 

You may not know this, but composting dry toilets ROCK

Before, if you wanted a portable toilet you had to choose between

  • Chemichal toilets that waste water and use nasty chemicals
  • Minimal bag in a bucket options
  • or expensive but more environmental choices, like composting

What makes Cuddy the BEST portable toilet? 

 

What about features?

Cuddy comes fully loaded including:

  • Separate solids bin for speedy emptying
  • Carbon filter to remove odors
  • Internal fan
  • High capacity 1.8gal / 6.8 L urine bottle
  • Water-resistant
  • Side, font, and back handles making him easier to carry
  • Easy-access front crank- handle
  • Locking urine bottles to prevent spills
  • Robust and durable construction
  • Super cute design

Cuddy's Redesign is finished. 

Why the redesign? 

Not only that, but you can see here where Dale, our genius product designer, has added Cuddy's "Love handles" to make him more portable. 

Dale has also tweaked a few other elements of Cuddy besides his curves, including:

  • Water-resistant
  • making him Svelte but Stronger
  • Repositioning the filter for a 'slick-not-snorkeling' look when you want to vent externally

Inside there are other improvements too:

  • Reinforcements to give him a stiff upper lip
  • Sprung hinges to support the lid
  • A more compact plate mechanism for easier bin removal
  • A feature to keep the bin handle out the way when emptying (Thanks to those who asked for this one!)

A top-secret addition that we can't share until we've patented it... watch this space!

We'll soon have more images showing off the inside as well. 

 
 

Going Greener has never been easier

Choose a natural toiet solution that is designed to fit into your beautiful space
-  just the way it is
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

  • May : Fundraise

  • June & July : Design for manufacture

  • August : Prototyping 

  • September : Fixing issues to make Cuddy perfect

  • October : Fix issues... order the moulds!

  • November : Moulds being made. Field Testing Cuddy

  • December : Moulds being made - shipped to the USA

  • January : Moulds shipped to the USA. 

  • February : Production and Delivery of Batch 1

  • March - June : Production and Delivery Batch 2​

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

​

After reaching our first funding goal, we set up 2 Stretch Goals to offer all of our backers an even better Cuddy!

 You may not know this, but composting dry toilets ROCKBefore, if you wanted a portable toilet you had to choose between
Chemichal toilets that waste water and use nasty chemicals
Minimal bag in a bucket options

story:
We are proud to announce the official launch of the .. 

 

We thank all of you who backed the Original Rapid Sol Gen 1. Over $30,000USD raised!

 

WE DID IT! 240+ BACKERS ON KICKSTARTER!

NOW GET YOUR RAPID SOL GEN 2 ON INDIEGOGO.

 

We are already in production and will have 100% Delivery - within December 2019 - January 2020.   

 

 

 

 

DEMO ( RAW VIDEO )

 TIME LAPSE REAL CHARGING ( RAW VIDEO )  

 

Fast and Portable

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 
 

JUST A FEW OF THE THOUSANDS OF ITEMS THE RAPID SOL GEN 2 CAN CHARGE FAST AND CONVENIENTLY.

We have a logistics partner already and have already planned shipping routes for USA backers and EU delivery.
Here are just a few of the items the Rapid Sol Gen 2 can charge.

  • Spark Drone 
  • USB FAN
  • any mobile phone
  • action cameras
  • Vapes
  • Portable Batteries
  • USB C powered tablets and laptops 14W

 

 

 

 Showcasing all of the amazing features and speed of the Rapid Sol™ Gen 1, plus the added portability of a multi-fold panel. 

We built a functional charger with a sleek design that fits seamlessly in your life!

Prototyping stage complete!



 

 

 

Final Production Model FINISHED!

 

 

WE ARE FAMILIAR WITH THE FRUSTRATING EXPERIENCE SOME PEOPLE HAVE HAD WITH THE SOLAR CHARGER INDUSTRY. THE RAPID SOL IS DIFFERENT. 

WOULDN'T YOU SPEND approx. $100 once and have free energy for your USB devices for a lifetime?!

WE ARE HAPPY TO ANNOUNCE, YOU CAN FINALLY COUNT ON A TRUE INDUSTRY LEADER IN QUALITY AND FUNCTIONALITY.

This was the Original 4 module design,  But we were able to achieve the Voltage Required with 3 modules, thus allowing a sleeker finish and lighter footprint for you!

The Panel is fully water-resistant, the circuit, however, is not. DO NOT GET Water on or near the circuit.  We are working on conformal coating options for water resistance. However, right now a bit of rain will not hurt Rapid Sol Gen 2! 

 

 

As seen in:

Italia

 

         

 

 

We have equipped the Rapid Sol™ Gen 2 with the latest USB C technology to give you the fastest charging speeds possible.  

Charges most phones in less than 1hr-2hrs.

 

 

 

'

 

 

PROTOTYPING STAGE FINISHED in August 2019. 

FULL PRODUCTION ON 2000 UNITS COMPLETE!

FAQ

_______________________________________________________________

Q: Does the solar charger replenish the built-in battery on the Rapid Sol™ quickly?

A: Yes, absolutely. When receiving sunlight, the Rapid Sol™ tells you how much energy you are putting into the battery via the 5-LED indicator lights.  When flashing 3 or higher, the Rapid Sol will charge extremely quickly.

Q: How Fast will you ship my Rapid Sol GEN 2™?

A: We are delighted to announce that shipping on the first 2000 units will occur immediately after the campaign is completed! NO LONG WAIT! Any units above 2000, will take 3-4months maximum.

 

Q: Is the Rapid Sol™  waterproof?

A: The panel itself is water-resistant, any water on the panel will not harm the panel at all.

DO NOT get water into the circuit as this portion is not completely waterproof.

 (**Note: the circuit is the red battery attached to the panel)

Q: What do I do if my charger overheats?

A: The Rapid Sol Gen 2 allows you to fold the circuit completely behind the panel for minimum circuit exposure to sunlight, thus allowing a much faster experience.

If you are in high heat over 85-90 degrees F, 29-32 degrees Celsius, keep the red battery portion covered or in the shade.  If you see the LED indicator blinking only “1” in direct sun after 10-20 minutes, let the battery cool down in a cold place. Usually throwing in a freezer for 10-15 seconds will immediately solve this issue or storing it in a cool place for 90 seconds will allow you to get full L.E.D. lights/ back to normal charging. In high heat, the Rapid Sol™ will collect energy at 30% speed to save the life of the battery and safety reasons. For the safest use, do not leave your Rapid Sol™ or any battery charger in temperatures of 90 + degrees F for a duration greater than 55 minutes.

When functioning properly the Rapid Sol™ will blink 1 even under a bedside/ table lamp with a standard light bulb after the circuit button is pushed once.

Push button to see charge status and turn on the solar meter.

Q: Can it charge tablets?

A: The Rapid Sol™ has a 14W total output & can absolutely charge most tablets with USB input, however, it will require ample sunlight to do so.

Q: Will Evolution Wear provide support after the Rapid Sol™ is purchased?

A: Yes, absolutely, all Gen 2 Rapid Sols come with a full 1-year warranty. An additional 18-month extension after 1 year can be purchased via the care package on the Evolution Wear® website.

Q: What is the wafer efficiency of both of the panels?

A: Both products the Rapid Sol™ & Steady Sol™ feature a 22% fully encapsulated wafer efficiency and a 24% raw wafer efficiency. Making them among the most elite tier of solar wafer quality.     *(~tested against 5V 2.1 AMP wall adapters)

story:
Professional Design & Replication of Nikola Tesla's British Patent 186,799 - Process of and Apparatus for Balancing Rotating Machine Parts

 

Hi Everyone!

The aim is to have an ultra professional design, manufacture and replication of Nikola Tesla's balancing machine which based on my research and development experience is superior to modern methods.

This almost forgotten analogue balancing machine will be able to balance rotors up to 4" in width and adaptable to go from small to large diameters if required.

For example Tesla's famous 18" rotor was 3.5" in width. Larger balancing machines are possible but 4" of X position travel to effect balancing is plenty to begin with.

Nikola Tesla was using this method over 100 years ago. It is worth replicating this apparatus to investigate whether his method may not have taken off commercially, due to it being TOO GOOD! If you have a product that lasts a very long time, it won't need to be replaced with a new one for a very long time! 

The link above will take you to a word searchable version of Tesla's final British Patent on Tesla Universe. For those who wish to read the original, here is British Patent 186,799 submitted in 1921 and approved in 1922. It was Nikola Tesla's final British patent ever. What a finale!

I think that apart from a superior dynamic balance, the rotors will be more aesthetically pleasing when balanced using Tesla's method rather than the modern digital weight removal method. Tesla's method is also less likely to introduce any turbulence and removes minimal material to achieve a balance in 3 planes (static 1 plane) and dynamic (2 planes).

Rotors balanced using modern digital method and ugly weight removal using ball nose tool

The plan is to design and manufacture a replication of Tesla's balancing apparatus and then I will personally balance all the rotors using Tesla's patent method.

Tesla's original balancing method using ugly drilled holes in end plates to remove weight circa 1909

I had several issues with balancing companies in the past, the first two let me down. The third one has done the best they can using the equipment they have, but even still it isn't up to Tesla's standard and costs £120 for each rotor because of the time taken for the job.

New Carbon Fibre Compressor Rotor on High Tensile Super Duplex Shaft

If the Indiegogo campaign is successful, the plan is to have the balancing apparatus designed and manufactured locally by the trusted rapid prototyping engineering company I use. 

YouTuber Rob Meades has been testing various types of air bearing in the background using one of my previous designs, that I hadn't actually tested myself. His progress is looking highly promising to remove the ultra high speed ceramic bearing requirement and therefore the lubrication service requirement too!

Rob Meades using graphite xy bearing design with o-rings. No Thrust bearing in place.

I am confident Tesla's analogue dynamic balancing method is superior to any being offered by digital dynamic balancing services today.  

This is due to the process of aligning the centre of balance and centre of symmetry using weight removal, whilst the rotor is being spun at a harmonic of the resonant frequency (critical speed) of the rotor.

3 x Different Compressor Rotors For Balancing Using Tesla's Method

Digital balancing companies do not recommend running a rotor at the critical speed (resonant point), whereas Tesla's method this is okay.

"As a crucial test the operator may then run the rotor at about the critical speed. This should cause no appreciable vibration or effect on the balance indicator which, instead of carrying a weight, may be equipped with a spring for producing the required pressure on the ball-bearing and opposing the torsion."

 

Just to give you an idea of the cost of made to order miniature rotor digital balancing machines:

£6k Chinese Micro Rotor Balancing Machine

JP Balancer PRS-0.3

 

£60k German Micro Rotor Balancing Machine

Schenck Pasio 5 Balancer

 

£110k English Laser Removal Micro Rotor Balancing Machine

 

The laser removal costs £240 per rotor and requires an assembly with an unknown cost that will allow the rotor to be rotated in its bearings whilst being balanced.

 

I would like to offer balancing machines for sale in the near future but until this one is designed, manufactured and tested I have no batch price, as some minor changes might be made to the design once tested. However, if you would like to be first in the queue with a £500 deposit on a Nikola Tesla Analogue Dynamic Balancer there is a Perc for that.

I'm really looking forward to balancing all the rotors using this method. I have studied the patent for nearly 3 years and longed to build one.

I plan to use an off the shelf Dremel 3000 for item 4 (Motor) in the diagram.

Dremel 3000

 

Also a carborundum grinding wheel as Tesla suggests for item 3 (Carborundum Abrasive Grinding).

Carborundum (Silicon Carbide) Grinding Wheel

 

Carborundum is also known as Silicon Carbide.

This material pops up now and again in Tesla's work. Interesting how it is now used as a semi conductor.

 

A proper slide and lathe mechanism will be used to effect x and y movement in controllable increments. Items 5, 6, 7 & 8. 

The SKF bearings were selected for the job as they do not require a preload or spring washers. The bearings will be mounted in rubber rings with a low shore hardness. 

These rubber rings will be changeable for lower / harder shore hardness rings until the most suitable shore hardness is found. This will serve as parts 17, 18, 19 and 20. 

A special circular bore two part balancing specific casing which I am designing for items 9 and 10 will house the bearings and item 2 which is the rotor to be balanced will stick out of the casing.

 

To regulate the rpm using the Logitech Electronics tachometer and magnetic pickup will replace items 23 and 24.  This tachometer equipment can measure up to 999,999rpm.

An air compressor with regulator an additional compressed air heater is optional to replace 16, 21 and 22.

I'm considering combining something modern like an accelerometer to measure vibration. This would replace items 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31 and 32.

I have already made a basic replication of Tesla's "vibration gauge" but I think a digital version would be more accurate and not have to touch the shaft.

Basic First Prototype of Tesla's Fig 3. Vibration Gauge

Building Tesla's mechanical version is really simple and a comparison test could be carried out between the digital and analogue measuring tool.

 

Nikola Tesla states:

"When the structure is revolving at the proper speed I bring the abrasive wheel into operative contact with it at a peripheral or other suitable region and grind off material. As the action continues, the flexure of the shaft diminishes until, finally, its center of symmetry coincides with the center of gravity of the system, or nearly so. This can be noted in many cases by a competent operator without the use of a special device, but suitable visible or audible means may be employed for the purpose."

 

Strangely there are three item 32's in the patent diagram. The two on the right hand side are for the vibration gauge graduated scale and the one on the left in Fig 4. is for a suitable fixture to spray the abrasive jet 33.

 

I think Fig 4. is for rotating parts with no shaft. Number 35. is a flexible shaft and this infers the rotor has no shaft after balancing is effected. Tesla's improved rotor design British Patent 186,082 features a hub. It was designed for this purpose as some of Tesla's machines don't need a shaft and can rotate at incredible speeds with no contact and floating rotors. There are many other mechanical rotating parts such as gears, pulleys, rotors etc that require this method of balancing using a removable flexible shaft. The whole patent 186,799 caters for both rigid and flexible shaft balancing methods.

"Substantially the same apparatus, with the exception of wheel 3, may be employed in connection with the device diagrammatically illustrated in Fig. 4, in which a suitable fixture 32 projects a jet 33 of abrasive substance tangentially upon the body 34 to be balanced which is supported on a flexible shaft 35. In this case of course the fixture is mounted on carriage 5 to enable feeding in two directions."

"Lathe carriage 5 which slides on rails 6, 6 and is provided with means 7 and 8 for feeding the wheel, respectively, along the axis of the motor shaft and at right angles to the same"

Perhaps the fine balance abrasive jet equipment can be added later once a proper use has been found and the rest of the apparatus is proven.

Mini Sandblaster - Item 33 "Suitable Fixture" in Drawing

 

Example of sandblasting media options: https://www.finishingsystems.com/blog/sandblast...

 

I look forward to working with you all to achieve a magnificent design, manufacture and replication of Nikola Tesla's balancing apparatus and method.

 

Best regards,

Paul

story:
In 2018 we launched our first product on Kickstarter and it was an instant success. Since then we shipped 50 AquaShield units worldwide and received a ton of feedback from our backers. Based on these, we improved almost every part of the AquaShield. 

AquaShield is a smart home system for your greenhouse or indoor farm:

It tracks all important environmental parameters like PH, EC, temperature, humidity, light intestity, VPD, dew point and much more. With AquaShield, you can automate your hydroponic or aquaponic system: you can control grow lights, pumps, valves or any other active component. The device is capable to connect to the internet, so you can access your AquaShield anytime, anywhere.

 

Produce high quality crops using automation. AquaShield helps you to save time, reduce cost and work more efficiently. AquaShield can control 8 devices (grow lights, pumps, fans etc.) simultaneously.

AquaShield 2.0 can also host PWM (pulse width modulation) enabled dosing pumps, LED grow lights, servos and much more.

For an easier use, we also developed our own dosing pumps, that can easily control your PH (use PH+ or PH-) or maintain the optimal EC by adding nutrients based on the AquaShield’s EC readings.

The in-house developed software tracks all sensors real-time, stores all data and alerts you if needed. 

Monitoring features of the AquaShield Connect: sensors, graphs and calibration 

 

 

Controlling features of the AquaShield Connect: activate relays and dosing pump setup 

 

Automation with the AquaShield Connect: Time and sensor based workflows and alerting features

 

 

 

AquaShield 2.0 is commercial ready, but we need your help to ramp up production. AquaShield has 9 different PCB boards that only could be manufactured economically if we order in larger quantities. With larger order quantities we can also negotiate better prices for the housing and sensors, so we will have more money to spend on further development of the device and the software. 

 

 

Please be aware that all shipping costs, VAT and sales taxes will be collected after the campaign is over. 

We’re a Budapest, Hungary based company, so we will ship all perks from Hungary. Taxes will vary depending on where we deliver the perks. We have to charge VAT, if your shipping address is in the European Union.

In other cases - for example if you back us from the United States - we won’t charge any taxes, however sales taxes and custom fees may apply, might be levied on your parcel. The charge of the fees depends on the customs office / specific local post office of the destination country.

Below you can see the estimated shipping costs based on our latest data.

 

We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can't be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay.

We are using TNT and FedEx to get our products to you. We'll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it's going to get to you. Please feel free to contact us we are here to help!
story_txt: In 2018 we launched our first product on Kickstarter and it was an instant success. Since then we shipped 50 AquaShield units worldwide and received a ton of feedback from our backers. Based on these, we improved almost every part of the AquaShield. AquaShield is a smart home system for your greenhouse or indoor farm:It tracks all important environmental parameters like PH, EC, temperature, humidity, light intestity, VPD, dew point and much more. With AquaShield, you can automate your hydroponic or aquaponic system: you can control grow lights, pumps, valves or any other active component. The device is capable to connect to the internet, so you can access your AquaShield anytime, anywhere. Produce high quality crops using automation. AquaShield helps you to save time, reduce cost and work more efficiently. AquaShield can control 8 devices (grow lights, pumps, fans etc.) simultaneously.AquaShield 2.0 can also host PWM (pulse width modulation) enabled dosing pumps, LED grow lights, servos and much more.For an easier use, we also developed our own dosing pumps, that can easily control your PH (use PH+ or PH-) or maintain the optimal EC by adding nutrients based on the AquaShield’s EC readings.The in-house developed software tracks all sensors real-time, stores all data and alerts you if needed. Monitoring features of the AquaShield Connect: sensors, graphs and calibration   Controlling features of the AquaShield Connect: activate relays and dosing pump setup  Automation with the AquaShield Connect: Time and sensor based workflows and alerting features   AquaShield 2.0 is commercial ready, but we need your help to ramp up production. AquaShield has 9 different PCB boards that only could be manufactured economically if we order in larger quantities. story:
Several tragedies have occurred in the US alone this year, ranging from the California earthquake, freezing weather in Texas to wildfires in several states. Emergency power backup is more important than ever now, but this does not mean that any power station will do the job. Cheap and faulty batteries can cause more problems than they solve. At SUNGZU’s we only make power stations with the latest battery technology, the highest safety protocols, and the best materials. 

 

 

If we compare LiFePO4 batteries to traditional ternary lithium batteries, the latter are less stable due to their active chemical composition, which is more reactive to high temperatures and that can lead to explosions. LiFePO4 batteries have a more stable internal structure, are less likely to decompose at higher temperatures, are more resistant to overcharging,less likely to short circuit, and are less susceptible to spontaneous explosion.

 

Our power stations are made to last. The SKA series is constructed with a high-strength aluminum alloy casing with integrated molding technology.  The front and back of the power stations are made of high-performance fireproof plastic. How many things can walk away unscratched after being run over by a 4x4 (4000lbs/ 2000kg)?  

The LiFePO4 batteries can handle high temperatures with minimal degradation thanks to the sufficient space between each battery cell, better ventilation and heat dissipation is provided. This can greatly expand its life cycle and no maintenance is required. Our units can last up to 15 years in continuous use. 

Sungzu’s revolutionary BMS technology is capable of maintaining 90% of the battery's capacity for a year after a full charge. A standby power source ready to go.

As seen on

 

Don’t let the outer casing made of aluminum case fool you. SUNGZU’s engineers thought of every aspect of the power station, including its portability. The SKA series are close to the size of a Macbook Pro and can be carried around easily. A reliable companion no matter where you go.

Sudden power outage? To combat those unexpected dark moments, Sungzu has designed an innovative night light system. Simply touch the screen or press any button, and both the screen and sockets will light up!  

The unique front and rear airflow design of the product, combined with the silent turbine fan and the intelligent temperature control system, can quickly reduce the internal temperature from overheating. The SKA series can operate in extreme high and low temperatures.

1000W AC Output | Peak to 2000W

Can effortlessly power your essential and everyday devices, from your almighty communication devices, kitchen appliances to working tools.

1500W AC Output | Peak to 3000W

Taking it up a notch with the SKA1500-T you can charge everything the SKA1000-T can but much longer. A reliable source of energy you can count on when disaster strikes by keeping vital home appliances and devices running without interruption.

With the number of devices we have nowadays, we can’t help but juggle chargers and look for sockets. Say adios to those old days with our functional portable power stations to charge up all your devices- no more plugging and unplugging! The SKA series can charge 9 devices at once. You'll never forget to charge your laptop or phone again because every single one will be charged, all at the same time.

3 AC Outlets 

 Due to the voltage difference in each country, we will match the voltage according to the country from your order’s address. The 50HZ and 60HZ AC output frequencies are switchable. Users don’t need to worry about the AC output frequency. 

Sungzu’s R&D team has implemented the most rigorous safety and quality controls by carrying out all relevant testing procedures to ensure that our units comply with the highest quality standards.

A 2-year quality warranty is included from when you receive your product (accessories are excluded). Sungzu provides maintenance and replacement services free of charge. We have set up after-sales agents in the United States, Canada, Japan, South Korea, Britain, France, Germany, Finland, Switzerland, Australia, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, and other countries so that the whole process is simple and hassle-free.

For the first time, you'll never have to worry about running out of battery power. Sungzu is an all-in-one power station that has 3 convenient ways to recharge: wall outlet, car charging and solar panels. Whether you're at home or out in nature, our units are the perfect pick-me-up for your devices.

 

Power station

Solar panel

With a decade-long history of developing, designing, and producing innovative portable power stations and solar products.  Sungzu has trusting and long-term distributors around the globe, with our vast supply chain channel, customers can reach us anywhere. After-sale services are available in all countries with distributor presence.

Customers' feedback

Orders fulfilled from our previous campaign 

Production Line

story:
What stops you from hanging out with friends, going out for dates, or bringing your kids outdoors in the great summer? The annoying mosquitoes? The allergy to mosquito bites? 

Why not try WANDIAN? A small yet powerful mosquito repellent that protects you and your family from pesky bugs with neither irritating spray nor pungent smell, only a light faint scent from its plant-based ingredients that is safe to both kids and pregnant women.  The miniature scent-burner and the turbo fan combine to spread the repellent further and faster, even in a strong wind. Enjoy a mosquito-free summer and life with WANDIAN!

Fan & Heat Mode Enlarges The Repellent Effect

WANDIAN releases the essential oil through the air vent and forms an invisible protective shield to block mosquitoes. The microturbine blower and heating plate helps the essential oil dissipate and form the protective shield quickly.​

The heating pad and the micro turbo blower quickly activate the repellent and speed up the creation of the mosquito protection zone. The combination protects you from mosquitoes and other annoying insects in a minute!

The color of the incense tablet will gradually fade as it volatilizes, and when it turns white, it’s time to change to a new one!

Slow-Release Mode: It slowly releases the mosquito repellent to protect you. The efficacy lasts for 60 days. Suitable for exercising.

Fan repellent mode: When you press the power button, WANDIAN will quickly spread the mosquito repellent and keep you in a highly protective environment for 8 hours.

Powerful mosquito repellent mode: The most powerful mode using electric heating + fan, working for 4 hours.​

Long-term mosquito repellent mode: Connect it to the power source, then it will work enduringly with a high repellent effect.​

The problems of current mosquito repellents are: smoky and ashy, short-lived, unfriendly to the respiratory tract, and hazardous to kids and pregnant women.

WANDIAN is a plant-based mosquito repellent that extracts essential oil from citronella, eucalyptus, lavender, peppermint, artemisia argyi, lycopene, and geranium, etc., which are 100% pure and natural. DEET-free! (* If you are allergic to any of these ingredients, please do not use it)Wear WANDIAN With You, Chase Mosquitoes Away From You!

DIY Your Favourite Odour!

You can wear WANDIAN in multiple ways to fit your different outfits in different occasions. Wear it with the included strap or the metal clip, or, wear it with your own lanyard or replaceable straps.

DEET is part of mosquito repellent that can’t be used for kids under 2 months old and might negatively affect the environment, humans, and animals like fish, birds, and other insects.

Upholding the concept of environmental protection, WANDIAN uses a rechargeable battery and the recyclable package, which can avoid environmental pollution by the wasted battery and plastic package.

When WANDIAN is not in use, store it into its original airtight container, which will preserve the repellent for longer. It will stop the pads from degrading and retain their effect till the next time of use. Don’t worry about wasting it by letting it lie idle.

No sweaty pressure from wearing WANDIAN during summer! It has a heat dissipation design that allows airflow between your skin and WANDIAN.

Orange Tech has been engaged in the innovated electronics industry for 5 years. The team is formed by senior engineers who have worked for ten years; structural designers and the appearance design team. We focus on the deep exploration of innovation design, research and development of electronic products, and the cross-industry applications of new material and new technologies. In the past 5 years, our company has got many achievements, including Entrepreneurship and innovation competition, new product and new technology competition.

Test Video

story:
About Cellpowa500 EU version

Dear Indiegogo customers.

Good news for Europe customers! We BigBlue plan to design EU version for European customers now, the production time is November and the shipping time is about December.

Cellpowa500 EU version can reach to 220V output, and 2xAC ports will be changed to EU version.

Due to the source of customers and production conditions, if we finally decide not to produce the EU version, we will refund customers who choose the EU version of perk.

BigBlue Cellpowa 500 is our first self-developed product. Our rigorous safety design philosophy and pursuit of high energy efficiency make us confident in the stability and Environmental protection of our product. and we are confident that it will provide you with the stable power within five to ten years. The Durability and efficiency of materials and development details, as well as greater safety than most of its competitors are the greatest motivation for us to recommend this product to you.

This crowdfunding is only a pre-sale, no matter whether it is successful or not, we will provide you with products

 

 

In today's complex and ever-changing environment, a stable power supply is one of the most important factors in ensuring your personal life. With the combination of Cellpowa 500 and Solarpowa 100 in this campaign, you can obtain a basic green energy supply in any corner of the globe. What's more, in the current situation where raw materials and shipping costs have risen by average 30%, in order to thank all supporters' interest for us, this campaign will supply products at a partial loss price and a cost price.

Cellpowa 500 LiFePO4 portable power station is a powerful, safe, eco-friendly for home use and off-grid living. It can meet the electricity demand of common electrical appliances.

 

 

 
 

 

 

Camping? Small RV Travel? Beach party? Power outage? Expensive electricity bill? Whenever you need, cellpowa 500 is here!

 

 

And you can recharge anytime and anywhere, don’t worry about running out of power.

 

 

 

 

 

We have cooperated with some media and will continue to update the media comments, hope their comments can be helpful to you.

 

                            

                              

 

 

Cellpowa 500 is not only a backup power source for your home, but also a mobile generator for your outdoor activity. It can quickly charge most electrical appliances in your life.

*The data is for reference only, there may be errors in actuality

 

 

2*USB-C PD+1*AC adapter+1* cigarette lighter adapter input ports. multiple charging ports support computers, laptop, mobile phones, wall sockets, Car chargers, and generators to recharge it.

The power station will full of power within about 3 hours by using 2*USB-C PD+1*AC adapter at the same time. Of course , solar panels can also be used to recharge it anytime and anywhere when there is no grid outdoors.

This special ETFE material surface can reach to IP65 waterproof that protect it from occasional rain or wet Fog. All the ports are covered by a cloth flap and rubber ,which can protect them from dust or water damage.

By using ETFE integrated seamless press technology, the conversion rate of transparent material in one piece can be increased by 5%.

 

 

Solarpowa 100 solar panel is specially designed for cellpowa 500 power station. It is equipped with a SAE waterproof output port that allows cellpowa 500 to fully charge in 6.5 hours. With enough sunlight, efficient SunPower panel can convert as much as 23 percent of the sun's energy into free energy.

 

 

Considering the utility of the Cellpowa 500, we designed a special look for it so that it can also be held with both hands.

 

 

 

In any case, your safety is always our top priority. To this end, we use a safer and more stable LiFePO4 battery. we also use the intelligent temperature control system and Efficiently BMS management system to ensure that the product will not catch fire, explode and leak.

 

Our component supplier will provide us with an 18-month component quality assurance, but we have full confidence in the stability of Cellpowa 500, so we upgrade the 24-month warranty period for customers who support us on indiegogo.

 

Unique LiFePO4 battery delivers the highest security. Compared with the common lithium battery on the market, the LiFePO4 battery we use is safer and more stable. At the same time, we use the intelligent temperature control system to makes the battery can work normally in an environment of 0~45°C, even in the harshest situation, it will not explode.

 

 

 

The LiFePO4 battery we use is the safest and most durable battery material, and we have done more than a dozen safety tests during production to ensure that our product does not catch fire, does not explode, and does not leak.

Our Cellpowa 500 retains 80% of its original capacity after 2000 full charge cycles, it means that you can use it every day for more than 4 years!  And while The average output drops，the life cycle will increase more.

 

 

 

Compared with similar products on the market, cellpowa 500 uses safer materials and has more battery capacity. Cellpowa 500 also has a much longer cycle life than other power stations that use lithium batteries.However, our price in indiegogo is more favorable than other products.

Through our actual measurement, due to the influence of light intensity, our Solarpowa 100 solar panel can actually reach 90-100W, which is higher than other similar products. 

More importantly, our crowdfunding price is only $159, which is cheaper than other similar products.

 

 

A variety of accessories to meet your needs.

 

 

BigBlue was founded in 2015. Since we were founded, we have been committed to developing energy storage products with better performance, newer design and higher safety factor. Up to now we have a team of more than 200 people, including more than 100 R & D personnel.

Bigblue mainly produces and operates energy storage equipment and solar energy equipment. It has been sold all over the world through the Amazon platform for many years. It is a stable and mature brand. We are committed to realizing an environmentally friendly economy through solar power panels and energy storage equipment.


After continuous research and exploration, we have created a series of practical consumer electronics products such as solar chargers, desktop docking stations, energy storage systems, car chargers, micro USB cables, etc., which have brought convenience to more than 1 million customers in over 170 countries worldwide. In December of last year, our R&D team began to study power stations and drew the first sketch of Cellpowa 500.

We are designing a 3000WH power station now, we plan to launch it in August! Before that we have set up a Facebook group for the customers who are interested in it. We will post the latest news about the power station there, everyone is welcome to discuss and make comments. We will improve the product based on your comments and suggestions, and then randomly select the lucky ones among the participants to give out gifts!

 

In the future, we look forward to combining portable power stations with solar panels to create mobile solar generator and home backup powerwall, making green and clean energy available everywhere. In this way, we hope to provide enough electricity to households in power-poor areas and promote development. Let's build your living space and power the world!

 

 

In addition, we are keen to contribute to social rescue operations, and hope our products can provide power support for people suffering from disaster!
