At the same time, we use the intelligent temperature control system to makes the battery can work normally in an environment of 0~45°C, even in the harshest situation, it will not explode.

 

 

 
The LiFePO4 battery we use is the safest and most durable battery material, and we have done more than a dozen safety tests during production to ensure that our product does not catch fire, does not explode, and does not leak.
Our Cellpowa 500 retains 80% of its original capacity after 2000 full charge cycles, it means that you can use it every day for more than 4 years!  And while The average output drops，the life cycle will increase more.
 

 

 
Compared with similar products on the market, cellpowa 500 uses safer materials and has more battery capacity. Cellpowa 500 also has a much longer cycle life than other power stations that use lithium batteries.However, our price in indiegogo is more favorable than other products.

Through our actual measurement, due to the influence of light intensity, our Solarpowa 100 solar panel can actually reach 90-100W, which is higher than other similar products. 
More importantly, our crowdfunding price is only $159, which is cheaper than other similar products.
 

 
A variety of accessories to meet your needs.
 

 


BigBlue was founded in 2015. Since we were founded, we have been committed to developing energy storage products with better performance, newer design and higher safety factor. Up to now we have a team of more than 200 people, including more than 100 R & D personnel.
Bigblue mainly produces and operates energy storage equipment and solar energy equipment. It has been sold all over the world through the Amazon platform for many years. It is a stable and mature brand. We are committed to realizing an environmentally friendly economy through solar power panels and energy storage equipment.


After continuous research and exploration, we have created a series of practical consumer electronics products such as solar chargers, desktop docking stations, energy storage systems, car chargers, micro USB cables, etc., which have brought convenience to more than 1 million customers in over 170 countries worldwide. In December of last year, our R&D team began to study power stations and drew the first sketch of Cellpowa 500.
We are designing a 3000WH power station now, we plan to launch it in August! Before that we have set up a Facebook group for the customers who are interested in it. We will post the latest news about the power station there, everyone is welcome to discuss and make comments. We will improve the product based on your comments and suggestions, and then randomly select the lucky ones among the participants to give out gifts!
 
In the future, we look forward to combining portable power stations with solar panels to create mobile solar generator and home backup powerwall, making green and clean energy available everywhere. In this way, we hope to provide enough electricity to households in power-poor areas and promote development. Let's build your living space and power the world!
 

 
In addition, we are keen to contribute to social rescue operations, and hope our products can provide power support for people suffering from disaster!

story:
As a leading outdoor expert, NITECORE has released several product lines on the outdoor power solutions to meet the needs of outdoor enthusiasts including the ultra lightweight carbon fiber power banks, IP68 rated ultra waterproof power banks and portable outdoor power stations. These have gained numerous worldwide media coverage with testimonials around the globe.

Inspired by the notion to "Keep Innovating" with the industry-leading innovative power for 14 years, NITECORE is the first brand to achieve a grand-slam milestone in the industries of professional lighting and chargers to receive the German iF Design Award, Red Dot Design Award, the Japanese G-Mark (Good Design) and the American IDEA, as well as Gold Winners of the ISPO Award and Outstanding Outdoor globally recognized in the outdoor industry.

NITECORE Outdoor Power Solutions aim to create an eco-friendly power system with a green and sustainable lifestyle for outdoor enthusiasts. We strive to offer the most intelligent experience with professional, reliable and efficient energy storage products, designed to innovate the way of accessing power off the grid and allow a limitless power supply on the go.

Compared to conventional gas generators, the outdoor power stations are more silent, compact and lightweight, using clean energy and reducing the carbon footprint while reducing the cost of time and money.

The NITECORE NES1200 is our latest model and the most powerful NITECORE power station with a high capacity of 1252.8Wh and a max AC output of 1200W. With versatile output ports including cigarette lighter, AC, USB-A and USB-C ports, it can charge 7 devices simultaneously.

The 1200W AC output can power anything you need in the outdoor environment. Its outstanding energy capacity keeps an uninterrupted power supply while you are on the go.

Similar to the standard AC electricity, the pure sine wave is unharmful and universally friendly to various household appliances with a smooth and continuous wave form, instead of a sudden and choppy output.

With each cell independently managed and stored, the modular battery pack can automatically balance the working status of each cell. The intervals more than 0.06" (1.5mm) between each cell keep the interior well ventilated to quickly dissipate the heat into the air.

The BMS is designed to dynamically manage and monitor each cell 100 times per second. It can maintain the best performance and prevent overcharge or over-discharge of the batteries to prolong their lifespan.

The 4 pieces of anti-shock rubber on the bottom can serve as a cushion to effectively protect the cells against a fall or an impact during transport.

The internal protective circuits can also maintain its excellent stability and the best performance.

The UL certified battery cells ensure a prolonged lifespan with increased safety.

We offer various socket or voltage versions for different countries or regions around the world.

The NES1200 offers several charging methods including the solar panel, the AC adapter, the car charger and the USB adapter. You can even maximize the charging process by combining the AC adapter and the USB adapter.

The MPPT module is equipped to maximize the conversion of solar energy in all kinds of situations, even in rainy or cloudy days.

The FSP100 has a cell efficiency 60% higher than conventional solar panels. The monocrystalline silicon can also achieve a stable energy conversion even in an overcast day. It is also equipped with 2 x USB-A ports and 1 x USB-C port for full compatibility of various devices. With sufficient sunlight, it enables multiple simultaneous and high-speed output for all your equipment.

The SPM10 is the first solar power meter in the world to monitor the charging status of the solar panel with a real-time LCD display to show the current, voltage and power of each port. It also has an additional Anderson input port with USB-A and USB-C output ports for more compatibility.

story:
SoilQuality - The Ultimate Soil Sensor, allows you to talk and take care of your plants by making soil moisture and soil nutrients data available through our own mobile App. With SoilQuality, you'll know when your plant is thirsty or in need of more nutrients for growth. It is water-resistant and perfect for your indoor plants, kitchen garden, and cannabis grow rooms.

​
story_txt: SoilQuality - The Ultimate Soil Sensor, allows you to talk and take care of your plants by making soil moisture and soil nutrients data available through our own mobile App. With SoilQuality, you'll know when your plant is thirsty or in need of more nutrients for growth. It is water-resistant and perfect for your indoor plants, kitchen garden, and cannabis grow rooms.​

story:
Still cleaning using the old-fashioned way? We are living in 2021 and we are still using papers and wet wipes that are hurting our planet. It’s time to switch to a more powerful, effective, refreshing and most importantly, eco-friendly way of cleaning!

Introducing Peakhonor, the most powerful & portable eco-friendly bidet. Featuring 180 degrees adjustable water bar and nozzle, Peakhonor is easier to use than any products on the market. Selecting from light to higher mode, it’s the perfect device for a healthy, hygiene-conscious and environmentally aware lifestyle.

Third Party Reviews

 
 

It is our planet to live in and our choice to protect it. Every year, in the US alone, a person uses at least 60 rolls of toilet paper just by cleaning. It is time to upgrade the old cleaning way to a healthier, cleaner and more eco-friendly one!

Toilet paper is dry, and it is irritating to use. Peakhonor offers you a premium experience like you just stepped outside your shower! But this time, your butt is the one who is getting out of shower

Both the water bar and the nozzle head are 180 degrees adjustable, which makes it super easy for anyone to use, at any situation, and any angle.

There is a light mode and a relatively higher mode for you to choose your preferred water pressure, so more people get to enjoy this modern wonder! A simple device works for an entire family!

Thanks to Peakhonor’s powerful & targeted spray, it will clean you up in as little as a few seconds. Start taking your cleaning experience to a whole new level!

There is a safety protection device to prevent the motor from dry running, which gives Peakhonor a longer lifetime.

Using Peakhonor is incredibly easy, no installation needed, just grab it and go, it is built for convenience.

Peakhonor is portable, you can literally bring it anywhere you go! You can use it in a public bathroom, porta potty, or out camping, always enjoy being a cleaner version of yourself!

Peakhonor bidet provides extra care for the ladies, because you can also use it for menstrual, post-coital, and post-natal cleanliness.

Peakhonor features an extra powerful battery that provides unprecedented endurance! You can recharge your battery up to 1,000 times, which makes the planet even cleaner!

Bidet Specifications

Battery Specifications

Founded in Hong Kong and Beijing in 2015, Peakhonor has developed many technologies that were purchased by international corporations. Established the portable bidet project in 2020.

story:
Legion Solar is a simple do-it-yourself solar system with battery storage and off grid power with artificial intelligence (AI).

Prices will INCREASE after this campaign. This is your LAST CHANCE to get Legion Solar at these exclusive low prices.

 

Solar energy is no longer an expensive complicated process. Install Legion Solar virtually anywhere.

 

Legion Solar is designed for anybody with any skill level to setup. It's that simple!   

 

 

 

Legion Solar works with your existing rate program to simply drive your consumption down. The result is simply a lowered electric bill.

 

 

 

We created SolarRegulator™, an artificial intelligence computer to contain generated energy behind your meter where the utility company does not control. Energy production of each Micro-Inverter is controlled so that energy production is less than or equal to energy consumption allowing you to generate your own electricity unrestricted.

 

Utility company only sees less consumption from you, not a grid tied solar system. As a result, it is not necessary to seek interconnection permission pertaining to utility company approved grid-tied solar systems.

 

We took all the short comings of traditional solar systems and designed a game changing new solution to outperform.

 

As you become familiar with Legion Solar, size up your system in stages. The larger the system, the more you'll offset and the more you'll save.

  • Stage 1 - Get familiar with Legion Solar and it's components with the Starter Set. Sets up in minutes and experience instant results.
  • Stage 2 - Scale your solar output with expansion sets to offset your daytime usage.
  • Stage 3 - Once your system is large enough to have excess energy to store during daylight, add expansion sets with BatteryCommander™ for night time consumption.
  • Stage 4 - Add Off Grid Controller™ and an Off Grid Inverter so that you have emergency power during grid power outages.

 

 

Bluetooth interface allows you to monitor your energy production and consumption, check system health, diagnostics and more via the LegionSolar App for Apple/Android. Try it for fee today. Search "Legion Solar" in iTunes or Google Play. 

 

Traditional solar systems have built-in costs such as resellers markups, installation labor, permits, sales reps, and other fees. Legion Solar is energy delivered straight to your door without the unnecessary costs giving you up to 3x faster ROI.

 

 

Legion Solar makes financial sense and outperforms nearly all other investments.

 

 

Legion Solar also outperforms nearly all other forms of energy in long term energy value. It makes clean energy PROFITABLE for you with ZERO emissions.

Basic Expansion Set

Deluxe Expansion Set

Deluxe Expansion Set + Lithium Battery

Additional Accessories

 

To include Add-On items, tap "GET THIS PERK" button that appears with your desired contribution. Add On perks are available for you to select from the "Perks you may also like" section.

Backers and customers who currently own sets with Battery Commander 1, a FREE upgrade option is available to Battery Commander 2 with your pledge of the Deluxe Expansion Set or Deluxe Expansion Set with Lithium Battery up to the number of Battery Commander 1's that you currently own. For example, if you currently own 4 sets with Battery Commander 1 and you pledge for 5 Deluxe Expansion Sets, 4 Battery Commander 2 units will be included for FREE to upgrade your existing Battery Commander 1 to Battery Commander 2.

 

Legion Solar photovoltaic panels are 50% lighter and designed specifically for the Legion Solar Micro-Inverter to achieve an ideal system match for high efficiency DC to AC conversion. Rated for hurricane force winds, hail, and snow. High efficiency A Grade polycrystalline cells delivers unsurpassed price/watt performance with a 30 year service life.

 

Legion Solar micro-inverters are designed to achieve ideal system match for high efficiency DC to AC conversion. Up to 32 micro-inverters can be connected in a daisy-chain. Our micro-inverters employ maximum power point tracking (MPPT) technology to achieve maximum power output in full sun and partial shade conditions. LegionConnex™ wiring simplifies connectivity ideally suited for the do-it-yourself installer.

 

 

Micro-inverters outperform that of traditional central inverters due to no single point of failure. Each inverter cell works independently of each other to maximize energy production in partial cloud or shady conditions.

 

Legion Solar Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) 25.6V 100Ah 2560Wh Deep Cycle batteries were carefully selected to be the ideal match for Battery Commander 2 in voltage, capacity, energy power density and weight optimized for do-it-yourself energy storage solutions. 

 

 

Lithium batteries are far superior to that of Lead Acid batteries in nearly every way. 

  • BatteryCommander 2 (New) connects in between the micro inverter and the solar panel. During daylight solar energy is used to supplement usage from your utility company and charge the batteries. At night, batteries supplement your usage enabling Legion Solar to completely offset all of your daytime and nighttime consumption. Compatible with Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) and standard Sealed Lead Acid Batteries , two deep cycle 12V batteries or connected in series or one 24V battery with capacity range 60-120Ah is recommended for each BatteryCommander branch.

 

  •  OffGrid Controller is a combiner hub for your batteries to multiply usable capacity. It detects when grid power goes down and automatically turns on power to the backup inverter to supply power to an off grid branch circuit where you can power all of your basic necessities in any emergency. When power goes out, lights and appliances connected to this branch automatically turn on. When power comes back, the emergency branch circuit automatically turns off. Compatible with both Lithium and Lead Acid battery chemistries.

 

  •  Off Grid Inverter is used to supply grid compatible AC power from 24V batteries for use with appliances rated up to 3000 Watts. Have peace of mind for you and your family in any emergency.

 

Tap to see manuals and more how to videos and demonstrations.

Legion Solar 6 introduces the new SMR Roof Racking system with the following improvements:

 

 

  1. Rail splices are now load bearing allowing you to extend rail lenghts without sacrificing strength.
  2. Rails are lighter and stronger.
  3. Mid Clamps and End Clamps have been improved with "Pop-on" feature for easier installation and better DIY experience. 

Recent Improvements to Legion Solar System:

  • Battery Commander 1 has been upgraded to Battery Commander 2 now with support for Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) 24V battery, and improved charging efficiency for Flooded/Sealed Lead Acid Batteries.

 

  • Solar Regulator 2.0 has been upgraded to Solar Regulator 3.0 now with hardware support for 3 phase systems for commercial buildings.

 

  • Solar Regulator's Artificial Intelligence (AI) 2.0 has been upgraded to AI 3.1 with improved power production algorithms and monitoring efficiency. Support and optimization for Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) batteries and 3 phase utility power.

 

  • Legion Solar App will have more advanced diagnostics for troubleshooting, and system maintenance functions.

 

Legion Solar 6 is 100% compatible with Legion Solar 3, 4, 5 electrical components. Legion Solar 3, 4, and 5 owners will automatically get the benefits of AI 3.1 via automatic software updates. New Legion Solar 6 SMR roof racking system is NOT compatible with Legion Solar 5 and earlier racking systems. 

IRS Form 3468

Prices will increase after this campaign. This is your LAST CHANCE to get Legion Solar at these exclusive low prices. 

 

We have raised over $3.2 Million on crowd funding platforms and fulfilled rewards to 27,000+ backers since 2013. Innovation is our passion and we hope that you enjoyed our projects as much as we enjoyed creating them.

 

The prolific use of fossil fuels has resulted in the rise of our planet’s carbon dioxide levels not seen in over 5 millions years (before the time of humans).

The technology for complete transition to clean energy is possible now. With your support we can take control and choose to offset our dependence of harmful fossil fuels. It's our responsibility to leave our planet in better condition for our future generations than we found it. Join the fight for clean energy and become a Legion Today!

 

Questions? Message us or Call +1-408-745-7591

M-F 8am-5pm PST

 

Schedule a call back

Tap to schedule call back

Production and Shipping

All available perks options are already in full production and are shipping. 

 

https://www.facebook.com/LegionSolar/

 

  • Due to continuous product improvements, the images may differ slightly from the actual product that you receive.
  • LegionSolar™, SolarHub™, SolarRegulator™, SolarBuilder™, BatteryCommander™, OffGridController™ are trademarks of PLX Devices Inc.
  • For rural and/or delivery addresses that require special attention backers will be contacted prior to shipment with an opportunity to change the delivery address or cover additional shipping charges. 
  • Legion Solar is shipped with insurance and tracking. Damaged goods must be reported within 5 business days of receipt of goods for Domestic shipments and within 48 hours for International shipments to qualify for insurance claims.
  • Legion Solar is Patented.
  • "Bypass all regulations" pertains to regulations associated with grid tied utility approved solar systems.
  • Shipping costs for perks and add on perks based on carrier and destination will be determined post campaign. 
  • Customers may also pickup items from our Fremont, CA warehouse (next to Tesla Factory) by making an appointment with customer service at time of fulfillment.

story:
Announcement as of 11/25/20:

We have some more exciting news. BuffaloGrid have confirmed a collaboration with UK for UNHCR, the national charity partner for UNHCR, the UN Refugee Agency, and I can now confirm the first batch of Buffalitos you have helped fund will be delivered directly to the Bidibidi Refugee Settlement in Uganda. UNHCR will ensure that they are provided for free to the people that need them most.

 

There are 1.2 million refugees in Uganda's Bidi Bidi Settlement which is the largest refugee camp in Uganda and the second largest in the world, covering 250 square kilometres.

It is estimated that 73 % of men and 44 % of women in Bidi Bidi own a phone. We are honoured to put power and light into their hands by providing Buffalitos to refugees across the camp.

 

The Buffalito by BuffaloGrid is a multi-purpose lighting and mobile charging device.

 

 

Each Buffalito sold supports BuffaloGrid's "Get Power, Give Power" campaign to raise awareness of the global power problem and to play our part in solving it.

 

 

Each Buffalito sold will help support our work providing power to the 1 Billion people worldwide who lack reliable access to grid power. This helps to transform lives as people are now able to charge their cell phones so they can stay connected, and light their homes, enabling them to work and read late into the night.

 

 

Charge the Buffalito and in just 50 minutes and it provides enough power to completely refill a smartphone battery, while still working as a light for hours.

 

 

BuffaloGrid’s mission is to remove internet adoption barriers by providing free power to charge mobile devices and digital services to connect the Next Billion.

 

 

The Buffalito is designed to act as a portable and cost-effective way for millions of people to transport and store electricity. It was created to compliment our solar-powered BuffaloGrid Hub. The Hub is a solar-powered charging station designed to sit in the centre of a village in a shop or public building where people can charge multiple phones and power banks at once.

 

 

 

TechCrunch: "...while smartphones put the internet in everybody’s pocket, without a way to keep our phones powered, connectivity and its utility is limited." 

The Guardian: "Since 2010, BuffaloGrid has been working to bring cheap electricity to rural communities in Uganda, where 80% of the population owns mobile phones but only 5% has access to power."

 

 

 

The Buffalito packs a LOT of features into its small size. Whether living in a busy, modern city, or in a rural village, the Buffalito has a use for you!

 

 

Power bank with a rugged design and 5v of output so you can charge even the most power-intensive phones.

 

 

At 160 lumens, your Buffalito will work great as a bike light. And lasts for 4 hours  even after charging your phone!

 

 

Integrated light with 3 different brightness settings.

 

 

A range of accessories allow the Buffalito to be used for multiple purposes, including:

- Bike light

- Reading lamp 

- Portable power bank

 

 

At 20 lumens, the Buffalito lasts even longer and makes the ideal reading light with 36 hours of power.

 

 

Even the packaging serves a dual purpose. We’ve joined forces with Japan’s N&R Foldings to make sure the Buffalito box won’t end up in a landfill because it folds into a simple but beautiful lamp.

 

Features Overview:

•Front LED array 

•Universal mounting system for attaching a range of custom accessories. 

•1x USB-C port for charging 

•1x front button for on/off function and switching between modes. 

•2900mah battery 

 

 

This lack of power has consequences. It creates disconnected communities, unable to keep in touch with friends and family, or access information online.

 

 

Globally, there's a growing digital, social & economic divide, which is aggravated by limited connectivity and infrastructure. Almost half the population of the planet have never experienced the internet and one of the main barriers for internet adoption is reliable access to power. There are billions of overlooked consumers, who with access to mobile digital services could improve their quality of life and business activities.

 

 

For each Buffalito sold, you're helping provide education, empowerment, economic development and growth that changes lives. 

 

 

Wherever you are in the world, anyone can benefit from the Buffalito. For those living in rural India you can refill the power from any of our BuffaloGrid hubs. Never worry about running out of power. Charge your phone on the go and use your light to read, work or commute.

 

 

BuffaloGrid is a company on a mission to bring power and connect the next billion. We’ve spent the last 8 years working across India and Sub Saharan Africa to remove the barriers that millions of people face in getting online. 

 

 

Last year BuffaloGrid partnered with Airtel one of India’s biggest mobile network operators to bring solar energy and internet to thousands of people in off-grid communities across Uttar Pradesh.

 

 

We are backed by Microsoft and by some of the most reputable Venture Capital funds in Europe. We were incubated at the Royal College of Art Incubator (Innovation RCA).

 

 

Our products enable frontier-market smartphone owners to use their devices more often and to use them for more. We’re committed to promoting sustainable development through connectivity.

 

 

 

BuffaloGrid was founded by Daniel Becerra, a design entrepreneur, and Phil Schluter, a coffee trader. Phil's company had been buying coffee from rural communities in nations across Africa for more than 155 years. He witnessed how coffee farmers had to travel for up to 2.5 hours to charge their phones for vital information to trade, sometimes already having travelled for days to get to market.

Having identified a real need, and utilizing Daniel's experience in award-winning energy design, Phil and Daniel set out to create a highly scalable product and service that will impact the lives of millions.

This is how the Mighty-H was born. A solar-powered charging Hub, capable of charging ten phones per hour. Also, the Mighty-H comes pre-loaded with 1TB of content which allows consistent streaming and digital content access in areas with limited mobile network reception and no fiber optics or wired internet. 

 

 

The Buffalito is the natural extension of this mission, and provides a portable way to add additional hours of power and light to the over one billion people living without access to grid power. 
 

 

Our services offer to our frontier users the following:

  •  Free Power - 5V outputs where users can charge phones and other devices.
     
  •  Hubs provide a feedback loop that allows for anonymized data analytics and market insights.
  •  Mobile network-enabled hardware that provides consistent streaming of digital content in areas with limited mobile network reception or no wired internet.
     
  •  Hubs are pre-loaded with pre-selected content that updates regularly over mobile networks.

 

 

 

Daniel Becerra, Founder and CEO

Daniel is the Founder and CEO of BuffaloGrid, a company bringing mobile power and internet connectivity to the next billion users across frontier markets. Backed by Microsoft, Local Globe, ADV, Hardware Club, Seedcamp and Kima Ventures. BuffaloGrid has proven its technology and business model, and it is scaling globally.

His work has reached four continents and the International Space Station, winning him several awards and getting a few granted and pending patents. He specializes in taking projects from concept through to production.

Daniel holds an MA in Innovation Design Engineering from the Royal College of Art and a MSc from Imperial College London. He previously founded eco-friendly air conditioning company, Artica Technologies, which went on to be acquired by VKR Holdings in a successful exit.

 

Chris Hibberd, CIO - Chief Innovation Officer

Chris Hibberd is a research scientist and engineer with a background in instrumentation and software development. He has a master's in physics and a PhD in Engineering from the Centre for Renewable Energy Systems Technology. His work has been published in peer reviewed journals and presented at international conferences. He is joining BuffaloGrid from his position as the Senior Machine Learning Researcher at an award-winning software start-up based in London and Belfast. In this role he has had responsibility for designing, building and deploying cloud-based software products. He has worked in the R&D team of the New York Stock Exchange’s technology division and for a Northern Irish manufacturer of advanced instrumentation for the power distribution industry.

 

Andrew McCaughan, CTO - Chief Technology Officer

Andrew has over 15 years’ experience leading the technology and strategy for software products and cloud transformation projects. Prior to joining BuffaloGrid, he has served as a Software Architect and Technical Leader in the healthcare and utility markets, as well as the public sector. Andrew has also been responsible for advocating Software Engineering best practices and has been involved in coaching and mentoring Junior and Senior Software Engineers.

 

Andy Wei - Manufacturer Manager

Andy Wei is a hardware enthusiast with 12 plus years of experience working at Foxconn ranging from large customers such as Dell Computers to small startups like Ring and Nucleus. With deep insights for manufacturing from the factory end, Andy understands the in and outs of hardware design and manufacturing and how to avoid the pitfalls many companies run into.

 

Vanessa Arelle - Head of Partnerships

Vanessa was the Founder & CEO of TZ Systems, a tech company focused on diversity, inclusivity, equality and wellbeing. She worked for 4 years as Head of Cultural Affairs at the Mexican Embassy in the UK. Vanessa speaks actively in different forums about the impact digitalization has on youths’ personal and emotional development and has been actively involved in numerous philanthropic, fundraising, and social development projects.

 

Rose Kane Quinn

Rose has joined BuffaloGrid as the Lead Front End Engineer. She has 5 years experience in software development and holds an MSc in Software Development and a BA in 3D design from University of the Arts, London; she combines her design skills with her engineering capabilities. She led a team to win the Department of Finance Open Data NI challenge in 2017, developing a game to help GCSE and A-Level students learn SQL; she was awarded the BCS NI Young IT professional of the Year in the same year.

 

Michael Oliver, Software Engineer

Michael is a Software Engineer at BuffaloGrid. He is a recent graduate in Computer Science from Ulster University. Previously, he has worked as an intern in the financial markets adding value to teams by adopting automation where possible. In BuffaloGrid, Michael's primary role is a back-end software engineer building and maintaining APIs that make up the BuffaloGrid platform. In addition to this, Michael contributes to the team on architectural and technical decisions, and insights into user experience.

 

Sam Golden, Marketing Manager

A trained journalist with 8 years of experience working in brand strategy, public relations, management and marketing for technology companies across Europe and the US.

Sam has developed award-winning communication strategies for both fast-growing startups and global tech brands including Avast, Unbabel, Pleo, GoCardless and Google where he helped launch the companies first European analyst relations programme.

 

 

 

 

 

Due to the uncertainty brought about by Covid-19, the shipping dates are estimates. If manufacturing facilities are impacted by lockdown rules then the Buffalito might take ever so slightly longer to get made and shipped. However, we have been in business since 2008 and have a long standing relationships with manufacturers, and track record of delivering high-quality electronic products on time. We do not expect any difficulties.

 

Environmental commitments

The packaging serves a dual purpose. We’ve joined forces with Japan’s N&R Foldings to make sure the Buffalito box won’t end up in a landfill because it folds into a simple but beautiful lamp.

Our Buffalitos can be recharged at our solar-powered BuffaloGrid Hubs. This results in an ecosystem of renewable, rechargeable power.

story:
Aria is a Hybrid Air Purifier system that detects and eliminates 99% of all indoor air pollutants while blending in the zen of your home.

 

 

 

We were inspired by NASA's report about the natural power of a plant's roots, so using our own knowledge, we developed exclusive patent-pending hybrid technology for air purification. 

 

 

Meet Aria.

 

 

 

Aria is a Hybrid Air Purifier because it features classical mechanical air purifier tech that works in tandem with the plant's natural filtering abilities to fight pollution, disease, and toxins.


 

 

 

Aria will use multiple intelligent sensors to continuously monitor your environment. Information such as temperature, air humidity, air pollution, and graphs with history reports will be sent to your smartphone app.

 

Aria displays your air quality right on the touchpad display.

 

 

 

The plant library gives you easy instructions on how to set up and care for your plants.

 

 

The app showcases plant ratings, the differences between each plant, and which one is best for combating specific viruses, bacteria, and pollution, just to name a few. 

 

(Buy your plant wherever plants are sold)
 

 

 

Traditional purifiers have a standard approach to their design which can make it look like having a distracting clunky machine in your living room.

 

Aria’s design approach is simple and clean. Highlighting the plant’s beauty so it blends in with the design of your space.

 

 

 

(Also included are the Inner plant pot, water reservoir, water stick, water rope)

Two years ago, we opened a new chapter in the history of Mateko as we launched a new product strategy. We strongly believe that only the company’s R&D and manufacturing of our products is the path to the future.

 

 

Today we are proud to present our new development and a new category in the sector of air-purifying: “Aria” the Hybrid Air Purifier. Aria is the air-purifier that unites classic (mechanical) parts with the power of the plant (phytoremediation).

 

 

 

 

 

Return policy. Indiegogo is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at hello@ariabymateko.com

Shipping. We are happy to offer to ship worldwide. Once the campaign is over, you will receive an email from us collecting your address to calculate the shipping rate. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation.

__

Risk and Challenges

Mateko has worked extremely hard to get Aria ready for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on-site during production.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. This is why we partnered with EasyShip who are experts at delivery to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

story:
Power When You Need It

Within 4 Hours In a Blackout Food Starts To Turn. With a Sparkbox 3000 You Will Have Up To 53 Hours To keep Your Refrigerator Cool & Fresh.

The Sparkbox 3000 has zero emissions, eco-friendly and safe to use indoors!
story_txt: Power When You Need ItWithin 4 Hours In a Blackout Food Starts To Turn. With a Sparkbox 3000 You Will Have Up To 53 Hours To keep Your Refrigerator Cool & Fresh.The Sparkbox 3000 has zero emissions, eco-friendly and safe to use indoors!

story:
Intro

Hi There, my name is Alex Gradea. I am the funder of 3D-Brothers and Deep Cycle Power. We are a team of engineers from Romania, and we started focusing our efforts on projects that are related to energy storage and recycling for almost two years now.

Earlier this year, we did a funding project on Indiegogo for our first product, that’s called The Megacell Charger. With the help of the DIY community, it was a success. Thank you for all the support and patience to all the contributors!

There have been some challenges to pull this off, but we managed to handle them in the end. The first batch has been shipped already to the backers.

 

SBMS40 - How the idea started

While working on the Megacell Charger project, I’ve connected with some people with similar interests. One of them is Jehu Garcia. In one of the discussions, I’ve learned the fact that he liked a certain BMS a lot, but it was hard to order due to the slow manufacturing process.

I’ve checked out the datasheet of the BMS, some videos, and indeed, it looked like an exciting project.

The name of the project is Electrodacus SBMS. I’ve written Dacian an email to see if we can help him in any way to produce more of these to cover the high demand.

He explained to me that the process of building his device the way is designed is not something that’s easy to reproduce in the factory and that it will have to be redesigned for mass manufacturing. He mentioned that it would take too much of his time to do it, and he was not interested.

I’ve talked with my colleague Mihai that also designed the Megacell Charger circuit, if we could take care of this part, obtaining a working prototype of the new design and make sure that everything works fine.

He was confident that’s doable and got to work.

I’ve asked Dacian if we have his permission to reproduce his device and use the software in exchange for a fee that we pay him per item sold. He pointed to me that the project is open source, and everyone could do it. Still, I considered that would’ve not been fair, the software took hundreds or even thousands of hours to create and polish to make sure it works 100% of the time, and there is significant work on designing the hardware as well.

He wasn’t very sure that we can even do it, saying that two other companies tried in the past with no success, not having the right engineers to redesign the board and to test it properly. Still, he accepted my proposal, and we had his blessing to continue redesigning his product.

Within a few weeks, the new design was ready, we got the prototype board, and soldered all the parts by hand as usual. There were some issues to fix. Once that was done, we ordered the first small batch of 20 SBMS’ses at the factory to establish the workflow and fine-tune the pricing.

Click on the image to download the Datasheet

Features & Benefits - SBMS40

What’s nice about the SBMS40 is that you can connect it directly to solar panels, battery, and to a load that’s up to 40 Amps at 24 Volts.

You also have the option of connecting relays or big contactors for both the load and the charging ports. Here’s the setup we did using 90 Amps DC Solid State Relays.

- Supports 3 to 8 cells - LiFePo4, LiCoO2, Li4Ti5O12, Capacitors 2.3V, 2,5V,  2.7V 
- Battery voltage limits 8V to 32V
- Max PV Open Circuit voltage - 47V
- Max PV Current 40A
- Load + overcurrent limit 40A
- Cell balancing current max 200mA
- Onboard (PCB mounted) temperature sensor 
- Battery temperature probe (10k termistor) - Optional
- 16 pin connector : Includes Ext IO, 16bit ADC
- 8 pin connector : external shunt bidirectional + 2 x 700 mA SSR
- Data logging to internal Flash Memory - 128Mbit, 2 minute interval for one year of data
- WiFi - used for remote monitoring as Access Point
- Display - 2.2" Color LCD 320x 240
- Weight - 200g
- Dimensions - 127mm x 80mm x 18mm

 

Features & Benefits  - SBMS0

For those that are not interested in the onboard charging and discharging MOSFETs, we also made available a version that’s the equivalent of SBMS0. This option comes in at a lower price, and you will need to use Relays such as SSR or contactors to control your charging and the load.

SBMS0 is the low cost version of this hardware, that does not include the power electronics (built in current shunt, ideal diode, power mosfets and WiFi module).

It has all other functions like full BMS functionality:

- Supports 3 to 8 cells - LiFePo4, LiCoO2, Li4Ti5O12, Capacitors 2.3V, 2,5V,  2.7V 
- Battery voltage limits 8V to 32V
- Cell balancing current max 200mA
- Onboard (PCB mounted) temperature sensor 
- Battery temperature probe (10k termistor) - Optional
- 16 pin connector : Includes Ext IO, 16bit ADC
- 10 pin connector : external shunt bidirectional + 2 x 700 mA SSR + PV shunt
- Data logging to internal Flash Memory - 128Mbit, 2 minute interval for one year of data
- Display - 2.2" Color LCD 320x 240
- Weight - 200g
- Dimensions - 127mm x 80mm x 18mm
- Supports external shunt up to 500A same as SBMS40
- Has EXT IO3 and EXT IO4 for remote On/Off an inverter or a charger

SBMS0 can be used with Victron Multiplus inverter/charger.

It can be also used with external DC SSR (solid state relay) to add PV panel charging capability to the SBMS0, getting same functionality as the SBMS40, this makes it very flexible and cost effective.

Data can be also accessed over serial port (UART) if you want to interface with Raspberry Pi or other computing devices

 

Headless SBMS

Both SBMS0 and SBMS40 are fantastic for big setups, and the price makes sense. But for smaller arrangements or Lead replacement packs, the cost can be a problem. For this reason, we got one step further and designed the Headless SBMS.  In this version, we separated the display and the programming part from the actual BMS which handles the cells. This way, you can have multiple BMS’es that you program before installing, then they work as standalone units.

We have this prototype board that we can show right now. The PCB’s are in the making, but we tested, and everything works great.

Features of the Headless SBMS

The headless version will have similar features with the SBMS0, only that the programing part and monitoring can be detached.

- Supports 3 to 8 cells - LiFePo4, LiCoO2, Li4Ti5O12, Capacitors 2.3V, 2,5V,  2.7V 
- Battery voltage limits 8V to 32V
- Cell balancing current max 200mA
- Battery temperature probe (10k termistor) - Optional
- 4 pin connector : 2 x 700 mA SSR
- Display - 2.2" Color LCD 320x 240 (Only for programming)
- Weight - 50g

The Headless SBMS that has been designed to run without a display and other IC’s used while programming and monitoring. This is great to use with your simpler packs. You get three BMS’es and one programming board for the price of $147 on this crowdfunding campaign. After that, the price goes to $177 for this pack.

You connect the programming board, write the parameters of your pack, the number of cells, cell type, voltage cutoffs, then that gets saved on the BMS flash, so next time it boots, it will load those settings.

SBMS Costs

SBMS40 - Original Price $189, Redesigned price $167 - on this campaign only
SBMS0 - Original Price $120, Redesigned price $97 - this campaign only
Headless SBMS - $147 per pack (3 BMS'ses + 1 programming board)

 

 

 

Other Projects that we worked on

 

The Bluetooth Battery Monitor

Another device that Jehu suggested was a Battery monitor device for his car that has around 90 cells. We thought about an affordable solution and came up with a Bluetooth and Ant+ module that displays the voltage for eight cells. The beautiful part is that these modules can connect and form a pack in the phone app. The application is at a prototype stage right now and offers only basic functionality, but it works.

If there will be more than 200 items sold for this device, we plan on extending the app and offer more functionalities, like automation, alarms, and central monitoring software for raspberry pi or similar device.

I think the functionalities are endless for this small Bluetooth device. Here are some examples of how we used it to monitor different types of packs.

The price of this module is $18, and you can get a great deal if you buy 10 for $150.

 

You will find the link on the right side of the page for the single unit, the pack of 10, or the mega bundle that will include all the devices.

 

Laptop Battery Reader

Another project that we thought it’s helpful when it comes to recovering cells from laptop batteries is a small device that can connect to batteries and display the info from the BMS.

You can see information such as:

  • Cycle count
  • Manufacturer
  • Manufacturing date
  • Voltage per cell

There is other info that we display, but these are the most important ones. You spend a few seconds scanning the pack, and then you can decide if it’s worth opening or if it’s dead.

Some other packs can be recovered if they are low on cycle count, and it needs just charging.

People from the DIY community have requested such a device. I’ve received posts and messages pointing to a tool called PRO Laptop Battery Analyzer. It’s a great device, especially if you want to recover the laptop batteries. But I considered the price is too much to pay for those who need it for sorting the batteries by cell voltage and cycle count before ripping them apart.


How much laptop battery reader cost?

We made a version with these minimal features and set the price to just $17 for this crowdfunding.

To get a better deal, you can purchase the pack of 3 devices for the price of $44.

 

Pro Laptop Battery Analyzer

Now, let me introduce the last but not least, device that we wanted to include in this presentation. I’ve discovered that the PRO Laptop Battery Analyzer is made in Romania as well; I’ve got in touch with the Creators and paid them a visit in their City called Iasi. Nicusor, who started the project, spent a couple of years improving this device and the software, testing with hundreds of laptop batteries, and analyzing the right algorithms of the IC’s to turn them on and perform smart battery checks and resets.

This tool is perfect for the enthusiasts and the pros that want to do more than checking the batteries. The software and the hardware has some great functionalities for charging and measuring the capacity of the laptop battery without disassembling it.

I’ve discussed with Nicusor about getting an excellent deal for you on this pre-order run. He usually sells the device for $239 directly from stock. But because this is a pre-order and you agree that it will take a couple of weeks for the items to be produced and shipped, he decided to lower the price to $199.

To make the deal even sweeter, he will include for free two new addons that he worked on for the past months. The first important feature is the pinout display of over 500 batteries based on battery serial number. This will make connections for diagnosis and repair straightforward. The second feature is the ability to reset BQ8030 chips with Sanyo Firmware. These two options are not available on his website yet, and you will be the first to get it for free. In the future, he plans on charging extra.

Having all these features makes the Pro Laptop Battery Analyzer a complete tool. There’s no other tool on the market that can do all these in one package. Plus, Nicusor is working on adding support for even more chips.

If you have access to cheap laptop batteries, this is a tool that should sit on your workbench. It’s like the magnifying glass for the jewelers, so you know if you have a gold nugget or is just dirt.

You can secure your order on the Indiegogo campaign page right now. Select the product or the products you want, enter the payment details, and you’re all set.

The best part of using this platform is that if you change your mind, or you have a feeling that something is wrong about this campaign, you can request a refund. You will receive the money instantly in your bank account.

Please feel assured that we will do our best to deliver the promises we make. We’ve worked hard on getting the Megacell Charger produced, and we want now to complete the circle by offering other devices that will help you thrive in your power storage business that grows every day.

That’s all I wanted to say in this video. If you have questions, don’t hesitate to reach me at alex@deepcyclepower.com.

I wish you all the best, and thanks for watching this video presentation!

Alex

IntroHi There, my name is Alex Gradea. I am the funder of 3D-Brothers and Deep Cycle Power. We are a team of engineers from Romania, and we started focusing our efforts on projects that are related to energy storage and recycling for almost two years now.Earlier this year, we did a funding project on Indiegogo for our first product, that’s called The Megacell Charger. With the help of the DIY community, it was a success. Thank you for all the support and patience to all the contributors!There have been some challenges to pull this off, but we managed to handle them in the end. The first batch has been shipped already to the backers. SBMS40 - How the idea startedWhile working on the Megacell Charger project, I’ve connected with some people with similar interests. One of them is Jehu Garcia. In one of the discussions, I’ve learned the fact that he liked a certain BMS a lot, but it was hard to order due to the slow manufacturing process.I’ve checked out the datasheet of the BMS, some videos, and indeed, it looked like an exciting project.The name of the project is Electrodacus SBMS. I’ve written Dacian an email to see if we can help him in any way to produce more of these to cover the high demand.He explained to me that the process of building his device the way is designed is not something that’s easy to reproduce in the factory and that it will have to be redesigned for mass manufacturing. He mentioned that it would take too much of his time to do it, and he was not interested.I’ve talked with my colleague Mihai that also designed the Megacell Charger circuit, if we could take care of this part, obtaining a working prototype of the new design and make sure that everything works fine.He was confident that’s doable and got to work.I’ve asked Dacian if we have his permission to reproduce his device and use the software in exchange for a fee that we pay him per item sold. He pointed to me that the project is open source, and everyone could do it. Still, I considered that would’ve not been fair, the software took hundreds or even thousands of hours to create and polish to make sure it works 100% of the time, and there is significant work on designing the hardware as well.He wasn’t very sure that we can even do it, saying that two other companies tried in the past with no success, not having the right engineers to redesign the board and to test it properly. Still, he accepted my proposal, and we had his blessing to continue redesigning his product.Within a few weeks, the new design was ready, we got the prototype board, and soldered all the parts by hand as usual. story:
One Kind Block

World's 1st LEGO-like hydroponic system to grow cities greener and kinder

We need to be sustainable. Covid has shown us how much we take for granted, and how important it is to grow our own food.

99% of apartments aren't designed for urban farming, that's the problem to solve. That number isn't going to change anytime soon.

That's why we created the One Kind Block.

 

Grow your block greener

The One Kind Block is the world's first modular hydroponic system that adapts to any apartment. It what IKEA and LEGO would have designed.

 

You can hang it anywhere there's sunlight, on windows, grills, balconies, gates and walls. 

Configure anyway you like. Add as many blocks as you need. Grow herbs, vegetables or flowers. 

OKB doesn't block up your corridors, so don't worry your neighbors won't complain.

 

Oh, did we forget to mention? The One Kind Block is completely sealed to keep mosquitoes from breeding.

 

So I can grow anywhere. How much can I grow?

Well, we've calculated that a 1x1m wall with 15 OKBs can produce up to 3kg of vegetables a month. That’s enough fibre for 2 for 5 days.

The One Kind Block offers food independence at a very affordable price. 

 

How does the One Kind Block work?

Well, the One Kind Block really is a plug & play urban farming system. It's simple! Just attach each block to your designated green areas, into whatever configuration you like.

It uses the Kratky method which is easy for beginners to pick up. Experienced farmers can hack it by adding solar powered pumps and grow lights.

For windows and grills, use the zipties supplied in your One Kind Block set. For walls, you can use adhesive wall hooks (that support 3-5kg), nails or just plain adhesive tape.

 

Each set comes with three 9x9x18 cm blocks, 2 end caps, 6 cups and sponges, and 6 durable zipties. That's all you need to get started!

All the blocks are connected, so all you have to do is fill up one to fill up the rest. It's that simple.

 

Make your block kinder

Research shows farming slows down dementia and lowers depression in the elderly, distressed adults and reconnects the young to nature.

We need to be less unkind to nature and to each other. So part of the funding will go to supporting the elderly and lower income individuals in Singapore. 

We've prototyped an ecosystem where instead of collecting 100kg of cardboard a day for $4, the seniors can grow seedlings to sell. That gets them out of the hot sun and rain.

We want to train our seniors as neighborhood block farmers to look after other people's One Kind Blocks in their housing estates, in exchange for a monthly fee. Imagine uncle Tan as your friendly neighborhood block farmer.

 

We've met parties and organizations that can make this happen. We will share our learnings with the world. Heck, we'll share our blueprints and designs to scale up this up even faster!

 

Some articles about us

The Rising
https://therising.co/2020/06/02/dylan-soh-17-ye...

Straits times
https://www.straitstimes.com/lifestyle/home-des...

DBCS Design for good (Design Business Council Singapore)
https://designforgood.dbcsingapore.org/2020/04/...

The Pride
https://pride.kindness.sg/unconventional-family...

Surge
https://www.surge.news/2020/05/20/one-kind-bloc...

 

So, please support the One Kind Block and help us grow cities greener and kinder.

story:
Charge all your devices at the same time with 20,400mAh of portable, supercharging power. Swap out batteries to instantly double your capacity to 40,800mAh* of travel-approved charge in seconds. That means you can charge up to 2x MacBook Pro 13” with one portable pack!

Morph has all the ports and outlets you need in a power bank — including dual USB-C PD ports, dual QC 3.0 USB-A ports, Qi Wireless Charging, and even an AC Outlet!

Morph can be fully recharged in an amazing 1.5 hours! It also features a USB-C PD enabled pass-through charging system, so you can supercharge it while it supercharges your laptop, phone, or any device.

 

Morph uses a proprietary modular battery system that lets you easily swap batteries for a fresh charge without removing any connections. This system gives you virtually unlimited power and allows you to recharge Morph in seconds, rather than hours.

Swap batteries to instantly recharge Morph — essentially doubling the charging capacity from 20,400mah to 40,800mah in seconds!

 

Plus, the swappable modular system allows you to easily replace a used up or depleted battery without getting an entirely new power bank. This significantly reduces e-waste and helps you save money and save the environment.

 

Intelligently power all your devices simultaneously. Morph has all the ports you need to charge nearly any device.

Dual Power-Delivery (PD) USB-C output ports can supercharge any PD enabled device. One port provides a whopping 100W output. That’s almost double the leading competitor!

The 100W USB-C Power Delivery (PD) port charges your devices superfast. In fact, with 100W of power delivery, you can charge up your 15” MacBook Pro 2018 from 0-80% in 1.5 hours and your iPhone X from 0-50% in 30 minutes!

The other port provides an impressive 60W output, which is still significantly faster when compared to other power banks. An additional 100W USB-C input port lets you supercharge Morph while you charge your MacBook Pro or other PD-charged devices with passthrough charging.


Free yourself from the wall. With Morph’s 100W AC Outlet, you can charge virtually any device, including your laptop and camera batteries, anywhere. The outlet provides 100W of power with a US standard voltage of 120V at 60Hz frequency. Morph's international version will support an international compatible AC port (230v 50Hz)


Charge cable-free. Morph supports Qi Wireless charging — allowing you to power all your Qi-enabled devices completely wirelessly. Simply place your device on the wireless charging surface on Morph for a 10W or 7.5W (for Apple devices) output charge.


Morph uses Qualcomm’s Quick Charge 3.0 to provide a powerful 24W charge through each of its two USB-A Ports. Get a fast, powerful charge to any USB powered device and through any standard USB cable.

 

The universal barrel DC port and USB-C PD accept up to 100W and can recharge Morph in under 1.5 hours. With the right adapter, Morph can be recharged from nearly any source. 

Morph can be charged with a solar panel —  allowing you to power your devices anywhere. With the right panel, you can recharge Morph in as little 2 hours!

 

Morph isn’t just fast & powerful — it’s smart. With built-in intelligent battery management technology and other features, you’ll be able to optimize your charging capacity to suit your needs.

Pass-through charging means you can charge your devices as you charge Morph. Morph takes it even further by enabling USB-C PD supercharging with pass through. This means you can enjoy high-speed 100W charging speeds to your laptop, phone, and Morph simultaneously.


Ever have your phone die at the most inconvenient time? Don’t worry! Morph can reserve a part of its battery capacity for emergencies. Save a small charge for any smartphone charging emergency and never be caught with a dead phone again.


Morph’s OLED screen gives you the charge status, power consumption rate, battery charging time, port status, fault alerts, battery temperature and more. Know exactly how much power you have left and how long it will last.

 

With 100W input and pass-through technology, Morph can be used with or without a battery as a universal charging station or power strip for your desk or bed. With all the ports you will need, Morph can be your one device to charge all your devices.

Morph was constructed using high-quality materials — offering superior protection against Mother Nature. A polycarbonate shell offers shock protection against drops.

 

Need more juice? Get additional swappable battery packs to double, triple, or quadruple your charging capacity in an instant. Whether you need extra power in a remote campsite or can’t find an open outlet at a coffee shop — the extra pack will cover your back!

Hate carrying multiple Type-C adaptors? You can get the optional Apple Data Hub for Morph. The hub quickly and easily clips onto Morph and is completely integrated with an Apple Watch magnetic charger, Airpods charging dock and all the data ports you need.

Get 4K HDMI connection, SD/TF Card slots, and data transfers on USB 3.0, USB Type-C, and Thunderbolt up to 40gbps. No more sorting through adapters — you’ll have all your data and power needs from a single adapter!

Charge all your Apple devices simultaneously and connect all your data accessories in one powerful package. Morph can be your universal Apple charging hub.

Get 4K HDMI connection, SD/TF Card slots, and data transfers on USB 3.0, USB Type-C, and Thunderbolt up to 40gbps. No more sorting through adapters — you’ll have all your data and power needs from a single adapter!

Morph's hard case ensures that the Morph charging station stays protected from dents and scratches. 

Morph's dual battery charging hub allows you to charge spare modular batteries without the Morph power bank. The hub is capable of fully charging up to two Morph batteries simultaneously within 3 hours, to ensure that Morph is always ready for emergencies and instant modular recharge.

Charge faster, smarter and longer than ever before, and do it for ALL your devices at the same time. Morph is everything a power bank should be, and it’s incredibly affordable.

Morph your charging game and experience fast, dependable, smart power for any device, anywhere. It’s morphin’ time!

 

 

Laptops, smartphones, and other gadgets are crucial cogs of our lives today. A power source is key to ensure these devices are charged are running smoothly. Finding power outlets at airports or coffee shops is challenging or impossible when on a trek or at the beach. Existing power banks are not designed to power all your gadgets, not powerful enough to charge multiple devices simultaneously and lack sufficient capacity for long trips. Work or fun, we did not want to be disconnected by dead devices anywhere, anytime.

We set out to build Morph as a solution — a universal power bank that can charge all your gadgets, from smartphones to laptops and even low powered AC devices. Our mission at morph is to empower you in doing what you love without having to worry about charging. The future is electric, and our goal is to build an energy ecosystem that lets you live without limits — with Morph powering all your devices and gadgets, big or small.
story_txt: Charge all your devices at the same time with 20,400mAh of portable, supercharging power. Swap out batteries to instantly double your capacity to 40,800mAh* of travel-approved charge in seconds. That means you can charge up to 2x MacBook Pro 13” with one portable pack!Morph has all the ports and outlets you need in a power bank — including dual USB-C PD ports, dual QC 3.0 USB-A ports, Qi Wireless Charging, and even an AC Outlet!Morph can be fully recharged in an amazing 1.5 hours! It also features a USB-C PD enabled pass-through charging system, so you can supercharge it while it supercharges your laptop, phone, or any device. Morph uses a proprietary modular battery system that lets you easily swap batteries for a fresh charge without removing any connections. This system gives you virtually unlimited power and allows you to recharge Morph in seconds, rather than hours.Swap batteries to instantly recharge Morph — essentially doubling the charging capacity from 20,400mah to 40,800mah in seconds! Plus, the swappable modular system allows you to easily replace a used up or depleted battery without getting an entirely new power bank. This significantly reduces e-waste and helps you save money and save the environment. Intelligently power all your devices simultaneously. Morph has all the ports you need to charge nearly any device.Dual Power-Delivery (PD) USB-C output ports can supercharge any PD enabled device. One port provides a whopping 100W output. That’s almost double the leading competitor!The 100W USB-C Power Delivery (PD) port charges your devices superfast. In fact, with 100W of power delivery, you can charge up your 15” MacBook Pro 2018 from 0-80% in 1.5 hours and your iPhone X from 0-50% in 30 minutes!The other port provides an impressive 60W output, which is still significantly faster when compared to other power banks. An additional 100W USB-C input port lets you supercharge Morph while you charge your MacBook Pro or other PD-charged devices with passthrough charging.Free yourself from the wall. With Morph’s 100W AC Outlet, you can charge virtually any device, including your laptop and camera batteries, anywhere. The outlet provides 100W of power with a US standard voltage of 120V at 60Hz frequency. Morph's international version will support an international compatible AC port (230v 50Hz)Charge cable-free. Morph supports Qi Wireless charging — allowing you to power all your Qi-enabled devices completely wirelessly. Simply place your device on the wireless charging surface on Morph for a 10W or 7.5W (for Apple devices) output charge.Morph uses Qualcomm’s Quick Charge 3.0 to provide a powerful 24W charge through each of its two USB-A Ports. Get a fast, powerful charge to any USB powered device and through any standard USB cable. The universal barrel DC port and USB-C PD accept up to 100W and can recharge Morph in under 1.5 hours. With the right adapter, Morph can be recharged from nearly any source. Morph can be charged with a solar panel —  allowing you to power your devices anywhere. With the right panel, you can recharge Morph in as little 2 hours! Morph isn’t just fast & powerful — it’s smart. With built-in intelligent battery management technology and other features, you’ll be able to optimize your charging capacity to suit your needs.Pass-through charging means you can charge your devices as you charge Morph. Morph takes it even further by enabling USB-C PD supercharging with pass through. This means you can enjoy high-speed 100W charging speeds to your laptop, phone, and Morph simultaneously.Ever have your phone die at the most inconvenient time? Don’t worry! Morph can reserve a part of its battery capacity for emergencies. Save a small charge for any smartphone charging emergency and never be caught with a dead phone again.Morph’s OLED screen gives you the charge status, power consumption rate, battery charging time, port status, fault alerts, battery temperature and more. Know exactly how much power you have left and how long it will last. With 100W input and pass-through technology, Morph can be used with or without a battery as a universal charging station or power strip for your desk or bed. With all the ports you will need, Morph can be your one device to charge all your devices.Morph was constructed using high-quality materials — offering superior protection against Mother Nature. story:
A Better Way Forward

It's time to put an end to single-use plastics in all their forms. Straws, spoons, forks, knives, whatever. Enough is enough. Society and governments alike are coming to the realization that the vast majority of plastics used on a daily basis are made in such a way that they practically last forever in landfills or--worse yet--in our oceans. We're talking about billions of single-use plastics tossed in the trash on a yearly basis! We have to do better. 

Thankfully, many countries are introducing reforms to curb the production and use of single-use plastics. People are looking for greener alternatives like paper straws, biodegradable plastics, and reusables.  We went to the drawing board to come up with a set of elegant reusables that had to: 1) work really well 2) look really nice and 3) be really compact. The STRO and SPORQ are the result of over a year's worth of tinkering and R&D to that end. 

Our company is Juka Innovations and from day one, we've set out to help solve some of the world's most annoying problems with innovative products. You may have tried our award-winning TubShroom, SinkShroom, and ShowerShroom drain protection products, which can be found in over 6 million homes around the globe. That's potentially millions of gallons of harmful liquid chemicals that people will no longer use to clear their clogged drains. We'd love to help in the fight against single-use plastics with our latest products: the STRO and SPORQ.   

At long last, the straw revolution is upon us. It's no exaggeration to say that billions of plastic straws fill the world's landfills and oceans on an almost yearly basis! The average consumer can use thousands of plastic straws each year. World governments are finally realizing the long-term impact all this waste is having on our environment and on our sea life. Some countries have already banned plastic bags and plastic straws. Even more forward-looking legislation is on the way, thankfully. 

One simple change in daily habits--like using a reusable straw in place of plastic straws--can have a profound impact on our collective global outlook. Our goal with the STRO™ Straw was to create an effective, durable, and easy-to-use stainless steel straw that could discretely attach to your keychain, belt, or bag and be there whenever you drink your favorite soft drink or frozen coffee beverage. We've tried it with cola cans, Starbucks drinks, fast-food cups--you name it. The premium stainless steel tips give you a cool, smooth sip every time. 

The 7.8" tall STRO straw works fabulously well with virtually every can, bottle, or cup we threw at it. It's tall enough to mimic and replace most of the popular plastic straws you find in restaurants today. Next time the cashier or wait staff asks you if you want a straw, you can politely decline because you'll have the smoothest sipping reusable straw already at your side. Paper straws start to wilt within minutes of use. Silicone or rubber straws are flimsy and aren't the most premium way to sip, to be honest. And no one wants to carry around those rigid full-sized stainless steel straws. We're all used to the single-use plastic straws from years of habit, but it's time to collectively move on from those.   

Let's talk about cleaning. No one wants to carry around brushes with them everywhere they go so we built in squeegee style brushes where the straws go so you can more effectively rinse each straw part along with the holder itself under running water whenever you get to a sink. It's a game-changer. We have also gone the extra step of including a mini nylon brush that you can keep at home for a more comprehensive deep cleaning  of all the parts.  The STRO and SPORQ are both made from high-quality, BPA-free materials.  

The STRO straw is ultra compact (about 3"x1.5"x.6" in holder) and looks discrete enough to blend in on any keychain, bag, or belt buckle. It even slides right into your front pocket with ease. You may even forget it's there... until you're ready for a drink, that is! We know there are other reusable straw alternatives out there and we absolutely love that this market is growing because, frankly, it's long overdue. We've found that many other reusable straws are either too bulky to carry around, too flimsy to sip straight, or too aesthetically unappealing. Paper straws are also growing in popularity, which is great, though they turn to mush unless you finish your drink within a few minutes of use. With the STRO straw, we set out to deliver an answer to all these problems.  

Next up, we turned our sights on to single-use throwaway plastic utensils. You know the ones you find at virtually every fast food restaurant or deli. Plastic spoons, forks, knives--you name it. The plastics are built to be sturdy so they don't break while you're eating but the problem with that is that they take forever (almost literally!) to decompose so it's easy to see why plastic utensils are some of the most destructive products in the history of mankind. We have to curb the use and production of single-use plastics before it's too late.  The SPORQ is a compact, convenient solution to this problem.

Just like with the STRO, we wanted the SPORQ to be super durable, compact, and easy to use. What's the use of all that portability if you're not happy with the way it works in daily use? It's got to feel and work better than the plastic alternatives. So we went with high-quality stainless steel. One side is a spoon head and the other is a fork with a serrated edge that doubles as a knife. We even had the room to toss on a bottle opener. You're going to love eating your meals with your SPORQ. The spoon head is smaller than a tablespoon, so it will help you with portion control while you pace yourself. The SPORQ fits comfortably in your handle, from either end. 

It's no exaggeration to say that billions of plastic utensils fill the world's landfills and oceans on an almost yearly basis! World governments are finally realizing the long-term impact all this waste is having on our environment and on our sea life. One simple change in daily habits--like using reusable utensils in place of plastics--can have a profound impact. Our goal with the SPORQ is to create an effective, durable, and easy-to-use stainless steel utensil that could discretely attach to your keychain, belt, or bag. All SPORQ's will include a stainless steel clip for maximum portability and tiny magnets help the unit elegantly snap and hold together. 

We estimate that if you replace your average daily use of plastic utensils and straws with both the SPORQ and STRO, you could potentially save over 25 times(!) the equivalent weight of single-use plastic material over the course of a typical year. Now imagine if millions of people made the switch to reusables like ours. It truly adds up in profound ways. The future can be brighter for us and for our children with a few simple habitual changes. 

You can enjoy a premium eating experience on the go with the SPORQ 4-in-1 reusable spoon, fork, knife, and bottle opener set to help save the planet one meal at a time. It's lightweight and durable, and it's great for virtually all meal types. Soups, salads, cereal, fruits, veggies, yogurt, eggs--you name it. The SPORQ is perfect for camping, on-the-go, at the office, or at any fast food establishment. You owe it to yourself to dine out in style with the SPORQ.  We expect to ship both the SPORQ and the STRO in April 2021 which is just a few short months away.   

In late 2015, Juka Innovations Corporation was started in Glen Cove, NY by Serge Karnegie and Solyman Najimi--two long-time friends. Serge and his wife, Elena, were fed up with their ever-clogging bathtub drains. You see, the couple had two young daughters and multiple pets in their original apartment, so it was no surprise that their drains clogged so often. Serge perfected his original TubShroom design and, along with the help of Solyman, the duo brought it to the masses via a Kickstarter campaign, which turned out to be the launchpad the fledgling company needed to go on to become the leader in eco-friendly drain protection that it is today.

Dear backers,

Some of you have been with us since our very first project launched in 2015, and some of you will join the "Shroom" family for the first time. Regardless, we are very thankful for your support and trust in the quality of our products. Thanks to our early adapters, our original TubShroom was born, eventually becoming the #1 best-seller on Amazon and at many major big box retail stores. We're proud to say that since the launch in 2015, we have helped to protect close to 6 million drains worldwide.

We must say that there were a few bumps on the road. Inventory shortages, shipping delays, intellectual property battles, and more. We have had to learn the ins and outs of plumbing, drainage, and product design. Our team's focus is on producing innovative products that save people money, solve real-world problems, and that look great.

Thank you for taking this journey with us. We promise to do our utmost to continue to provide amazing products and terrific support. Please reach out to us at support@tubshroom.com with any questions you have on our previous products or for any topic you have not seen covered in this campaign.

Sincerely,

Solyman N., Co-Founder
