story:
Your well-aerated, self-watering planter that takes good care of your plants!

 

Diana Joni - Founder & CEO of PlantLazy, a family run business based in UK. Airthi pot is my first product aimed at encouraging everyone to plant more and to bridge the connection between nature and urban life.

Caring for plants is easier said than done, especially when they end up dying due to overwatering or underwatering. So we designed a planter that finds the right balance between aeration and hydration. 

Meet Airthi 

It keeps your plant well-aerated...

so you never have to worry about mold building up in the soil, which means you'll never have to stress out about breathing mold spores.

 

It self-waters your plant...

so you only need to water it once a week instead of daily, which means you will be able to spend more time with your family.

 

It's equipped with deep & separate water drainage...

so your plant will never end up drowning in water, which means you'll spend a LOT less money on replacing dead plants.

It's made from premium thick & sturdy recycled plastic...

so you can easily move it around without ever having to worry about cleaning up the mess.

Never worry about over-watering your plants again

You can either water your plant from the top or from the bottom water reservoir, either way, your plant will stay hydrated for at least a week!

Help us unlock the "see-through water reservoir" stretch goal!

So you won't need to figure out how much water to add, which means less time spent trying to guess if your plant is running dry.

Its bottom water reservoir can easily twist & unlatch...

from the pot so you can easily clean it if it gets dirty!

It's BPA Free & Food Safe...

which means you can grow your fresh produce at home, and you can save our planet from unnecessary single-use plastic packaging.

Many plants are too expensive to tolerate imperfections

In nature, worms, micro-organisms, and insects will take good care of the soil by continuously aerating it as they crawl in and out which allows oxygen to circulate. However, when we grow our plants indoors, it's confined to a pot that suffocates the plant's roots especially when we overwater our plants.

FREE Decorative Eco-friendly Pot

We're ready for production, all our tooling is DONE!

                         

 

Environmental commitments

 

Long-lasting design

Unlike the many cheap and flimsy plastic plant pots available in the market that can break easily and end up in landfills, Airthi is made from a thick and durable food-grade plastic that can last longer and won't crack or break easily. We've also added a UV layer of protection to prevent discoloration or inconsistency when placed under the sun for long periods of time.

Reusability and recyclability

The plastic used is made from 100% recycled PP material that is thick and durable. Even at the end of its life cycle, Airthi can be recycled again and used to make other plastic materials such as carpets, floor mats, etc.

Sustainable materials

We are using 100% recycled plastic when manufacturing our products, and this eliminates many plastics that would have otherwise ended up in our oceans and landfills. Also, the material is durable and cannot break easily, therefore reducing potential waste as a result of damaged goods.

Environmentally friendly factories

We always send someone personally to inspect the factory we're about to work with, they send us a report with many pictures to help us understand if the factory is using proper recycling methods for their byproduct waste. For example, our factory that's based in Dongguan, China is currently recycling all the excess plastic that's the result of defective products coming out of the moulds. These parts are melted and made as pellets which are then reused in injection moulding.

Sustainable Distribution

We plan to ship Airthi by sea to different countries in large batches where they will be warehoused in Amazon FBA warehouse and will be fulfilled by Amazon distribution centers that are efficient and logistically optimized (in our opinion). We believe that shipping by sea is more eco-friendly if you account for the carbon footprint per unit shipped, on the other hand, shipping individually to every backer produces a lot of carbon footprint per unit shipped since each package is individually delivered (mostly by air) to backers.

so you can easily move it around without ever having to worry about cleaning up the mess.Never worry about over-watering your plants againYou can either water your plant from the top or from the bottom water reservoir, either way, your plant will stay hydrated for at least a week!
Help us unlock the "see-through water reservoir" stretch goal!
So you won't need to figure out how much water to add, which means less time spent trying to guess if your plant is running dry.Its bottom water reservoir can easily twist & unlatch...
from the pot so you can easily clean it if it gets dirty!It's BPA Free & Food Safe...
which means you can grow your fresh produce at home, and you can save our planet from unnecessary single-use plastic packaging.Many plants are too expensive to tolerate imperfectionsIn nature, worms, micro-organisms, and insects will take good care of the soil by continuously aerating it as they crawl in and out which allows oxygen to circulate. However, when we grow our plants indoors, it's confined to a pot that suffocates the plant's roots especially when we overwater our plants.FREE Decorative Eco-friendly PotWe're ready for production, all our tooling is DONE!
                          Environmental commitments Long-lasting designUnlike the many cheap and flimsy plastic plant pots available in the market that can break easily and end up in landfills, Airthi is made from a thick and durable food-grade plastic that can last longer and won't crack or break easily. We've also added a UV layer of protection to prevent discoloration or inconsistency when placed under the sun for long periods of time.Reusability and recyclabilityThe plastic used is made from 100% recycled PP material that is thick and durable. Even at the end of its life cycle, Airthi can be recycled again and used to make other plastic materials such as carpets, floor mats, etc.Sustainable materialsWe are using 100% recycled plastic when manufacturing our products, and this eliminates many plastics that would have otherwise ended up in our oceans and landfills. Also, the material is durable and cannot break easily, therefore reducing potential waste as a result of damaged goods.Environmentally friendly factoriesWe always send someone personally to inspect the factory we're about to work with, they send us a report with many pictures to help us understand if the factory is using proper recycling methods for their byproduct waste. For example, our factory that's based in Dongguan, China is currently recycling all the excess plastic that's the result of defective products coming out of the moulds. These parts are melted and made as pellets which are then reused in injection moulding.Sustainable DistributionWe plan to ship Airthi by sea to different countries in large batches where they will be warehoused in Amazon FBA warehouse and will be fulfilled by Amazon distribution centers that are efficient and logistically optimized (in our opinion). We believe that shipping by sea is more eco-friendly if you account for the carbon footprint per unit shipped, on the other hand, shipping individually to every backer produces a lot of carbon footprint per unit shipped since each package is individually delivered (mostly by air) to backers.

1. WHY MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA ARE GAME CHANGERS 
2. WHICH REWARD FITS YOUR BIKE?  
    MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS - WEGA - MAGNIC NIGHT BIKE 
3. LET ANIMATIONS EXPLAIN FUNCTIONS

    BRAKE PAD EXCHANGE - SHIFT MECHANISM - WEGA VISIBILITY
4. HOW CAN YOUR BIKE GLOW AT NIGHT?
    PHOSPHORESCENT WHEELS 
6. FASCINATING TECHNOLOGY & PHYSICS
7. HOW THE FUTURE CAN BE SMART

1. WHY MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA ARE GAME CHANGERS

Cyclists can't escape darkness: It returns every evening and sometimes even at daytime when passing tunnels. Battery lights seem comfortable with quick & easy installation but there will be moments when the batteries are empty while you need them most.
With Magnic Microlights you don't have to fear these moments because you have neverending light :

Benefits of Magnic Microlights:

  • Non Contact : You don't feel or hear them
  • No batteries - Neverending power
  • Strong enough to enlight the road ahead
  • Easy To Install 
  • Cool "invisible" design: Compact size without adapters
  • Environmentally Friendly
  • Works with all bicycle models - WEGA for disc brakes

Don't mix Magnic Microlights with other bicycle lights: NO SPOKE MAGNETS have to be attached for Magnic Microlights, Wega & Magnic Lights!

Magnic Microlights are the world’s smallest non-contact dynamos, that are integrated together with electronics and lighting system in the brake shoes. In 2012 we presented our invention Magnic Light on Kickstarter. Many "experts" did not believe this principle can work and believed our lights would be a fake but the MAGIC is clever usage of well known eddy current technology. With more than 17.000 Magnic lights on the road via our successful Magnic Light IC campaign 2014 and our webshop we have proved that this sustainable, environment-friendly technology has the power to replace battery lights for bicycles. 

The last 18 months we worked hard on the development of the Micro-Technology. With Magnic Microlights you can add non-contact dynamo light to your bicycle without need of extra adapters. If your bicycle has disc brakes choose Wega which has flexibility in four directions and fits to nearly all other bikes (except Vbrake/Canti systems), too.  

2. WHICH REWARD FITS YOUR BIKE?

See the specification here and preorder on the top right of this page.

For all Microlights we offer a Roadbike/ Caliper, a Vbrake and a Cantilever version:

 3. LET ANIMATIONS EXPLAIN FUNCTIONS 

We have tested the current brakeshoe design from May to October, 2018 on roadbikes & mountainbikes with more than 3000 test kilometers. Although the stability of the prototype material (3d printed PLA) did not match that of the final product, there was no  difference in braking performance compared to standard brakes that we otherwise use in training and everyday cycling.


TECHNICAL DATA


Our prototypes are less efficient than the final version because of lower generator power. We have to estimate the power of the final product based on the prototypes and our experience from the current Magnic Light version.


BRAKE LIGHT

Magnic Microlights have an effective brake light function. When you pull the brakes the distance between rim and generator decreases resulting in higher generator power and higher light output. The brake light works precisely and is a clear signal for subsequent traffic.

BEAM ADJUSTMENT

The design of front-& rearlight allows to adjust the light beam regardless of the fork angle. Even for extreme bicycle frame geometry you can adjust the light beam towards the road.

BRAKE RUBBER REPLACEMENT

Worn brake pads can be exchanged easily as you would expect from standard brakes. 

SHIFT MECHANISM

After longer usage your brakepads will loose up to 5mm material before you have to exchange them. The generator performance stongly depends on the rim distance so we have integrated an automatic shift mechanism to keep the distance between generator and rim constant small. An exchangeable shift-element moves the generator away from the rim and prevents grinding of the generator part.

WEGA VISIBILITY
 

4. HOW CAN YOUR BIKE GLOW AT NIGHT?

When we tried to assemble the "perfect" bicycle for this technology we were fascinated by the combination with phosphorescent wheels and decided to offer the Magnic Night Bike as reward, too.

 These are custom made wheels. In addition to the phosphorescent painting these are high quality welded aluminium rims which you only find on upper class roadbikes (like Shimano or Mavic). Even if "normal" rims work good with all Magnic Lights these rims are welded and don't have a magnetic rim joint. 

You can turn the rear while and either us as free-wheel single speed bike or as FIXE with rigid hub.

6. FASCINATING TECHNOLOGY & PHYSICS

The main technology of our lights is based on eddy current induction.

The core part is the world’s smallest contact- and frictionless bicycle dynamo, that is integrated together with the electronic and the lighting system in the brake shoe of a calliper brake. The world-wide patented technic developed by the German company Magnic Innovations is based on  eddy current induction: a magnetic wheel in a generator separated from the bicycle rim by a narrow air gap induces temporary magnetic fields even in non-magnetic aluminium bicycle rims when the bicycle rim is moving. This leads to the magnetic wheel rotating contactlessly as if by magic.

Neither batteries nor external cables, further fittings or spoke-magnets are necessary. Only the brake shoes have to be exchanged for microlight - brake shoes, so that the maintenance only involves the exchange of worn brake pads after thousands of kilometres. The included brake pads are compatible with other standard brake pads of other manufacturers as available in every cycle shop.

Eddy current

The key is so-called eddy current technology : Energy is drawn from the rotating bicycle wheels without any physical contact, and thus without friction. Instead, eddy currents, created by strong magnets, generate electricity to power the lights: When the wheel spins, magnets inside the generator induce eddy currents with corresponding magnetic fields in the wheel, which in turn interact with the magnets in the generator. The resulting electricity will power your lights indefinitely without any environmentally harmful batteries or cumbersome cables.

While the previous larger Magnic Lights were equipped with two LEDs (one for stand light) Magnic Microlights have just one LED which is fed by ultra-high efficient Mosfet rectifiers.

7. HOW THE FUTURE CAN BE SMART

The SMART VERSION presented here can only be realized within the rangeof this project if we reach the stretch goal of 500.000 €.  (In case this amount is reached the reward for the SMART VERSION will be available in the rewards section and you can switch if you like).   
Reason for the high stretch goal: High cost for final development of bluetooth control software & electronics. At the moment we have implemented the main features with prototypes based on the electronic boards and microprocessors of the larger MAGNIC LIGHT IC version.

Turn Signals  

The Smart version comes with a cool novelty : A blink system for turn signals without any additional switches and even without a smartphone. How does it work? If you tap the brake lever the distance between Microlights and rim changes which can be detected in the lights (even without braking). A double-tap is our signal for the blinker: If you double-tap the right brake lever the rear lights detect the signal and via bluetooth to the front lights- so that lights on the right side are blinking. Correspondingly this works on the left side.  

Navigation  

Navigation is similar to the turn signals - but here you are guided and need our Smartphone App for navigation: Lights are controlled by the navigation app and start to blink on the left or right side when you have to turn left/right. Put your smartphone in your bag and let the lights guide your way.  

Speed Data Transmission  

The smart Magnic Microlights are equipped with a Bluetooth LE microcontroller which easily detects the rotation speed of your wheel from the incoming current. Via smartphone or Bluetooth LE compatible speedometer you can receive speed data for display or further processing. This feature replaces Bluetooth LE speed sensors which have the same function but need extra mounting and extra batteries.  

Crash detection with emergency call  

This feature requires some future development and is still theory. In case of a crash generators will stop abruptly. We need some test data but we are confident to be able to detect a crash situation reliably which can be sent to the smartphone in order to make an emergency call.  

Configuraton for Stand light and more  

We will offer different stand light patterns which can be set via Smartphone App. Additionally it will be possible to switch the internal orientation of the lights (for example for correct turn signals if your left and right brake levers deviate from standard installations).

8. HOW WE DO POLITICS: GERMAN STVZO   

Nov. 5th 2018, UPDATE
Concerning German STVZO approval for our new lighting technology some frustrating years are behind us. But we did not give up and we achieved that the highest responsable committees were invloved in new rules for STVZO approval concerning our technology. Today we were informed that our main ideas could influence the new legislation which shall pass the Verkehrsauschuss (Committee of Transport) of the German Bundestag next month. We believe that the German rules are too complex and old fashioned and hopefully our efforts help to go in the right direction. For our systems (Magnic Light IC, and Magnic Microlights) this is good news because we finally can adjust our lights concerning to these rules.
For our technology here are the three most important new rules concerning Magnic Light:  

  • For lighting systems consisting of two separate lights (left & right) the total amount of light needs to exceed the minimum of 10 lux (and not each single light). (Otherwise our lights should have been twice as bright as the required minimum value at 15km/h while they easily do at >25 km/h) 
  • For lens systems the "brightest area" can replace brightest point of the light distribution (which is the measurement point for the light distribution with respect to "anti-blinding" characteristics). The highest point within such an the "brightest area" can be taken as measurement point now which previously gave room for ambiguity. - 
  • The German bicycle light lobby wanted to have a new rule that prohibits dynamos with less than 50% efficiency. Sounds reasonable but measurements for "Micro"-system are very complex (and expensive) because the result can be distorted by air resistance, wheel material, bearings, .. much more than these parameters influence large systems (hub dynamos). We could not stop this new rule but at least we could achieve that is is not necessary to prove efficiency charateristics for micro-dynamos below 1,3 Watts. (Background: The rule shall prevent cyclists from exerting too much effort for their dynamo lights- Consequently we should forbid non-aerodynamic clothin for cyclists in future because this costs much more energy ;.) I want to address this to the German Minister for Environment, Svenja Schulze at the Awards Ceromony for the Bundespreis Ecodesign on Nov. 26th in Berlin.

For a "detailed analysis" of the effort you have to pay for Magnic Microlights see the this video below:

9. WHICH FAMOUS CYCLIST AWARDED MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS?

Innovation Award for Magnic Microlights handed over by 5x Tour de France Champion Eddy Merckx

 

On November 26th  Mmagnic Microlights win the German Federal Ecodesign Award 2018 in Berlin.

10. MEDIA COVERAGE

In September 2017 a German TV team visited us and made this report (only available in German)Media Coverage German TV Report on Magnic Microlight Prototypes In September a German TV team visited us and made this report (only available in German)  

FEATURED ON ...

             
                                                   
 
   
 
 

11. OUR BACKGROUND

Cycling is an important part of our live- not just as a business. Below you see images from "The Making of" video & photo material for this project. Whenever we are cycling Magnic Lights & Magnic Microlights are with us (Cycling to Calais, in Berlin, on straw bales ...)

OUR MISSION

Without lighting, cyclists risk their lives in the dark - but those on the road with battery lights will soon be left in the dark when the journey takes too long or the batteries are no longer full. For those who do not want to mount heavy dynamos, use batteries or lay cables, we've launched two Kickstarter projects with our non-contact Magnic Lights, which feel like battery lighting without having to exchange or change batteries. Magnic Microlights can't be turned off at daylight and we are convinced this makes sense from a safety point of view: With lights on your visibilty increases significantly which means a great deal of safety.

Battery Lights are not the option:

Family team

  • Dirk Strothmann (Management, CAD & Software Design,...)
  • Jörn Strothmann (Hardware Tests & Design)
  •  Antje Strothmann (Photo and video recordings, Shipments)
  • Lisa Strothmann (Aerial photo and video recordings)
  • Sarah Strothmann (photo presentation & test driver)

Have a look how and where I am working:

Our partners

Development and production of Magnic Lights strongly depends on our partners. Here you see our most important partners and coworkers:  

  • VTS Elektronik Gmbh, Fürstenau /GER (Electronic Circuit Design, PCB Board Design & Automated/ Roboter PCB Board Assembly), Coil Winding & Assembly 
  • HAICHENG MOLD, Shenzhen /CHN Tooing & Injection mold processing
  • Shenzhen Hill optical technology ,CHN , Lens development & production

12. ILLEGAL COPIES & PLAGIARISM

On the web you can find several illegal copies of our patented technology. 


The sellers don't care for patents and they also fool the customers because their produtcs don't work as promised (and will fail completely after ~30 hours usage because the internal batteries will be empty).

Watch our analysis of two nasty Magnic Light copies:

13. FAQ

  • Do Magnic Microlights fit to my bike?
    Yes- if you have "Standard" rim brakes (Caliper, Vbrake, Cantilver brakes). Even for disc brake systems we have a clamp adapter solution- but this is just for light and does not provide brake light.
  • Do Magnic Microlights work with Carbon rims?
    No- we need a metal rim. Aluminum is best. Magnesium works, too. 
  • I want to add mutiple rewards to my pledge. Is this possible?
    Yes- This is ok for all available rewards except limited rewards (otherwise the limitation fails)  and complete bicycles (high shipping cost). Just add the amount for additional rewards to your pledge (without additional shipping cost). After project termination you will receive a survey where you can specify your desired combination. 
  • Do I have to exchange brake pads often?
    No- "Normal" cyclists exchange their bicycles more frequently than the brake pads because these usually last for more than 5000 kilometers. Hardcore bikers have to exchange the brake pads from time to time.

MAGNIC MICROLIGHT compared to WEGA- THE MICROLIGHT for disc brakes. We named it WEGA because of the similarity with the stellar constellation Lyra and it's brightest star Wega
WEGA might be the most universal bike light on planet earth

HOW CAN THESE TINY LIGHTS BE STRONG?
Beneath generator technology one important aspect is the optimal choice of LED + lens which gives a big advantage compared to normal LED bicycle lights. For the Magnic Microlights we have chosen the newest extreme density - Cree LED (available since summer 2018): The most efficient high power LED with minimum size (1.6 mm x 1.6mm compared to 3.45mm x 3.45mm as used in many LED biycle lights). 
What does this mean for Magnic Microlights? Imagine you have a good bicycle light with 3,45mm x 3,45 mm LED, Lens of size 34,5 mm and 100 Lumen/Watt (These are quite excellent values for biycle lights). 
Magnic Microlights don't have the strongest generators (because cyclists should not feel anything!) but they have the best light efficiency on the market: 200 Lumen/Watt !

 GEEKY GADGETS

11. OUR BACKGROUND
Cycling is an important part of our live- not just as a business. Below you see images from "The Making of" video & photo material for this project. Whenever we are cycling Magnic Lights & Magnic Microlights are with us (Cycling to Calais, in Berlin, on straw bales ...)
 See details in the gallery ... 
OUR MISSION
We all just have this one live- why take the risk and cycle without light?
Without lighting, cyclists risk their lives in the dark - but those on the road with battery lights will soon be left in the dark when the journey takes too long or the batteries are no longer full. For those who do not want to mount heavy dynamos, use batteries or lay cables, we've launched two Kickstarter projects with our non-contact Magnic Lights, which feel like battery lighting without having to exchange or change batteries. Magnic Microlights can't be turned off at daylight and we are convinced this makes sense from a safety point of view: With lights on your visibilty increases significantly which means a great deal of safety.
Battery Lights are not the option:
Family team 

Dirk Strothmann (Management, CAD & Software Design,...)
Jörn Strothmann (Hardware Tests & Design)
 Antje Strothmann (Photo and video recordings, Shipments)
Lisa Strothmann (Aerial photo and video recordings)
Sarah Strothmann (photo presentation & test driver)

Have a look how and where I am working:

Our partners
Development and production of Magnic Lights strongly depends on our partners. Here you see our most important partners and coworkers:  


VTS Elektronik Gmbh, Fürstenau /GER (Electronic Circuit Design, PCB Board Design & Automated/ Roboter PCB Board Assembly), Coil Winding & Assembly 
HAICHENG MOLD, Shenzhen /CHN Tooing & Injection mold processing
Shenzhen Hill optical technology ,CHN , Lens development & production

 12. ILLEGAL COPIES & PLAGIARISM
On the web you can find several illegal copies of our patented technology. 
Patent infringing Magnic Light plagiarism
The sellers don't care for patents and they also fool the customers because their produtcs don't work as promised (and will fail completely after ~30 hours usage because the internal batteries will be empty).
Our original Magnic Lights with real functionality. You can buy them directly in our webshop (Shipment within 2 days)
Watch our analysis of two nasty Magnic Light copies:


13. FAQ


Do Magnic Microlights fit to my bike? Yes- if you have "Standard" rim brakes (Caliper, Vbrake, Cantilver brakes). Even for disc brake systems we have a clamp adapter solution- but this is just for light and does not provide brake light.


Do Magnic Microlights work with Carbon rims? No- we need a metal rim. Aluminum is best. Magnesium works, too. 

I want to add mutiple rewards to my pledge. Is this possible? Yes- This is ok for all available rewards except limited rewards (otherwise the limitation fails)  and complete bicycles (high shipping cost). Just add the amount for additional rewards to your pledge (without additional shipping cost). After project termination you will receive a survey where you can specify your desired combination. 


Do I have to exchange brake pads often? No- "Normal" cyclists exchange their bicycles more frequently than the brake pads because these usually last for more than 5000 kilometers. Hardcore bikers have to exchange the brake pads from time to time.   
 14. PHOTO GALLERIES (FREE FOR MEDIA USAGE)

Magnic Microlights
Wega
Magnic Night Bike 
Making of
Award Ceremony German Federal Design Award
Action Gallery

 

15. EXTENDED PROJECT VIDEO IN 8 LANGUAGES
If your web connection is slow, watch the video with additional Eddy Current Explanation + Smart Feature Demonstration with automatic subtitles in 8 languages:

story:
Dream of having a south-facing home? With the Smart Reflector, your dream becomes a reality! Your home will be exposed to the east in the morning, the south at noon, and the west in the evening.

Thanks to its innovative solar tracking technology, the Smart Reflector illuminates your home around the clock as long as the sun is shining.

 

 

 

 

 

Natural light is an essential source of well-being, comfort, and vitality.

It has been proven that exposure to sunlight increases the brain’s release of serotonin, the happiness hormone. It also promotes the body’s natural intake of vitamin D, a key factor in keeping you healthy.

 

 

 

 

The Smart Reflector redirects the sun's rays into your home to light up your room all day long !

Crafted from cutting-edge technology, the Smart Reflector is equipped with a solar sensor and dual-axis motor to follow the sun’s movements in real time.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your home’s sun exposure accounts for 10 to 20% of its value. This is a deal-breaker for both buyers and tenants alike. With the Smart Reflector, you can easily and affordably increases the value of your home.

Do you live in an apartment, a house, a loft, or something else entirely? No matter! The Smart Reflector perfectly adapts to any kind of home thanks to its easy and adjustable installation.
There is no doubt the Smart Reflector will be an essential part of your home.

Expertly fashioned with stainless steel and aluminum, the Smart Reflector blends noble and technical materials for a modern and practical home-illuminating device that is built to last.

 

 

 

Looking to accommodate your space? Simply fix the adjustable Smart Reflector to its provided support wherever you’d like to capture and radiate the sun rays you seek.

Install your Smart Reflector on your lawn or terrace or attach it to a nearby wall or balustrade. Espaciel offers you an adapted solution for whatever space you need.

Compact and discreet, the Smart Reflector stays out of sight as it ensures maximum sunshine and clarity.

 

 

 

Under patent by Espaciel, the innovative Smart Reflector was born after several years of intense R&D and an unwavering desire to create the best solar tracking device around.

From its solar collector to its electric motors, electronic board, and control software, our team of dedicated engineers has meticulously designed and developed every single aspect of the high-tech Smart Reflector.

Simply place the Smart Reflector in the sun to brighten your home 100% naturally.

 

 

The larger the reflective surface, the more light there is. The sun emits about 20,000 lux in winter and 100,000 lux in summer so your needs may change with the seasons.

A compact surface area of 35 x 60 cm is enough to light a room measuring 20 to 30 m2. 

A 35 x 100 cm surface area is perfectly suited for medium-sized rooms measuring 30 to 40 m2.

The Smart Reflector with a surface area of 50 x 120 cm illuminates a large living space measuring 40 to 60 m2.

You can attach a second Smart Reflector to obtain additional light for even larger spaces.

Handy tip: Reflector size should also depend on window or patio door width. 

For example you will not need a large 120 cm-sized reflector for a window measuring 60 cm.

 

 

 

 

 

Let there be light—and let this light be available to all !

We at Espaciel believe that no one should go without the essential benefits that natural light has to offer. We began our journey a few years ago with our first natural light kit for windows and patio doors.

The innovative Espaciel Reflector increases a room’s natural luminosity without the fuss and cost that comes with putting in a skylight. The Espaciel Reflector is easy to install and sets up in just minutes!

Now we need you to take it to the next level.

We are launching the ultimate challenge with our most ambitious product to date, the Smart Reflector. Our goal is to give everyone the chance to overcome the injustice of a dark interior and experience the benefits of natural light!

 

 

This is our fourth participatory fundraising campaign and the ninth sunlight reflector we are developing.

We are all too familiar with the obstacles that arise when new products are launched—as anyone who has done this would know !

Parts can be delayed. New prices may be applied without warning. Spare parts might be delivered to the wrong address.

But the good news? We have spent the past few years fine-tuning our manufacturing process to not only control our costs, but also improve production reliability and quality.

So, while there may still be some bumps along the way, we are better equipped to deal with them to offer you a product you are guaranteed to love.

 

 

 

 

FRENCH VERSION

Le Réflecteur Intelligent, c'est encore mieux qu'avoir un logement exposé plein Sud. C'est un logement exposé à l'est le matin, au sud à  midi et à l'Ouest le soir... 

En effet grâce à sa technologie innovante de suivi solaire, le Réflecteur Intelligent illumine votre habitation toute la journée, dès qu'il y a du soleil.

 

 

 

 

 

 

La lumière naturelle est une source essentielle de bien-être, de confort et de vitalité. Le soleil favorise la sécrétion de la sérotonine qui est l'hormone du bonheur.

Dans notre corps, la lumière naturelle favorise aussi la synthèse de la vitamine D qui est un facteur clef d'immunité.

 

 

 

 

 

Le Réflecteur Intelligent redirige les rayons du soleil dans votre intérieur pour éclairer votre pièce toute la journée !

Véritable concentré de technologie, il est équipé d'un capteur solaire et d'un moteur 2 axes pour suivre les mouvements du soleil en temps réel.

 

 

 

 

 

 

L'exposition au soleil compte pour 10 à 20% de la valeur d'un logement. Pour les acquéreurs et les locataire c'est l'un des tous premiers critères de choix. Ainsi, le Réflecteur Intelligent augmente la valeur de votre logement

Le Réflecteur Intelligent s’intègre parfaitement à votre habitat quelque soit sa configuration : appartement, maison, loft...

Avec le Réflecteur Intelligent, vous profitez d’un véritable produit de la maison. Conçu pour durer, il est réalisé avec des matériaux nobles et pérennes (inox, aluminium…).

Il augmente la luminosité de votre logement sans travaux.

 

 

 

Le Réflecteur Intelligent s'adapte au support disponible là où vous souhaitez le placer pour capter les rayons du soleil.

Qu'il s'agisse de la pelouse du jardin, du sol de la terrasse, d'un mur voisin ou de la balustrade du balcon, Espaciel vous propose une solution adaptée.

Discret, le Réflecteur Intelligent sait se faire oublier tout en vous apportant soleil et clarté.

 

 

 

Issu de plusieurs années de R&D, le Réflecteur Intelligent fait l'objet d'un brevet Espaciel.

Capteur solaire, moteurs électriques, carte électronique, logiciel de pilotage, tous les élément spécifiques du produit ont fait l'objet d'une mise au point minutieuse par notre équipe d'ingénieurs.

Placé au soleil, le Réflecteur Intelligent réfléchit les rayons du soleil pour éclairer votre maison, naturellement.

 

 

Plus la surface de réflexion est grande plus la quantité de lumière transmises est importante. Le soleil fournit entre 20 000 lux l'hiver et 100 000 lux l'été.

Une surface compacte de 35 x 60 cm suffit pour éclairer une pièce de vie de 20 à 30 m2.

La surface 35 x 100 cm est parfaitement adaptée pour les pièces de tailles moyennes de 30 à 40 m2.

Le Réflecteur Intelligent 50 x 120 cm permet d'illuminer un grand espace de vie de 40 à 60 m2.

Au-delà de cette surface, vous pouvez placer un second Réflecteur Intelligent pour  gagner encore plus de luminosité.

Bon à savoir : le choix de la dimension du réflecteur dépend aussi de la largeur de l'ouverture de fenêtre ou porte fenêtre. Inutile de prendre un grand réflecteur de 120 cm pour une fenêtre de 60 cm de large.

 

 

 

 

Nous voulons rendre la lumière naturelle accessible à tous ! Chez Espaciel, nous pensons que tout le monde doit pouvoir bénéficier de cette source de bienfaits essentielle.

Il y a quelques années, nous avons inventé le premier kit d'éclairage naturel pour fenêtre et porte-fenêtre. Le réflecteur Espaciel ampliﬁe la luminosité naturelle d'une pièce, comme une fenêtre de toit, mais il est aussi facile à installer qu'un store et ne nécessite aucun travaux.

Aujourd'hui, nous avons besoin de vous pour franchir un nouveau cap. Nous nous lançons un 

défi ultime avec notre produit le plus ambitieux à ce jour : le Réflecteur Intelligent.

L'enjeux c'est de rendre le soleil accessible à chacun et de vaincre l'injustice d'un intérieur sombre.

 

Il s'agit de notre quatrième campagne de collecte de fonds participative et du neuvième réflecteur de lumière que nous développons. Nous connaissons les pièges du lancement de nouveaux produits.

Néanmoins, l'industrialisation d'un nouveau produit est parsemée d'embuches !

Les pièces sont retardées. Les nouveaux prix sont appliqués sans avertissement. Des camions  de pièces détachées sont accidentellement livrés dans l'ancien appartement du fondateur (oui,  cela nous est arrivé).

La bonne nouvelle, c'est que nous avons passé ces dernières années à peaufiner notre processus de fabrication, non seulement pour contrôler nos coûts, mais aussi pour améliorer la fiabilité et la qualité de notre mode de production.

Nous ne pouvons pas garantir qu'il n'y aura pas de revers, mais nous pensons être mieux équipés que jamais pour y faire face.

story:
As Seen On

  • https://www.digitaltrends.com/home/generark-homepower-2-emergency-power-backup/
  • https://thegadgetflow.com/portfolio/generark-solar-generator-provides-home-emergency-power-supply/

Testing Review by Silver Cymbal:

 

Everything You Need to Know About The New Generark

The Generark Solar Generator is the first emergency power supply designed specifically for the modern home. It includes the HomePower 2 backup battery power station and the SolarPower 2 all-weather portable solar panels. The next generation of affordable backup power solutions designed for every household is here. Turn it on, plug in, and you have power.

Discover all the new features here.

 

Hear From the Creative Minds Behind the Innovative Modern Design

Watch as they explain their design for themselves.

 

Celebrity Support for Generark’s Solar Generator and Sustainability Mission

Find out why these stars are proud to be supporting Generark in their communities.

 

We can all relate to that moment of panic when the lights go out and the power is unexpectedly shut off. Having a powerful, reliable, and portable backup solution can be a lifesaver! The ability to rest assured that you can keep your fridge cold, mobile devices charged, and medical devices running can be absolutely essential for the entire family, and your community.

Generark is the emergency backup generator you need in any and every emergency situation. It gives portable, emergency power whenever and wherever is needed. With an emergency power supply lasting up to seven days, Generark is the reliable source of energy you can count on when disaster strikes by keeping vital home appliances and devices running without interruption. It also powers critical medical devices, power tools, and communication devices to stay connected during a power outage and time of recovery after disaster strikes.

 

 

How Does It Work?

The Generark Solar Generator includes a backup battery power station (HomePower 2) and all-weather portable solar panels (SolarPower 2). The solar panels collect the sun’s rays and convert them into energy, which is then stored in the backup battery power station. The backup battery power station can store and hold the electricity for at least a year. When the time comes, it then supplies electricity to other devices and appliances via the standard AC output (110V) and various DC outputs (USB-A, USB-C, and car outlet) when power is needed. 

Generark’s SolarPower 2 offers 50% higher solar power conversion efficiency than traditional solar panels, allowing you to harness and convert the sun’s rays in less time. Paired with our HomePower 2 backup battery power station, you have the ability to power a wide range of home appliances and devices.

If the sun is somehow unavailable, the HomePower 2 can also be charged from a variety of sources, including the AC outlets, the traditional gas generator, or directly with a car outlet. No matter the emergency situation, Generark Solar Generators are designed to give you reliable backup power that you can count on.

 

Supports 99% of Home Appliances with 2200-Watts of Power

Generark HomePower 2 comes with two models, choose the best fit for your family from Starter at 1566WH or Plus at 2060WH. The HomePower 2 - Plus offers a 2200W continuous high power output and 4400W of surge power at 110V/60Hz, which is able to power 99% of home appliances. With 20-amp AC outlets, you can power common kitchen and bathroom devices like a Crockpot and hairdryer.

The HomePower 2 has a Pure-Sine Wave inverter that is capable of producing a cleaner, smoother, quieter, and more reliable electricity to operate appliances and electronics more comfortably without interference. The energy output is regulated and changes smoothly, with the ability to power many commonly used devices like televisions, LED lights, microwaves, laser printers, variable speed tools, and more.

Watch the HomePower 2 powering up a high-power blender. 

 

High Compatibility with 9 Simultaneous Outputs

The HomePower 2 (Plus) has four 20-amp AC outlets, making it extremely powerful. You can power up multiple devices at one time such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, medical device, toaster, and more!

The HomePower 2 is equipped with two USB-C outlets with PD 100W and two USB-A outlets certified by Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 so it can connect and power up your Mac directly, and provide ultra fast recharge to your smartphones, tablets, and other mobile devices.

There is also a car outlet with 12V/10A for easy and convenient supplying power for any automobile accessories. Connect and power your phone, portable GPS navigation system, sound system, and portable video players for kids to stay occupied while you’re on the road by car or RV!

 

Up to 7 Days of Essential Power

The Generark HomePower 2 offers up to 7 days of emergency power. A single charge will power your essential devices for up to one week including, but not limited to, Home Appliances, Communication Devices, Home Offices, Medical Devices, Lights, Power Tools, and more. 

* The chart above visualizes how you can best use your HomePower 2 when facing a power outage. Each line explains the average wattage range of a supported home device, and how long the HomePower 2 would be able to power that one device on a single charge, abiding by our assumed average usage times. Note, if you choose to power more than one device on a single charge of your HomePower 2, your battery supply will drain sooner than the noted total usage time frame. 

 

Continuous Coverage Enabled by Ultra-Fast Recharge

The Generark Solar Generator is reliable and ready to help you endure any natural disaster. It has a built-in Maximum-Power Point Tracking (MPPT) charge controller that enables the fastest and most efficient recharge by the solar panels. By the SolarPower 2 solar panels (800W), the HomePower 2 backup battery power station will be at 80% after 2 hours, and 100% fully charged within 3-4 hours. Out of the average 8 hours of sunlight a day, Generark Solar Generators only require 3-4 hours to recharge fully by solar power. This means you can have peace of mind, and there is no reason to worry about not having enough sunlight.

Your Generark can also be easily recharged by the AC wall outlet with 1000-Watts of ultra fast recharging speed. It will be at 80% after just 1.5 hours, and 100% in just a little over 2 hours.

If you have a gas generator already, you can easily connect, power, and recharge your Generark with it. This is a convenient way to use a device you already have, and then use your Generark indoors safely without emitting any harmful gas or loud noises.

Should solar, AC or wall, and gas generators not be available, you can always rely on your car as a last resort to charge your Generark.

You can recharge your Generark by solar and use it at the same time, so Generark has the ability to provide continuous power throughout the day and a full charge to get through the night! Being able to recharge quickly and still have continuous power while charging is crucial to get through a natural disaster and emergency situation. No matter the emergency situation, Generark Solar Generators are designed to give you reliable backup power that can be recharged quickly and easily from a variety of different sources. Generark Solar Generators make this not just possible, but easy.

 

All-Weather Portable Solar Panels

Each SolarPower 2 panel consists of 64 Monocrystalline solar cells (SunPower Maxeon Gen III), offering 50% higher solar power conversion efficiency compared to traditional solar panels. The SunPower solar cells were invented at Stanford University and are made in the USA.

The SolarPower 2 is lightweight and foldable. Its portable design allows for easy setup and transportation so you can move it conveniently through your home and easily take it with you on the go. With the adjustable kickstand, it takes 30 seconds or less to set up or take down for quick access during an emergency.

The SolarPower 2 is, perhaps, most importantly, an all-weather solar panel with IP67 waterproof rating. Natural disasters bring on any elements - storms, rain, heat, wind, and more. The SolarPower 2 allows you to confidently face any of these disaster elements and situations, and more.

 

Unprecedented Design by Renowned Designers

The Generark Solar Generator is designed right here in the United States out of San Francisco, California, by Bill Webb and Patrick Tufts, renowned designers behind many of the most iconic products (including Gopro, Sonos, Nike, etc.) used by millions of consumers across the globe.

 

Sleek Design for Your Modern Home

A lot of thought went into the design of the HomePower 2. We wanted a modern and iconic design that fits every home and every need, whether you’re enduring an emergency situation or hosting a house party. We created the exceptionally sleek design to not look like most portable generators. It is visually elevated and on-par with premium accessories that are commonplace in the modern home. 

 

Vertical Design with Minimal Footprint

We intentionally designed the HomePower 2 in a vertical format with a waist-level height. It is designed to just stand on the ground, and eliminates the need and effort of lifting it up to table tops and elevated surfaces. It is also more compact, taking up less space and leaving a smaller footprint no matter where you use it in or outside the home. We want you to be able to just stand it on the ground where and when you need it, then easily move the portable generator to either its next space for use or storage.  

 

Integrated Ergonomic Handle

We made the HomePower 2 with a top embedded waist-height handle making the device easy to carry and move from location to location. Easily take the device with you to neighbors’ houses or as you move from room to room in your own home. 

 

Magic Wheel Cart

The Magic Wheel Cart is designed with convenience in mind. It allows the HomePower 2 to be moved effortlessly by anyone, any age. The wheel cart is removable, and magnets help it snap back into place. The design of the wheel cart was something we really felt strongly about. During an unexpected blackout, we wanted the HomePower 2 to be able to move quickly and effortlessly. We felt it was an essential user benefit.

 

Intelligent Display

We integrated the HomePower 2 with a large LCD screen. It has an intuitive interface that gives real-time status on power input and output. It shows the input and output wattage, so you know the exact load of power going through the unit. The estimated hours to fully recharge the unit and the estimated remaining hours to use give you an intuitive and easy way to plan your usage without doing any math! 

 

360-Degree Ambient LED Light

We added an ambient LED light around the perimeter of the HomePower 2. It lights up in the dark to help you stay safe and avoid wire tripping. It is also color coded to inform you of battery and charge levels, with yellow indicating <10% and red, <5%.

In an emergency situation, the light will communicate the status and power level and can be seen from across the room. At a glance, you get the peace of mind knowing the device is fully powered and working properly. 

 

Why Generark?

Generark Solar Generators are reliable, durable, and portable. It is the perfect emergency power solution for all homes, offices, businesses, and everywhere that needs power to function. It produces a smoother, cleaner, quieter, and more reliable source of electricity compared to other generators on the market. It’s perfect for operating appliances, electronics, and medical equipment without interference.

The Most Affordable Backup Power Solution for Every Household

Generark Solar Generators were carefully and thoroughly designed not just in physical shape and capabilities, but in affordability and investment. Generark Solar Generators are the most affordable backup power supply for the modern home. 

A whole-house backup battery power system by Tesla or other suppliers will cost an average of $25k-$50k, for just the battery system. For installation of solar panels on the roof, on average is another $30-$50k. Installing this kind of system for your household can be anywhere from $50k-$100k, making it difficult for the majority of households to afford.

Generark offers a solution that is one-tenth (1/10) of the cost of its industry competitors. Generark Solar Generators are an affordable, emergency backup power solution for every household in the United States. An investment in Generark products has no subsequent usage cost, meaning no additional gas or fuel is required.

 

Better, Safer, Easier Compared to Other Generators

Unlike gas generators, Generark Solar Generators do not emit gas or harmful substances. They are 100% safe for indoor use. They are quiet, running without noise. And, they are easy to use! Generark Solar Generators do not require installation or learning - simply take it out, turn it on, plug in your device and you have power!

 

Reliably Safe

Generark Solar Generators are reliably safe. Your Generark can hold its power for at least a year after it is fully charged, unlike a traditional battery that will lose power after 2-3 months. The HomePower 2 includes 6 built-in protection modules in the battery management system (BMS). They include: overcharge protection, overcurrent protection, over-voltage protection, short circuit protection, over-discharge protection, and temperature control.

Every Generark unit undergoes 52 reliability and safety tests and is covered by a 5-year warranty. All units undergo energy efficiency and safety testing certified by the U.S. Department of Energy, California Energy Commission, Federal Communications Commission, and the United Nations 38.3 Transport Safety Standard. 

 

5-Year Warranty

Generark is the only solar generator company on the market providing a 5-year warranty on its products. Others typically only offer a warranty of up to 2 years. We intentionally back and stand by our product, and are proud to extend such a long warranty to all of our customers. We recommend in general to never buy an emergency power supply that offers less than a 5-year warranty, instead,  only to buy an emergency power supply that offers at least a 5-year warranty. 

 

Choose The Best Fit For Your Family

Choose which Generark products you need based on your household’s size. With production on the Generark Solar Generator set to begin in June with products shipping out in September, now is your chance to back the industry’s first solar generator designed for the modern home! Choose your ideal pairing to enjoy a never-before-seen discount on Generark’s newest products, with the possibility to save from $400 to over $2000 and FREE shipping!

Specifications

 

Production & Shipping Timeline 

The production of the Generark Solar Generator has begun in June and shipping for Indiegogo orders will start in September.

An Inside Look Behind the Scenes of Our Design Process

Stage 1: Design & Innovation

We begin with the innovation phase. Our experts conduct research to better understand our consumers’ needs, and develop new features that can target these and any other potential problems or pain points.

Stage 2: Prototyping & Engineering

In this phase, our engineers go through many rounds of prototyping and designs to combat any rising problems before finalizing a design and features.

Stage 3: Validation & Testing

In this final stage, the finished product goes through various safety and reliability tests to validate if it’s ready for market.

 

About Generark

From wildfires to earthquakes, from hurricanes to winter storms, millions of people across the country have experienced many power outages as the result of a natural disaster, leading to feelings of shock and uncertainty. With climate change seemingly here to stay, these types of natural disasters and power outages will only continue to occur, leaving us all prone to facing more emergency situations.

The story goes that when the entire world flooded, only Noah’s Ark sustained life. Generark aims to be your ark, your source of security in any emergency situation, by providing a reliable source of power that will enable you to keep your home protected and running, allow you to stay connected to your loved ones, and encourages you to collaborate with your community by sharing resources.

Generark was founded in 2019 out of the devastating California wildfires that left thousands without power, and even homeless. With a newborn at home, our founder quickly realized the need for a working refrigerator to supply crucial nutrients to both baby and mother, regardless of the natural disaster and its aftermath unfolding around them. Beyond his own family, many of his friends and neighbors were left without a roof over their heads, seeking rest in cars or public shelters because their homes and belongings completely burned to the ground.

As a serial entrepreneur in the technology industry and energy sector, our founder has now taken the future into his own hands, developing a product that will help everyone take back control in the face of an emergency. Generark products are here to ensure anyone can stay prepared during emergency situations, and continue to evolve, develop, and change with the ever-changing climate and natural disaster-prone times we live in today.

Sustainability

Climate change is constant and only growing, posing an increased threat of new, worse, and more damaging natural disasters every year. With the uncertainty of climate change here to stay, Generark provides a reliable, durable, and portable solution to get through natural disasters when they strike.

At Generark, we are committed to making a positive impact on climate change in everything we do. The solar technology we have created allows you as the consumer to help leave a positive impact as well. Every time you use a Generark Solar Generator instead of another backup power source requiring gas or a worse stimulant, you leave a smaller carbon footprint.

The vision of Generark is centered around collaborating to provide protection and connection to our community. Part of protecting that community is educating one another about climate change and how we can make an impact with simple lifestyle changes like recycling, sustainable products, and using solar energy!

Our mission is to keep your beautiful life powered through any emergency situation. Generark Solar Generators provide a way and space to do just that, not just by keeping your beautiful life powered, but allowing you to embrace beauty as it is in its natural form, from the sun and solar power.

Join Generark on our mission to bring the most efficient, affordable, and sustainable emergency power to a world that's never needed it more.

 

Never Lose Power Again. Order Your Generark Now!

https://thegadgetflow.com/portfolio/generark-solar-generator-provides-home-emergency-power-supply/
Testing Review by Silver Cymbal:

 
Everything You Need to Know About The New GenerarkThe Generark Solar Generator is the first emergency power supply designed specifically for the modern home. It includes the HomePower 2 backup battery power station and the SolarPower 2 all-weather portable solar panels. The next generation of affordable backup power solutions designed for every household is here. Turn it on, plug in, and you have power.Discover all the new features here.

 
Hear From the Creative Minds Behind the Innovative Modern DesignWatch as they explain their design for themselves. Celebrity Support for Generark’s Solar Generator and Sustainability MissionFind out why these stars are proud to be supporting Generark in their communities. We can all relate to that moment of panic when the lights go out and the power is unexpectedly shut off. Having a powerful, reliable, and portable backup solution can be a lifesaver! The ability to rest assured that you can keep your fridge cold, mobile devices charged, and medical devices running can be absolutely essential for the entire family, and your community.Generark is the emergency backup generator you need in any and every emergency situation. It gives portable, emergency power whenever and wherever is needed. With an emergency power supply lasting up to seven days, Generark is the reliable source of energy you can count on when disaster strikes by keeping vital home appliances and devices running without interruption. It also powers critical medical devices, power tools, and communication devices to stay connected during a power outage and time of recovery after disaster strikes.  How Does It Work?The Generark Solar Generator includes a backup battery power station (HomePower 2) and all-weather portable solar panels (SolarPower 2). The solar panels collect the sun’s rays and convert them into energy, which is then stored in the backup battery power station. The backup battery power station can store and hold the electricity for at least a year. When the time comes, it then supplies electricity to other devices and appliances via the standard AC output (110V) and various DC outputs (USB-A, USB-C, and car outlet) when power is needed. Generark’s SolarPower 2 offers 50% higher solar power conversion efficiency than traditional solar panels, allowing you to harness and convert the sun’s rays in less time. Paired with our HomePower 2 backup battery power station, you have the ability to power a wide range of home appliances and devices.If the sun is somehow unavailable, the HomePower 2 can also be charged from a variety of sources, including the AC outlets, the traditional gas generator, or directly with a car outlet. No matter the emergency situation, Generark Solar Generators are designed to give you reliable backup power that you can count on. Supports 99% of Home Appliances with 2200-Watts of PowerGenerark HomePower 2 comes with two models, choose the best fit for your family from Starter at 1566WH or Plus at 2060WH. The HomePower 2 - Plus offers a 2200W continuous high power output and 4400W of surge power at 110V/60Hz, which is able to power 99% of home appliances. With 20-amp AC outlets, you can power common kitchen and bathroom devices like a Crockpot and hairdryer.The HomePower 2 has a Pure-Sine Wave inverter that is capable of producing a cleaner, smoother, quieter, and more reliable electricity to operate appliances and electronics more comfortably without interference. The energy output is regulated and changes smoothly, with the ability to power many commonly used devices like televisions, LED lights, microwaves, laser printers, variable speed tools, and more.Watch the HomePower 2 powering up a high-power blender. 

 
High Compatibility with 9 Simultaneous OutputsThe HomePower 2 (Plus) has four 20-amp AC outlets, making it extremely powerful. You can power up multiple devices at one time such as a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, medical device, toaster, and more!The HomePower 2 is equipped with two USB-C outlets with PD 100W and two USB-A outlets certified by Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 so it can connect and power up your Mac directly, and provide ultra fast recharge to your smartphones, tablets, and other mobile devices.There is also a car outlet with 12V/10A for easy and convenient supplying power for any automobile accessories. Connect and power your phone, portable GPS navigation system, sound system, and portable video players for kids to stay occupied while you’re on the road by car or RV! Up to 7 Days of Essential PowerThe Generark HomePower 2 offers up to 7 days of emergency power. A single charge will power your essential devices for up to one week including, but not limited to, Home Appliances, Communication Devices, Home Offices, Medical Devices, Lights, Power Tools, and more. * The chart above visualizes how you can best use your HomePower 2 when facing a power outage. Each line explains the average wattage range of a supported home device, and how long the HomePower 2 would be able to power that one device on a single charge, abiding by our assumed average usage times. Note, if you choose to power more than one device on a single charge of your HomePower 2, your battery supply will drain sooner than the noted total usage time frame.  Continuous Coverage Enabled by Ultra-Fast RechargeThe Generark Solar Generator is reliable and ready to help you endure any natural disaster. It has a built-in Maximum-Power Point Tracking (MPPT) charge controller that enables the fastest and most efficient recharge by the solar panels. By the SolarPower 2 solar panels (800W), the HomePower 2 backup battery power station will be at 80% after 2 hours, and 100% fully charged within 3-4 hours. Out of the average 8 hours of sunlight a day, Generark Solar Generators only require 3-4 hours to recharge fully by solar power. This means you can have peace of mind, and there is no reason to worry about not having enough sunlight.Your Generark can also be easily recharged by the AC wall outlet with 1000-Watts of ultra fast recharging speed. It will be at 80% after just 1.5 hours, and 100% in just a little over 2 hours.If you have a gas generator already, you can easily connect, power, and recharge your Generark with it. This is a convenient way to use a device you already have, and then use your Generark indoors safely without emitting any harmful gas or loud noises.Should solar, AC or wall, and gas generators not be available, you can always rely on your car as a last resort to charge your Generark.You can recharge your Generark by solar and use it at the same time, so Generark has the ability to provide continuous power throughout the day and a full charge to get through the night! Being able to recharge quickly and still have continuous power while charging is crucial to get through a natural disaster and emergency situation. No matter the emergency situation, Generark Solar Generators are designed to give you reliable backup power that can be recharged quickly and easily from a variety of different sources. Generark Solar Generators make this not just possible, but easy. All-Weather Portable Solar PanelsEach SolarPower 2 panel consists of 64 Monocrystalline solar cells (SunPower Maxeon Gen III), offering 50% higher solar power conversion efficiency compared to traditional solar panels. The SunPower solar cells were invented at Stanford University and are made in the USA.The SolarPower 2 is lightweight and foldable. Its portable design allows for easy setup and transportation so you can move it conveniently through your home and easily take it with you on the go. With the adjustable kickstand, it takes 30 seconds or less to set up or take down for quick access during an emergency.The SolarPower 2 is, perhaps, most importantly, an all-weather solar panel with IP67 waterproof rating. Natural disasters bring on any elements - storms, rain, heat, wind, and more. The SolarPower 2 allows you to confidently face any of these disaster elements and situations, and more. Unprecedented Design by Renowned DesignersThe Generark Solar Generator is designed right here in the United States out of San Francisco, California, by Bill Webb and Patrick Tufts, renowned designers behind many of the most iconic products (including Gopro, Sonos, Nike, etc.) used by millions of consumers across the globe. Sleek Design for Your Modern HomeA lot of thought went into the design of the HomePower 2. The design of the wheel cart was something we really felt strongly about. During an unexpected blackout, we wanted the HomePower 2 to be able to move quickly and effortlessly. story:
• Bios is a start-up based in Lisbon, Portugal, working with cutting edge clean technology to transform data into future Green Building investments. 
  • Our purpose aims to integrate nature and technology to develop healthy living spaces for sustainable communities and commerce.
  • Everything started back in 2017, when Michael a PhD researcher in Sustainable Energy Systems, met Paulo, an experienced horticulturalist working with Urban Agriculture Technologies. 
  • Together, driven by a multidisciplinary curiosity, they found a holistic way to work with nature by integrating technologies into buildings to grow food.
  • Bios leverages under-valued space, data and waste of buildings to provide a clean-technology which secures a local, quality supply of food, now and into the future. 

 

 

Our ultimate aim is to transform the future of Green Buildings...

 

 

...to secure the inclusion of green jobs and access to clean food in urban areas.

 

The Bios Urban Farm!

 

  • The Bios Urban Farm is an innovative project aimed at using the waste generated by buildings to grow fresh, locally produced food.
  • The Bios approach holds primary stakeholders at its core while using integrated data for creating a wide range of benefits for the building and its operations.
  • Right now, we are running our pilot at Nova School of Business and Economic in Carcavelos, Portugal which has unused space perfect for a greenhouse. Bringing value to underutilised space, an indoor growing chamber is integrated with energy, water, and air circulation systems.
  • A key outcome of this project will be the creation of a Social Food Enterprise, led and run by local community members, where the harvested produce from the Bios Urban Farm can be sold.

 

Help us launch our first Urban Farm!

(We can’t do it without you)

 

  • This campaign aims to raise funds that will allow for the completion of a community-operated, urban farm. Before the calamity, Bios were on track to have the Bios Urban Farm up-and-running by September 2021. Despite numerous setbacks, Bios was able to build partnership and collaborations and secure enough funding to begin the construction of the greenhouse.

 

  • But we have a budget gap of 250,000 EUR and we cannot continue construction of the Bios Urban Farm including the Social Food Enterprise, until we have raised these funds. It really is make-or-break but we are determined not to give up. 

 

  • Bios is launching a crowdfunding campaign to raise just 105,000 EUR which will help us close this gap. All funds received will be applied to the existing project and all contributors will be engaged throughout the 24-month journey to finish construction of the Bios Urban Farm and establish a sustainable community-owned food business. ​

    • We need 90,000 EUR to complete the greenhouse

    • 5,000 EUR to complete the food preparation and supply on campus

    • 10,000 EUR to work directly with the community to build the sustainable business model for offering this education experiences on campus.

 

Thank You!

Our purpose aims to integrate nature and technology to develop healthy living spaces for sustainable communities and commerce.

story:
When you’re out there in nature, climbing a snow-covered mountain, trekking through the wilderness, camping in extreme weather, or walking through a hellish desert, you need to be prepared for everything.

FROST SUMMITS does exactly that, and so much more.

FROST SUMMITS is the world’s first IoT smart solar charger and pocket-sized power bank pack made especially for those who reach for extreme experiences.

The charger and power bank operate in places where other products simply do not work, in temperatures as low as -58°F. With FROST SUMMITS in your backpack, you have a light-weight power supply that uses renewable resources to ensure all your devices stay charged.

3 revolutionary products that are the perfect companion for all your outdoor adventures:

 

 

 

 

 

The 5000mAh battery that powers FROST 5000 represents a perfect balance between energy storage, weight, and efficiency. On a long multi-day trip, you don't want to be weighed down with battery packs delivering power you can't use. At this battery capacity, you can fully charge FROST 5000 in less than one day using SUMMITS 7.  The Box Connect App, adds an extra layer of reliability with real-time tracking, so can have absolute control over the battery performance at any time.

 

Shake FROST 5000 to know its charging status and to connect to the app.

You can choose FROST 5000 color in our CrowdOx backer survey that you will receive 10 days after your purchase. 

 

 

We love the Indiegogo community. The fact that people from all over the world can use a platform to support products they believe in is extremely fascinating to us. Feedback from backers will help us know what’s most important to our customers and how we can make things even more seamless for them.

We have designed and built a world-class product and Indiegogo gives us the best opportunity to get the product into people’s hands sooner than would otherwise be possible.

 

 

We fully anticipate on time delivery for FROST SUMMITS. Most of our product development effort has been put in upfront, ahead of our campaign. Our design is in its final stages, and we have completed a BOM (bill of materials) to specify the required components for mass production. We've just completed our third functional prototype (as featured in our campaign video) and the team is very proud of the result.

 

With our plastic and electronic design complete, the step immediately after successful funding will be mass production. Our manufacturing partner has extensive experience bringing battery and charging technology to the market. However, even with the best team and preparation, unexpected hiccups can occur. We've built contingencies into our schedule to minimize the impact of any manufacturing delays.

 

In light of recent controversies around lithium ion batteries, product safety is a top priority. No less than 7 failsafe systems are built into FROST 5000’s electrical design to protect you and your devices. FCC, CE, RoHS and UN38.3 safety certifications will be completed to provide assurance and peace of mind.

 

Due to additional safety procedures, costs are prohibitively high for air shipments containing lithium ion batteries. We have identified the specialized logistics provider Easyship to assist us in getting FROST SUMMITS into your pockets asap.

For US fulfillment, rewards will first be sent via sea (which takes around 18 days or more) from our factory in China to a US port and then be shipped to US addresses via Easyship tracked shipping. US based backers are expected to receive rewards within 3-8 days from the port. For the rest of the world, we need to check with our international shipping advisers, and we will be communicating how we will ship direct from China.

Policies by Country:

Legal variances from country to country, regulations vary significantly across regions and countries, especially for electronic goods. We will take every precaution in ensuring that our product and shipping policies meet with local legislation in all areas, but we will let you know if there is any problem with your delivery.

Defective products and returns: 

It is our responsibility to make sure we deliver the best products we could to our customers. There might still be some issues that we need to overcome along the way to get this product ready for mass production. If you do receive a defective product that falls below expectations, you have 20 days from the receive day to contact us and we will send you a replacement ASAP.
story_txt: When you’re out there in nature, climbing a snow-covered mountain, trekking through the wilderness, camping in extreme weather, or walking through a hellish desert, you need to be prepared for everything.FROST SUMMITS does exactly that, and so much more.FROST SUMMITS is the world’s first IoT smart solar charger and pocket-sized power bank pack made especially for those who reach for extreme experiences.The charger and power bank operate in places where other products simply do not work, in temperatures as low as -58°F. With FROST SUMMITS in your backpack, you have a light-weight power supply that uses renewable resources to ensure all your devices stay charged.3 revolutionary products that are the perfect companion for all your outdoor adventures:     The 5000mAh battery that powers FROST 5000 represents a perfect balance between energy storage, weight, and efficiency. On a long multi-day trip, you don't want to be weighed down with battery packs delivering power you can't use. At this battery capacity, you can fully charge FROST 5000 in less than one day using SUMMITS 7.  The Box Connect App, adds an extra layer of reliability with real-time tracking, so can have absolute control over the battery performance at any time. Shake FROST 5000 to know its charging status and to connect to the app.You can choose FROST 5000 color in our CrowdOx backer survey that you will receive 10 days after your purchase.   We love the Indiegogo community. The fact that people from all over the world can use a platform to support products they believe in is extremely fascinating to us. Feedback from backers will help us know what’s most important to our customers and how we can make things even more seamless for them.We have designed and built a world-class product and Indiegogo gives us the best opportunity to get the product into people’s hands sooner than would otherwise be possible.  We fully anticipate on time delivery for FROST SUMMITS.
