story:
We are taking orders on https://www.deepcyclepower.com/mccvideo

 

Second round - investors funding

Hi there, I am Alex with the megacell charger project. In this video, I want to talk about what we have accomplished and how we plan to scale this project. This video is not for regular users, and it's intended for people looking to invest money in this project.

Before I tell you the deal I have in mind for investors, let me briefly present the project.

The Megacell Charger is a testing device for lithium cells intended to measure new or used cells' capacity. We created this device to speed up and help automate the tedious process of measuring lithium cells before building battery packs.

To create a well-balanced battery pack, you need to make sure that all the cells are in good condition and that you know their capacity before welding them together.

More people and recycling companies started recovering lithium cells from used batteries in the last couple of years. More than 80% of cells are still in good condition, but you need a way to filter which cells can be reused and find their actual capacity before placing them back into batteries.

We created the Megacell Charger to speed up the process, making cell recovery worth it. The hardware works hand in hand with the software we created. This live connection allows logging the results into a database and helps printing labels for cells to further automate the sorting and the pack creation process.

In 2020 we created a crowdfunding campaign to help get this project off the ground and see how many people are interested in such a device. The campaign was a success, and we shipped over 700 devices already, over 1000 devices including the alpha stage that we ran in 2019.

We got down the manufacturing and shipping process, and we are now ready to scale this.

This video is intended for investors because we plan to make stocks in Europe, Asia, and USA before moving forward with this project's marketing.

We sold over 700 devices in 3 months, taking into account that they were pre-orders, and a lot of people did not want to take the risk.

At the end of January, we have received a stock of 100 devices in Romania, and they sold out in less than 14 days with minimum marketing.

The feedback we got from people is excellent, and the requests are rising every day.

Here's the proposal I want to make to you:

We aim to raise money for a batch of 2000 devices.

We created three investing packages:

Ten devices

Fifty devices and 100 devices.

The bulk price per device is 110 Euro, and the reselling price is 146 Euro.

There are two options to benefit from this investment:

The first option is to ship the devices to you, and you take care of selling and fulfillment. Reselling for at least 146 Euro e piece will give you a 32.72% return on your investment. This is the price at which we sold the 100 devices we received this year in stock.

 

The second option is to keep the stock and pay you between 13 to 17% interest on your investment in 6 to 8 months.

For the quantity of 10 to 49 devices, we offer 13% interest on your investment

For 50 to 99 devices, it will be 15%, and for 100+ devices, we will offer 17% interest.

Manufacturing takes three months, and we estimate that it will take another 2 to 4 months to sell all the stock and pay everyone their money back plus interest.

I want to clarify that this is a one-time deal, we will not split profits of any further sales after we pay the investment money back and the interest we promised. There might be the option to reinvest in the future, but I would like to keep the discussion simple for now.

Keeping money in a bank will give you 1% or less per year, and we offer you the possibility of investing in a proven project that gives you up to 17% interest in less than a year.

We are in the process of certifying the devices, and we already established manufacturing, testing, and packing workflow with the factory.

We have contracts with fulfillment companies, and we are just waiting for stock. The hard part of the project passed, and there are no other risks for this project to go wrong.

I am confident that this project will scale very well, with all the batteries around, electronic cigarettes, e-scooters, e-bikes, electric vehicles, toys, etc.

The market is vast, and the venture of reusing and repairing these batteries is on the rise. Having a testing device is mandatory for repairing these lithium batteries to detect which cells have problems and needs replacing.

We stopped receiving pre-orders from regular users, and we are now focusing on a campaign to mass sell these devices. But to keep things moving fast, we must build a stock first.

If you are the kind of person that likes having money working for him, this project is the right choice for you.

Pick any of the perks on the right side of this page, and during checkout, you have the option to add shipping to it or not.

If you choose to get it shipped, there will be an extra shipping fee, and we will send the devices to your address and not pay any interest in your investment.

If you don't choose to get the devices shipped, we will keep them and sell them through our marketing channels and offer you between 13 to 17% interest and your money-back once the devices are sold.

We will pay the commissions and the initial investment money back in the order the investments were received. The payments will be sent through PayPal or wire transfer when the time comes.

I estimate it to take between 6 to 8 months until you receive your investment back plus interest.

If you want to learn more about this project, about the features we implemented, how it got started, please watch the other videos on Indiegogo or in the video description.

We gathered feedback from users and implemented it into the hardware and the software of this device. If you search youtube, you will find well-known YouTubers like Jehu Garcia that reviewed this device and gave their opinion.

When you are ready, please choose the right level you want to get in, and let's continue building this project together.

We plan to keep the investment window open for two weeks. After this period, we will close the campaign and begin manufacturing this batch.

As I said before, we will pay the money back plus interest in the perks' order. So being between the first will allow you to get back your investment faster. You are cashing in the first month when we receive the devices in stock.

The minimum order is already reached at the factory, we will purchase 150 devices ourselves, so there will be no issues for not meeting the minimum order.

We purchased first, but we will collect the money last. Investors will have priority in collecting their investment back plus the interest.

I hope you will choose to work with us on this project and make money together while providing a great device that reduces electronics waste and gives others the possibility of earning money while helping the environment.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me at alex@megacellcharger.com.

If you intend to invest in purchasing more than 100 devices, get in touch and discuss the details.

All the best!

Alex

 


 

The first round of user funding presentation

 

Megacellcharger Funding Milestones

$34 000 – Minimum Goal
Reaching the minimum goal will allow us to produce the new PCB design and to pay for a plastic injection mold to produce the plastic case instead of 3D printing it and 300 trees planted.

$70 000 – Great Goal
Create packaging that includes printed documentation, USB stick with video instructions, protective foam shaped for the charger, power supply and wires to fit in and 650 trees planted.

Apart from redesigning the 3D version of the charger, I also took the time to 3D print and fully assembly the new version to make sure everything fits in properly.

Here’s the list of features that we’ve got into Megacellcharger so far:

It has a capacity of 16 cells

It allows independent charging and discharging

You can set the discharge rate between 100 to 1000 mAh

It charges with up to 1 amp per cell with a specialized chip to ensure a proper and safe charging

It detects low voltage cells starting from 1 volt and attempts a slow recovery until reaching 3 volts then it continues normally until fully charged.

We have implemented a workflow that allows setting multiple charge / discharge cycles and charging back to a voltage that’s safe for storing or transportation to comply with the newest DOT and IATA regulations

There’s software available for Desktop, IOS and Android to manage the charger

It has the ability to store the data resulted from tests in a database and use it to build balanced packs afterwards

You can have multiple devices connecting to the software

Graphs for charging, discharging and temperature variations

Temperature sensors for each cell and the ability to stop a process per cell in case the temperature goes over the set threshold. This has been a key feature added to improve the safety of the testing process.

Low noise 50 mm cooling fans with individual radiators to safely dissipate the resulting heat from the discharging process.

The software is integrated with dyno 450 label printing, speeding up the workflow for tagging your cells with the required information for the sorting process.

While our main area of expertise is not testing equipment, using our programming and hardware development past experience helped us to quickly get a great product together and we are still not done with the improvements yet.

But we need your help now.

 

In order to get this project to mass production which includes proper assembly line, quality testing and packing, we must reach $34 000 worth of orders or above to get a good deal from the factory and afford the plastic injection molds that will allow creating a high quality case for the hardware.

The actual minimum amount the factory asked for is $39 000, but if we reach the goal we set, I will be more than happy to put in the remaining $5000 and push this project for mass production.

For me this project is more than a product that I can produce and sell for a profit. It represents a way to improve a process that has the potential to save lots of wasted materials and resources that have been used to produce these batteries.

I am not a big environmental activist, but if I see a way to improve things and I can help with that, I will definitely go for it.

The way I see it, is that if the testing process is simple and fast enough, more and more people will begin testing these cells, giving them a second life and lowering the demand for producing new cells.

 

To make this project even more environmentally helpful, I have decided with my team to work on a plan that will allow us to plant a tree for each Megacellcharger that we sell. We already come up with a plan to build a planting tree device that uses electric power and I think it will be a lot of fun to build. We will share the plans of the device soon as we already begin working on making this happen.

So for each Megacellcharger sold and for each pledge over $10, we are going to plant a tree. We are going to film the process and show what we come up with for planting trees efficiently and eco friendly without using any gas generators or gas engines.

I hope you will find this idea as interesting as we did and that you can help us make it happen. If you cannot afford purchasing an item, sharing this page and the video is another way you can help us to reach our goal.

 

If you are interested in supporting this project, you can choose a reward from the right side of this page or go to megacellcharger.com if you happen to watch this video on youtube on or other platforms.

On the right side you will find all the rewards that we thought it will make sense for you.

If you happen to need a different type of reward, like getting us to install these chargers on a facility for you or doing a live call to explain how the system will work, feel free to reach me at alex@megacellcharger.com and we will find a way to help you out.

Thank you for your time and I wish you all the best in life!

Alex

story:
Integrated electronics brew an incredible cup of coffee or tea, from start to finish, in an all in one cup you can take anywhere. Featuring a 130W Heater and integrated French Press, this 16oz, doubled-walled mug will not only brew your drink, but it will keep your drink hot for hours.

 

 

Need your French Press coffee, but can't stay put long enough to enjoy it? Meet GoSun Brew, the ultimate off-grid coffee machine for people on the go.

  • Spacious. Insulated mug holds 16oz (473ml), so you don’t have to be stingy.
  • Easy to clean. Stainless-steel mug is BPA free & dishwasher safe.
  • Convenient. Fits in car cup holder, plus every car has a 12V outlet.

 

 

All-in-one heater, press and travel mug. There are a bunch of appliances that become obsolete when you have the GoSun Brew.  You no longer need:  Grid Power, Fuel or Fire, Stove or Hot Plate or Microwave, Kettle to boil water, French press to brew coffee, Mug or cup to drink.

 

 

 

GoSun Brew makes coffee easy, deploying 100 year old French Press tech with an integrated heater. Brew fresh coffee in as little as 15 minutes: 1) add water 2) plug in Brew to power, heat for 10 minutes (wait til auto shut-off and LED indicator) 3) add coffee grounds and steep 4) add Lid and French Press 5) Leak-Proof Lid lets you go on the move, 6) Enjoy!!

 

Making coffee is critical but Brew can do more, up to 16oz at a time. Thinking only in terms of the world's highest traded commodity (coffee) is so limiting.  GoSun Brew can also:

  • Reheat beverages and food like baby formula, sauces.
  • Brew tea, hot chocolate, matcha, yerba, milk, cider.
  • Make instant meals like oatmeal, ramen noodles, soups, and more.
  • Maintain your drink's preferred temperature.
  • Pasteurize water (allows contaminated water to be consumable).

 

There are a million ways to make a cup of coffee, but GoSun Brew is by far the most simple and mobile.  Just add coffee grounds or loose tea and water, Brew will do the rest. Plug into the car, truck, boat, RV or GoSun's portable Power 266.

 

 

FREEDOM!! GoSun's mission is to bring you more independence and resilience. If you want an incredible cup of coffee, you are no longer beholden to fire or Starbucks®, and no more bumming off your neighbor, either. 

 

Brewing coffee or tea while traveling, camping, or during a power outage, is nearly impossible without burning something. Unfortunately, fire bans (including stoves and BBQ) are increasing since fire threats are elevated. Fire is dangerous and highly destructive, we need to stop the burn and go solar! GoSun Brew enables you to get a good cup of hot coffee, no matter what.

 

GoSun Delivers.

GoSun is leading the fuel-free frontier, utilizing the best in clean tech to help you USE MORE SUN. We love being outdoors, sharing our experiences and staying connected, but we hate running out of power and we hate missing our morning coffee - that's why we created both GoSun Brew and GoSun Power.

 

GoSun has your critical needs met. GoSun Power 266 is a compact powerbank with enough energy and outlets to charge almost any electronics you have.

Drink up, there's energy for eight cups of coffee in the optional GoSun Power 266 powerbank. With the best power to weight of all energy devices out there, GoSun Power 266 is super versatile with the ability to fuel almost every laptop made.  Plus, when it’s time to recharge, you can truly rely on the solar upgrades to remain off-grid.

 

 

The Power 266 was developed to solve the empty battery issue, once and for all.  Small enough to go anywhere and serious solar charging capabilities means you have a Solar Powerplant in your pocket.

 

 

Beyond coffee, the GoSun Power is capable of delivering speedy charges to multiple devices at once:

  1. Qi wireless charger for phones, earpods and wearables
  2. Two USB-C ports with incredible functionality
  3. Adjustable DC port from 12 to 24 volts for laptops and electronics
  4. Flashlight
  5. Standard USB port
  6. Gigh amperage (15A) 12V cigarette port.

 

 

Compare to traditional portable power, GoSun Power is lighter, quieter, simpler, and maintenance-free. It's everything you need and nothing more - no moving parts, no inefficient inverter, no liquid fuels, no complications.

 

Starting with the Sun, our primary source of energy on planet Earth, opt for one of three solar options: 

  1. SolarPanel 30
  2. SolarPanel 30 (2x) 
  3.  Solar Table 120 (120 watts multi-crystaline)

Every Power 266 comes with the ability to charge with an AC Adapter (included) and with USB-C.

 

Each battery comes with two DC powercords and eight common DC adapters for appliances such as: laptops, air compressors, fans, lights, routers, speakers, vacuums, electronics, cameras, etc.

 

 

  • Just 3 pounds. Enough energy to recharge the average laptop four times or the average cell phone up to 20 times, GoSun Power is built to pack as much energy into the smallest form possible.
  • Power 5 devices at once. Power 266 is equipped to run your laptop, several phones, and your portable fridge all at the same time and all day long.
  • Recharge with the Sun. GoSun knows solar and we make sure you can rely on the Sun to get the job done.  No other powerbank integrates solar with such ease and efficiency.
  • 5X your laptop battery. Your laptop, tablet and phone work hard these days and with Power 266 you have the ability to recharge over and over.  
  • Adjustable DC outlet. Lets you put power into your electronics at the voltage they require. This expands beyond laptops to include devices such as: modems, routers, speakers, lights, pumps, motors, other powerbanks, etc. 

Not sure if your laptop can be run off Power? GoSun will help you find the right powercord or adapter for your device.  

GoSun is here to bring Portable Power for the People, so we’ve made Power 266 to travel with you. Toss it in a backpack, the included Carry Case or the Power Pouch (included with Solar Table and Chill) that fit GoSun Brew and tons of other accessories.

 

 

It's the age of innovation, yet we are still burning fuels to make electricity and brew coffee.  Now, we have the ability to harness the Sun’s power better than ever, taking generators, extension cords and gas stoves out of the equation.  GoSun engineered an energy package that runs all your devices, minimizes complexity and can always be recharged with solar.

  • Carry the sun. portable and compact.
  • Harness in seconds. unfold and absorb power.
  • Solar brew, solar cool and solar cook. No ice, no fuel, no flames, no mess.

Capable of brewing eight cups of coffee in one charge, GoSun Power holds 266 Watt Hours or 72,000mAH of lithium ion stored energy. For its size, it stores a huge amount of energy, and it's very easy to recharge again and again. 

 

 

The 15 Amp, 12 volt power outlet is powerful enough to run an air compressor, CPAP machine, appliances and our very own GoSun Chill, Portable Fridge, and GoSun Fusion, Hybrid Solar Oven that can cook at night.

 

You never know when you’ll need a flashlight. Instead of relying on your phone’s light, the Power 266's light is eight times brighter and it lasts for days. Since Power 266 fits in your hand, it functions as a flashlight better than most flashlights.

 

Recharge with either the AC Adapter (included), an USB-C or one of three solar options. Refill in as little as 4 hours. The above estimated charge times consider a fully depleted battery.

 

 

 We all want to live more independent, healthy and resilient lives. GoSun has developed breakthrough solar technologies that can cook, cool, clean, light, power electronics, and purify. These affordable products are all portable, highly efficient and free of harmful emissions.

 

 

Kickstarter pricing is the lowest possible at over 40% off retail, because backers are pre-ordering months in advance. We've structured the rewards so they build off of one another, with each package including the items in the lower tier rewards.

 

 

How the GoSun Brews: Use Case Video

This 5min video takes you through the entire process of making a 12oz cup of coffee with GoSun Brew.  

 

When To Expect Your Brew & Power

This is GoSun's 9th crowdfunded product, and we've always delivered.  The GoSun Brew has been in development for years, so we are ready for production. Your pledge and this campaign will caffeinate the Brew's manufacturing.

Technical Specs

GoSun is committed to making the highest quality and most accessible solar powered products.  We build products to be relied on day in and day out, so you can get the most from them.  Take a look at the Specs or FAQ's and then send us a message if you don't find your answer. We are happy to help.

 

 

 

How to use GoSun Brew:

  1.  Remove Lid and Fill GoSun Brew with up to 16oz (473ml) of fresh water
  2.  Plug Brew's 130 watt heater into Power 266 or any 15A, 12V source (car, boat, truck, RV, etc) 
  3.  Wait until the red heating light changes to a green light at about 200°F, 93°C (takes about 10-15 minutes depending on volume and temperatures)
  4.  Pour in two tablespoons of coffee grounds and stir lightly.  Add French Press lid.
  5.  After four minutes of steeping,  push French Press plunger down, sending grounds to bottom
  6.  Cool as needed, and Enjoy a cup of energizing dark juice

 

GoSun Power 266 Average Number of Recharges 

  • Phone (12 Wh): 22
  • Tablet (30 Wh): 9
  • Laptop (50 Wh): 5
  • POV Camera (5 Wh): 53
  • DSLR Camera (18 Wh): 15

 

GoSun Power 266 Hours of Runtime

  • Light Bulb (11 W): 24H
  • CPAP (65 W intermittent): 33H
  • TV (42" LED) (100 W): 8.5H
  • GoSun Chill: Portable Fridge (35 W intermittent): 26H
  • GoSun Fusion: Hybrid Solar Oven (110 W): 2.4H
  • GoSun Coffee: Mug, Press & Heater (130 W):2.1H

 

 

GoSun has become known as one of the world’s top manufacturers of innovative solar products that can cook, cool, charge, clean, light and purify-- and now with the GoSun Brew and Power 266, you can brew fresh coffee and charge your electronics.

This is our ninth crowdfunding project, and we always deliver. GoSun has become a leader in  breakthrough solar technologies that make outdoor, healthy and clean living a reality through innovation and thoughtful design...and lots of coffee.

Risks and challenges

GoSun has been working for months to get this product ready for production. Here are a few risks and challenges:

Manufacturing: We have our own final assembly plant, but the sub-manufacturing suppliers are going to need our quality assurance people on site during production. There are a lot of parts that come together for GoSun Brew and Power, so this will require a lot of coordination.

Delays: Given the global COVID situation, disruptions could occur with various suppliers or deliveries, but we have been working with all our relationships since the middle of 2020 and we are confident that delays will be minimal, if at all.

Fulfillment: Power 266 is considered a dangerous good for air travel so we have to ship via sea and road. Sometimes things happen that can’t be planned for - a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. These unknowns could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you and we’ll maintain open communication with you throughout our process.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

High grade materials like stainless steel and 100% silicone. Carry Case for safe storage and organization. Simple, durable electronics to minimize failures.

Reusability and recyclability

Rechargeable batteries paired with solar panels for maximum cycling and longevity. The vast majority of lithium ion batteries are recycled. Also, this campaign eliminates waste from coffee cups, filters, K-cups and fuel canisters.

Sustainable materials

Avoiding the use of fossil fuels is critical. Solar energy is far more valuable than energy made from coal, natural gas, nuclear, oil or fire, because it is cleaner, more direct and has very little externalized cost.

Environmentally friendly factories

GoSun is very careful in choosing suppliers with high environmental standards. Additionally, our manufacturing partners maintain a strong worker's rights program to ensure people are safe and comfortable.

Sustainable Distribution

No air travel will be used in the fulfillment of this project.

 

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ
story_txt:
Integrated electronics brew an incredible cup of coffee or tea, from start to finish, in an all in one cup you can take anywhere. Featuring a 130W Heater and integrated French Press, this 16oz, doubled-walled mug will not only brew your drink, but it will keep your drink hot for hours.  Need your French Press coffee, but can't stay put long enough to enjoy it? Meet GoSun Brew, the ultimate off-grid coffee machine for people on the go.

Spacious. Insulated mug holds 16oz (473ml), so you don’t have to be stingy.

Easy to clean. Stainless-steel mug is BPA free & dishwasher safe.

Convenient. Fits in car cup holder, plus every car has a 12V outlet.
  All-in-one heater, press and travel mug. There are a bunch of appliances that become obsolete when you have the GoSun Brew.  You no longer need:  Grid Power, Fuel or Fire, Stove or Hot Plate or Microwave, Kettle to boil water, French press to brew coffee, Mug or cup to drink.   GoSun Brew makes coffee easy, deploying 100 year old French Press tech with an integrated heater. Brew fresh coffee in as little as 15 minutes: 1) add water 2) plug in Brew to power, heat for 10 minutes (wait til auto shut-off and LED indicator) 3) add coffee grounds and steep 4) add Lid and French Press 5) Leak-Proof Lid lets you go on the move, 6) Enjoy!! Making coffee is critical but Brew can do more, up to 16oz at a time. Thinking only in terms of the world's highest traded commodity (coffee) is so limiting.  GoSun Brew can also:
Reheat beverages and food like baby formula, sauces.
Brew tea, hot chocolate, matcha, yerba, milk, cider.
Make instant meals like oatmeal, ramen noodles, soups, and more.
Maintain your drink's preferred temperature.
Pasteurize water (allows contaminated water to be consumable).
 There are a million ways to make a cup of coffee, but GoSun Brew is by far the most simple and mobile.  Just add coffee grounds or loose tea and water, Brew will do the rest. Plug into the car, truck, boat, RV or GoSun's portable Power 266.  FREEDOM!! GoSun's mission is to bring you more independence and resilience. If you want an incredible cup of coffee, you are no longer beholden to fire or Starbucks®, and no more bumming off your neighbor, either.  Brewing coffee or tea while traveling, camping, or during a power outage, is nearly impossible without burning something. Unfortunately, fire bans (including stoves and BBQ) are increasing since fire threats are elevated. Fire is dangerous and highly destructive, we need to stop the burn and go solar! GoSun Brew enables you to get a good cup of hot coffee, no matter what. GoSun Delivers.GoSun is leading the fuel-free frontier, utilizing the best in clean tech to help you USE MORE SUN. We love being outdoors, sharing our experiences and staying connected, but we hate running out of power and we hate missing our morning coffee - that's why we created both GoSun Brew and GoSun Power. GoSun has your critical needs met. GoSun Power 266 is a compact powerbank with enough energy and outlets to charge almost any electronics you have.Drink up, there's energy for eight cups of coffee in the optional GoSun Power 266 powerbank. With the best power to weight of all energy devices out there, GoSun Power 266 is super versatile with the ability to fuel almost every laptop made.  Plus, when it’s time to recharge, you can truly rely on the solar upgrades to remain off-grid.  The Power 266 was developed to solve the empty battery issue, once and for all.  Small enough to go anywhere and serious solar charging capabilities means you have a Solar Powerplant in your pocket.  Beyond coffee, the GoSun Power is capable of delivering speedy charges to multiple devices at once:
Qi wireless charger for phones, earpods and wearables
Two USB-C ports with incredible functionality
Adjustable DC port from 12 to 24 volts for laptops and electronics
Flashlight
Standard USB port
Gigh amperage (15A) 12V cigarette port.
  Compare to traditional portable power, GoSun Power is lighter, quieter, simpler, and maintenance-free. It's everything you need and nothing more - no moving parts, no inefficient inverter, no liquid fuels, no complications. Starting with the Sun, our primary source of energy on planet Earth, opt for one of three solar options: 
SolarPanel 30
SolarPanel 30 (2x) 
 Solar Table 120 (120 watts multi-crystaline)
Every Power 266 comes with the ability to charge with an AC Adapter (included) and with USB-C. Each battery comes with two DC powercords and eight common DC adapters for appliances such as: laptops, air compressors, fans, lights, routers, speakers, vacuums, electronics, cameras, etc.  

Just 3 pounds. Enough energy to recharge the average laptop four times or the average cell phone up to 20 times, GoSun Power is built to pack as much energy into the smallest form possible.

story:
Short Summary

Starting in a classroom project at UT-Austin, we came together to tackle the challenge of food waste occurring in grocery stores. After many rounds of observations and interviews, we discovered a major issue in grocers - there was an apparent lack of granular data about their waste. Tapping into our STEM backgrounds, we wanted to leverage the power of data and technology and fill the knowledge gap. We are currently testing and building a data collection and analysis tool called the Throw-A-Weigh. Your donations will support our mission of empowering grocers to make data-driven decisions for reducing their food waste.

What We Need

We're asking for $6,000 to put towards prototyping and product development. We currently have a low-fidelity, hacked-together-in-a-garage prototype that has some basic functionality, but we want to work with the UT Mechanical Engineering senior design program to design and assemble a higher-fidelity prototype with some bells and whistles (i.e., additional sensors,  sleeker industrial design, ability to sort produce based on quality, etc.). Working with a senior design team costs $5,000, and we're padding an additional $1,000 to put towards prototyping materials.

The Impact

Every year, 5 billion pounds of produce goes to waste, a $16 billion dollar cost. For individual stores, they lose 12% of their produce section, an average of $7 million per year. From our conversations with produce managers, account managers, buyers, and directors in grocery stores, as well as other experts and entrepreneurs working in tandem on the issue of food waste, it is clear that this has been an ongoing issue with no clear solution in sight. Food waste is so ubiquitous that it has become a part of "doing business," to the point that some believe waste is a sign of good business. We're here to change that and show that you can solve food waste and still be profitable. Data is not the ultimate solution to fighting food waste, but it is a starting point for identifying preventive solutions. As they say, you can't measure what you don't know.

On top of food waste being a waste of land, water, fertilizer, transportation, and other resources, it contributes to greenhouse gas emissions, totaling up to 8% of global greenhouse gases. In the U.S., food waste is the single largest category of material (24%) in landfills, where landfills contribute 20% of total U.S. methane emissions. According to Project Drawdown’s modeling of “plausible and economically realistic” climate change solutions, reducing food waste is the #1 solution when it comes to reducing carbon dioxide emissions (projected 87.45 gigatons CO2 reduced between 2020-2050). With the urgency of climate change and the ever-growing necessity to avoid the 2°C global temperature increase, we believe it is imperative to implement any and all solutions that will slow down greenhouse gas emissions. 

Let's make sustainability more affordable and more achievable.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love to connect with those in corporate roles in grocery store companies, food banks and non-profits distributing food, and potential team members and collaborative partners who are interested in our mission. You can also follow our LinkedIn page here: https://www.linkedin.com/company/throw-a-weigh or leave a message on our website here: throwaweigh.com.

story:
CLOSING MONDAY!

Join us in building a new transportation future for the Philippines!

 

Greetings and welcome to our Crowdfunding campaign

This campaign has been conducted in 2 parts:

  1. COMPLETE - to raise short-term funds to help me keep our house in order, while proceeding through the investment process to re-launch sunE in its next phase (details below).
  2. ONGOING - To test initial market impressions and interest in a Canadian investment fund dedicated to investing into solar-backed transportation projects in the Philippines

 

Short Summary

    This campaign is being conducted by Allan Gray, one of the founders of sunE.  This campaign started 2 weeks ago with me raising personal funds to meet short-term cash requirements (from friends and family).

    I am listing this campaign on Indiegogo because I believe that the Filipino diaspora in Canada is the key to unlocking the true potential of solar-backed transportation in the country.  So now, we intend to apply whatever additional funds are raised to the legal fees related to setting up a fully-compliant Canadian fund targeted at funding solar-backed transportation projects in the Philippines.

Please note: Indiegogo restricts financial rewards from its campaigns so this page is going to be a bit confusing. Contributions to this campaign will be treated as an expression of interest in the concept of the fund described above.

To get involved, you have 3 options:

  • Follow the campaign
  • Sign up for our newsletter: https://www.sunetrike.com/newsletter/
  • Sign up for the Swag-buckler perk, to receive our t-shirt promotion
  • Make another contribution of your choosing

To receive a shirt, please enroll through one of the listed perks. 

Regular contributions do not trigger a shirt delivery!

 

Background

In late 2015, sunE arrived in the Philippines with the belief that this is among the best countries in the world to develop and deploy solar-electric transportation.  This is because the country has some of the world’s highest power costs, abundant solar resources and a power network distributed across thousands of islands.

      In mid-2016, sunE secured its first contract providing Clean, Comfortable and Cost-Effective transportation services to a private subdivision in Batangas province.  Between 2016 and 2019, the pilot project achieved the following (see FAQs for some clarifications):

  • 16-18 hours per day
  • 365 days per year
  • >99.9% service level uptime
  • ~30% ROI
  • Passed 100 000 rides within first 12 months of operation

These results led to us becoming among the first labelled solutions of the Solar Impulse Foundation is SE Asia.  As a group of avid outdoors-men and adventurers, we are supremely grateful for the chance to keep such inspiring company.

Click here to see a small sample of the vast universe of Solar impulse solutions.

    The transportation industry was hit very hard by Covid in 2020 and our pilot project was no exception.  Towards the end of 2020, we elected to consolidate our resources, relocate to the nearby city where we have the strongest relationships (Calamba, Laguna) and pivot our focus towards the higher-level long-term requirements of the industry such as supply chain and manufacturing.

    In late 2020, sunE’s supercap project was accepted into the HK Science and Technology Park’s pre-incubation program.  At around the same time, sunE met a very strong candidate for its cornerstone investor.  As of today (Apr 8 2021), nothing is signed but we are extremely optimistic about their quality, integrity and compatibility with our plan and vision.

At the end of the day, I am faced with the choice of:

  1. borrowing more funds  OR
  2. walking away from the past 5 years of blood, sweat and tears which have been poured into  sunE

I still strongly believe sunE is going to pave the way to low-carbon transportation for this sector.  So clearly, I am pursuing option 1.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is to raise CAD 12,800 to last the next 4 months (until mid-late August).  We expect our negotiations with the investors to have concluded by that time, in one way or another:

$6000 to 7500 - Short-term cash requirements (especially related to end of year taxes, licenses, etc)

$5000 to 7000 - Legal set-up of Manitoba investment fund

Because this is a new approach and has many regulatory uncertainties in front of it, I am raising the first block of funds primarily from long-time friends/colleagues. 

If you don’t know me already, Your voice in this is super important because this is the first time we are introducing this to the market.  I’ll be excited to hear from you and will be sure to keep you posted on developments as they come together.

 

The Impact

Growing up in Northern BC, I had front row seats to the early evidence of the destructive nature of GHG-induced climate change.  During high-school, I watched entire forests turn red and die from unhampered mountain-pine beetle infestations.  By the time I finished my geology degree in 2012 more than half of BC’s lodgepole pine forests had already been killed by the beetles.  Several years later 2018 and 2019 were both historic record years for fires in the province. 

See the source of the picture for more information there are also additional details in the FAQs

Besides electricity generation, transportation is the second largest source of GHG emissions in most countries.  One of the common criticisms of electric vehicles today is that in a coal-dominated power grid, rapid introduction of electric vehicles may actually lead to an increase in GHG.  In wealthier countries, highway rated vehicles consume far more electricity per km than can be produced by a solar array of a similar footprint.  However, in the low-speed vehicles commonly used in countries such as the Philippines, a local solar array is much more attractive.  We anticipate generating 60-80% of energy requirements on islands with stable, reliable grids and are excited to get to 100% solar on more rural and remote islands.

 

Main Drivers for the fund

Filipinos in Canada are crucial to this picture for 2 reasons:

  • Being much more environmentally conscious and aware than most in Philippines (especially rural)
  • Having the purchasing power to do something about it.

Remittances from overseas workers are a major driver of economic development in countries like the Philippines (10-15% of GDP).  These flows are generally conducted through informal channels such as Western Union.  However, many of these funds are eventually invested into private land transportation vehicles.  My informal surveys over the years have revealed more Canadian flags on Filipino jeepneys than any flags from any other country.  So this kind of investment is already happening today.

 

Risks & Challenges

The regulations around traditional crowdfunding (ie Indiegogo) prohibit giving financial rewards to backers.  In recent years, Canadian securities regulations have been expanded to accommodate equity crowdfunding.  However, investment funds are not accommodated within this provision.  What this probably means, in practical terms, is that our planned fund will not qualify for the prospectus exemption given to companies currently licensed for equity crowdfunding.  For more information about the current state of Canadian equity crowdfunding regulations, please check here: https://ncfacanada.org/equity-crowdfunding-regu...

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think that this kind of a fund is worth setting up, please share the word around to people you think might be interested. Cheers!
story_txt:
CLOSING MONDAY!

Join us in building a new transportation future for the Philippines!
 
Greetings and welcome to our Crowdfunding campaign
This campaign has been conducted in 2 parts:

COMPLETE - to raise short-term funds to help me keep our house in order, while proceeding through the investment process to re-launch sunE in its next phase (details below).
ONGOING - To test initial market impressions and interest in a Canadian investment fund dedicated to investing into solar-backed transportation projects in the Philippines

 
Short Summary
    This campaign is being conducted by Allan Gray, one of the founders of sunE.  This campaign started 2 weeks ago with me raising personal funds to meet short-term cash requirements (from friends and family).
    I am listing this campaign on Indiegogo because I believe that the Filipino diaspora in Canada is the key to unlocking the true potential of solar-backed transportation in the country.  So now, we intend to apply whatever additional funds are raised to the legal fees related to setting up a fully-compliant Canadian fund targeted at funding solar-backed transportation projects in the Philippines.
Please note: Indiegogo restricts financial rewards from its campaigns so this page is going to be a bit confusing. Contributions to this campaign will be treated as an expression of interest in the concept of the fund described above.
To get involved, you have 3 options:

Follow the campaign
Sign up for our newsletter: https://www.sunetrike.com/newsletter/

Sign up for the Swag-buckler perk, to receive our t-shirt promotion
Make another contribution of your choosing

To receive a shirt, please enroll through one of the listed perks.  
Regular contributions do not trigger a shirt delivery!
 Background
In late 2015, sunE arrived in the Philippines with the belief that this is among the best countries in the world to develop and deploy solar-electric transportation.  This is because the country has some of the world’s highest power costs, abundant solar resources and a power network distributed across thousands of islands.

      In mid-2016, sunE secured its first contract providing Clean, Comfortable and Cost-Effective transportation services to a private subdivision in Batangas province.  Between 2016 and 2019, the pilot project achieved the following (see FAQs for some clarifications):

16-18 hours per day
365 days per year
>99.9% service level uptime
~30% ROI
Passed 100 000 rides within first 12 months of operation


These results led to us becoming among the first labelled solutions of the Solar Impulse Foundation is SE Asia.  As a group of avid outdoors-men and adventurers, we are supremely grateful for the chance to keep such inspiring company.

Click here to see a small sample of the vast universe of Solar impulse solutions.
    The transportation industry was hit very hard by Covid in 2020 and our pilot project was no exception.  Towards the end of 2020, we elected to consolidate our resources, relocate to the nearby city where we have the strongest relationships (Calamba, Laguna) and pivot our focus towards the higher-level long-term requirements of the industry such as supply chain and manufacturing.
    In late 2020, sunE’s supercap project was accepted into the HK Science and Technology Park’s pre-incubation program.  At around the same time, sunE met a very strong candidate for its cornerstone investor.  As of today (Apr 8 2021), nothing is signed but we are extremely optimistic about their quality, integrity and compatibility with our plan and vision.
At the end of the day, I am faced with the choice of:

borrowing more funds  OR
walking away from the past 5 years of blood, sweat and tears which have been poured into  sunE

I still strongly believe sunE is going to pave the way to low-carbon transportation for this sector.  So clearly, I am pursuing option 1.
 
What We Need & What You Get
This campaign is to raise CAD 12,800 to last the next 4 months (until mid-late August).  We expect our negotiations with the investors to have concluded by that time, in one way or another:
$6000 to 7500 - Short-term cash requirements (especially related to end of year taxes, licenses, etc)
$5000 to 7000 - Legal set-up of Manitoba investment fund
Because this is a new approach and has many regulatory uncertainties in front of it, I am raising the first block of funds primarily from long-time friends/colleagues. 
If you don’t know me already, Your voice in this is super important because this is the first time we are introducing this to the market.  I’ll be excited to hear from you and will be sure to keep you posted on developments as they come together. The Impact
Growing up in Northern BC, I had front row seats to the early evidence of the destructive nature of GHG-induced climate change.  During high-school, I watched entire forests turn red and die from unhampered mountain-pine beetle infestations.  By the time I finished my geology degree in 2012 more than half of BC’s lodgepole pine forests had already been killed by the beetles.  Several years later 2018 and 2019 were both historic record years for fires in the province. 

See the source of the picture for more information there are also additional details in the FAQs
Besides electricity generation, transportation is the second largest source of GHG emissions in most countries.  One of the common criticisms of electric vehicles today is that in a coal-dominated power grid, rapid introduction of electric vehicles may actually lead to an increase in GHG.  In wealthier countries, highway rated vehicles consume far more electricity per km than can be produced by a solar array of a similar footprint.  However, in the low-speed vehicles commonly used in countries such as the Philippines, a local solar array is much more attractive.  We anticipate generating 60-80% of energy requirements on islands with stable, reliable grids and are excited to get to 100% solar on more rural and remote islands.
 
Main Drivers for the fund
Filipinos in Canada are crucial to this picture for 2 reasons:

Being much more environmentally conscious and aware than most in Philippines (especially rural)
Having the purchasing power to do something about it.

Remittances from overseas workers are a major driver of economic development in countries like the Philippines (10-15% of GDP).  These flows are generally conducted through informal channels such as Western Union.  However, many of these funds are eventually invested into private land transportation vehicles.  My informal surveys over the years have revealed more Canadian flags on Filipino jeepneys than any flags from any other country.  So this kind of investment is already happening today.

 
Risks & Challenges
The regulations around traditional crowdfunding (ie Indiegogo) prohibit giving financial rewards to backers.  In recent years, Canadian securities regulations have been expanded to accommodate equity crowdfunding.  However, investment funds are not accommodated within this provision.  What this probably means, in practical terms, is that our planned fund will not qualify for the prospectus exemption given to companies currently licensed for equity crowdfunding.  For more information about the current state of Canadian equity crowdfunding regulations, please check here: https://ncfacanada.org/equity-crowdfunding-regu... Other Ways You Can Help
If you think that this kind of a fund is worth setting up, please share the word around to people you think might be interested. Cheers!

story:
Check out ONveexen 100 fully recharged in 50 Mins 

Test result:

5 Minutes for 20%
15 Minutes for 50% 
35 Minutes for 90%
50 Minutes for 99%

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Equipped with three USB-C and one USB-A output plus two wireless charging allows you to fast charge 6 devices simultaneously. ONveexen 100 pumps out up to 100W output to charge any USB-C electronics, with a total output up to 265W for an unparalleled mobile charging experience.

Demo Video:

 

ONveexen 100 is equipped with an ultra-high 27000mAh capacity battery to power, 3 USB-C Ports: Dual 100W Input/Output, and 45W Output, along with 1 USB-A Port with 22.5W Output. What’s more, ONveexen 100 provides the fastest 15W wireless charging for compatible devices!  It’s the ultimate everyday power companion at home or on the go.

Charging speed matters. Unlike typical 60W power banks on the market, ONveexen 100 is a game changer. With powerful dual USB-C 100W fast charging outputs, you can juice up two MacBook Pro 16" (96W) at the same time with super high speed charging.

 

ONveexen 100 instantly adds modern convenience to your life. Leave the cords behind and simply place your phone, watch or other wireless charging compatible devices on the center of the power bank and let ONveexen power you up with 15W of fast wireless charging anytime, anywhere.


With a massive 27000mAH ultra-high capacity on-board battery, ONveexen 100 provides incredible output, enough for 8 full charges for iPhone 12. Say goodbye to low-battery anxiety and power out situations.

 

ONveexen 100 is compatible with a wide range of electronic devices with USB ports.  It can charge phones, tablets, laptops, speakers, cameras, GoPros, headphones drones and more. The wireless charging feature can be used on your phones, Airpods, Airpods Pro and smart watches. Leave redundant adapters at home and charge all your devices conveniently with one power bank.

 

Never run out of power. ONveexen 100 adopts Dual 100W USB-C technology that can not only charge your devices with 100W power delivery, but also quickly recharge the power bank at 200W of input power, achieving a full recharge in just 50 mins and a 90 % recharge in 35 mins.

Demo Video:

Test Result:

5 Minutes for 20%
15 Minutes for 50% 
35 Minutes for 90%
50 Minutes for 99%

 

ONveexen 100 features a MagSafe compatible charger equipped with magnets that connect securely to the back of your iPhone 12, 12 Pro and 12 Pro Max to charge your phone wirelessly!

 

Designed to keep you moving efficiently through your day, ONveexen is capable of CCCV charging. This feature allows you to plug the powerbank into a wall outlet and recharge it while simultaneously charging your connected devices in a safe manner.

 

Take ONveexen 100 on-the-go for travel, camping, live streaming and business work. Get the fastest airline-safe charger in a compact powerful solution for only 1.48 lbs that won’t ever weigh you down.

 

With an on-board digital OLED display, you can easily monitor essential charging date in real-time including current, temperature，voltage, and capacity information at a glance. No need to guess at the remaining battery power, you can gain convenience and efficiency with ONveexen 100 !

 

ONveexen 100 has added features such as a powerful built-in LED flashlight that makes a perfect companion for outdoor activities such as camping, cycling, fishing, traveling, hiking and lighting up the night for emergencies. Leading you through darkness can be a lifesaver.

 

ONveexen 100 comes with a solar panel, so you can choose to charge the power bank with two methods, USB Ports or solar charging. Enjoy cable-free charging on a sunny day!

 

Powered by the Tesla-design batteries, the top-level battery widely used in Tesla cars ensures you to power multiple devices fast while on the go. Safe, fast and versatile.

 

Electronic device safety matters. ONveexen 100 comes with the leading industry certification,  along with the IP 53 waterproof and  IP 53 dustproof, overheating, overload, short circuit, reset , high-voltage, low-voltage, over -current and chip thermal shutdown protection, provides enhanced protection while in use.

 

With a full metal aluminum alloy appearance, compact, ergonomic design, clean lines and scratchproof exterior. ONveexen 100 fits in a pocket or backpack and makes a stylish addition to your daily essentials.

 

Enjoy non-stop power even while traveling. ONveexen 100 is airline travel friendly and 100% safe on flights. Carry ONveexen 100 around the world with you and never worry about power.

ONveexen 100 is airline travel friendly and 100% safe on flights. Carry ONveexen 100 around the world with you and never worry about power.

story:
In times of emergency, the HydraCell Cube is designed to work anywhere by simply adding saltwater.

Powerlines taken out by a windstorm? Backpacking or camping off the grid? Prepping your bunker for the all-to-certain dissolution of society as we know it?

Introducing the HydraCell Cube, the first practical water-activated fuel cell.

 

One of the biggest frustrations with conventional batteries is when you go to use them they are already dead.

Sure, some are rechargeable, but you don't need a charge in hours. You need power now.

You needed to make that call to 911 NOW.

You needed a light NOW.

With the HydraCell Cube, simply add saltwater and you'll have power available immediately.

 

 

  • Instantly produces power simply by adding salt water.
     
  • Charges 5 to 10 phones on a single set of replaceable charge plates.
     
  • Provides 50 (high-light mode) to 100 (low-light mode) hours of light using the HydraCell Accessory Light on a single set of replaceable charge plates.
     
  • The HydraCell Cube is eco-friendly. The waste produced is totally biodegradable.
     
  • The HydraCell itself is made from recyclable plastic.

 

1. Emergency Preparedness / Hardcore Survivalists:  

Be prepared for anything! Cut off from a power supply, lost in the jungle or at sea, or just taking every measure to keep your family safe. Store at home, in your shelter or bunker in your vehicle or boat and simply activate the HydraCell in water.

2. Outdoor / Camping Enthusiasts:

Whether you are backpacking or trekking in an RV the HydraCell Cube and Accessory Light can provide affordable power and light when you need it.

3. Military/First Responders:

Always be ready in even the most disparate of environments. Recharge lights, mobile phones, radio equipment, and more without worrying about finding a power outlet.

 

 

 

An add-on for our Family Preparedness and Emergency Survival Packs, the Mini Emergency Light is a single-use, compact, convenient and disposable pocket flashlight powered by the same water-activated technology as the other HydraCell products, but without a replaceable cell.

The bright, long-life LEDs provide up to 75 hours of usable light in emergency and off-grid situations when no other light source is available.

The Mini Emergency Light will always be ready for quick activation with a dip in water. At the end of its useful life it can be safely disposed in household garbage, or electronic waste recycling where available

 

 

 

 

 

A brief history of Hydra Light .....

Hydra Light’s mission is to become a real and commercially viable alternative to dry cell (primary) batteries, thereby removing these poisonous and environmentally dangerous power sources.

Furthermore and somewhat more importantly, Hydra Light believes that it can provide a real, safe and environmentally friendly power (light) alternative to people that live with no or intermittent electricity, and are dependent on diesel, batteries, and kerosene for the power needs.

The positive environmental and climate changes are compelling.

The HydraCell is a completely natural fuel cell that generates its own power when activated in water.

The HydraCell Cube, and the associated products (lanterns, torches, power packs and mobile phone charges) which Hydra Light has designed and developed are aimed at reducing the waste associated with single-use toxic batteries and raising awareness of alternative energy solutions.

Globally, over 1.2 billion people live without access to electric light and are dependent on batteries, kerosene, diesel or candles for their power and lighting needs. The HydraCell is a real, safe, non-toxic, environmentally friendly and cheap alternative.

In the USA alone over 3 billion batteries are disposed of into landfills each year.

Hydra Light’s innovative and revolutionary technology is perfect for emergency preparedness, disaster relief, non-government organizations, and aid agencies, off the grid communities, and lifestyle and outdoor enthusiasts.

With further development of the HydraCell, Hydra Light anticipates an expansion of its focus into industrial (automotive and marine), security and military sectors.

The HydraCell has many advantages over other technologies, particularly traditional dry-cell (alkaline) batteries, and kerosene, including:

  • Power generation: The HydraCell generates its own power when activated, as opposed to a traditional battery, which stores and releases power.
     
  • Virtually infinite life: The HydraCell has a long, and potentially infinite, shelf life of many years, prior to activation.
     
  • Long use time: Once activated in water the HydraCell has over 250 hours of actual usage time.
     
  • Environmentally friendly: The natural minerals and materials in the HydraCell are consumed during the life of the fuel cell. There is no soil contamination (traditional batteries leak chemicals into the earth for decades) and the outer casing is it is fully recyclable.
     

Hydra Light’s Mission, is to become: 

  • The world’s preeminent developer, innovator and provider of Mag Air Cell technology and products through direct product and OEM integration, and
     
  • A real and commercially viable alternative to dry cell (primary) batteries.
     

Hydra Light's Vision, is to: 

  • Provide ”Power When You Need It” for emergency preparedness, disaster relief, off-grid communities, and lifestyle consumers.
     
  • Make a difference in the developing nations by providing affordable light and power to the less fortunate.
     
  • Ensure that HydraCell becomes a household name and a must-have accessory and product.
     
  • Work with Original Equipment Manufacturers (“OEM”), to provide a real alternative to traditional dry cell batteries thereby reducing the overall environmental footprint.

story:
Boombi is a self-contained, user-friendly hydroponic vertical garden that will revolutionize the way you grow and consume food. 

 


 

 

Boombi is modular, easy to use, and built to the highest manufacturing standards. From the moment Boombi arrives at your front door, you’ll be ready to start growing your own fresh fruits, vegetables, herbs, and much more. It’s as easy as using a coffee machine! 

 

 

 

Funded in less than 24h in Kickstarter!


 

Boombi won't be here for Christmas season- but we've got you covered!!

We don't want you to show up to the Christmas dinner empty-handed so we'll be sending you a printable personalized gift card for your beloved one! 

We can also send the lucky person an e-mail You'll just have to specify the name and language in the Survey once the campaign is finalized!

 

 

 

We hate to say it, but not everyone has a green thumb. Gardening at any scale, indoors or outdoors, is a complex and time-consuming process. Even if you take your time to research gardening tools and techniques and go through what can sometimes be a trial-and-error process of learning how to garden, worthwhile yields are never guaranteed.

 

Plus, would-be gardeners are often at the mercy of the seasons, their local environment, and all manner of unforeseen, unpredictable factors that can turn a productive hobby into a laborious chore.

We created boombi in an attempt to simplify the entire growing process by removing the unnecessary and delivering the essential: light, water, and nutrients. 


 

 

 

Once you plug in boombi, you won't have to worry about your plants getting enough water or adequate light, boombi will provide the perfect amounts for your plants automatically.

 






 

So why not just pick up your produce at the local market?

 

Well, the truth is that even your local market might not carry “local” produce. Many of the fruits and vegetables we buy at the store travel thousands of kilometers to get into our shopping carts, only to spoil quickly and wind up in the wastebasket at home.

 


 

 

 

 

Worse still, our current global agricultural system is unsustainable: contributing to pollution, climate change, soil erosion, deforestation, water waste, and labor violations all over the world. 

 

 


 

Source: https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/09/urban-fa...



 

But what if there were an easy, sustainable, and fun way to ease these problems? What if there was a tool that allowed you to grow food in your home with ease? What if you could reduce your food miles (the length travelled from the farm to your table), the amount of water you use, and ultimately the amount of food you waste week after week, month after month, and year after year?




 

 

Boombi isn’t like any other hydroponic home garden. That’s because most other gardening systems aren’t created by gardeners.

 

Groots' vertical farm in Barcelona


 

Groots, the designers of boombi, are first and foremost an urban farm in the heart of Barcelona. Boombi is based on years of experience and innovation that we’ve applied directly to our commercial efforts. We pass that experience and innovation right onto our customers.




 

 

 

At Groots we always put efficiency, sustainability, and social awareness at the forefront of our decision-making process. We believe the path towards a change in agriculture will involve a combination of people growing their own food at home and vertical farming,  which is why by purchasing a boombi you will also contribute to large scale sustainable food production in our vertical farms.

We want everyone to get behind our project and our goal of transforming agriculture, and boombi will be your and our bet for a sustainable future.

 



 

 

 

Boombi is vertical and modular. This means it takes up less space in your home, is highly efficient, and can be cleaned and maintained easily without a PhD in engineering. 

 


 

 

With boombi you will get a set of preseeded cones ready to start growing. These consist of an organic coconut fiber mix in the shape of a cone with the seeds already inside at the correct depth.

 

 



 

The seeds carry all the necessary nutrients for the plants to sprout, so you will just need to add water and watch your plants grow.

 

Before your first harvest, you will be able to choose the next varieties to grow through the app or the website. We recommend getting the next set of preseeded cones before you harvest so they are ready to place in boombi as soon as you harvest and no time is wasted! 

 

Don’t worry, we will have you covered on the timings.You will be able to choose among a wide variety of tasty, flavorful varieties and will also receive crop recommendations from the farming experts at Groots, so you can grow in parallel with them and receive up-to-date guidance throughout the entire process.


 

With boombi, you can grow a wide variety of edible flowers, greens, herbs, fruits, and even decorative plants. 

  •  HERBS: Basil, Thai Basil, Lemon Basil, Melisa, Chives, Curly Parsley, Cilantro, Bloody Sorrel, Thyme, Dill, Parsley, Oregano, Mint, Sage & Rosemary.
  • GREENS: Chard, Spinach, Batavia Lettuce, Romaine Lettuce, Mustard, Pak Choi, Curly Kale, Tuscan Kale & Arugula.
  • FLOWERS: Nasturtiums & Pansies.
  • FRUITS: Chili Peppers, Habanero Peppers, mini tomatoes & Garden Strawberries. 
  • EMPTY CONES: Although our preseeded coconut cones are convenient and easy to use, we have listened to your suggestions and will be offering empty coconut cones so you can use your own seeds and experiment with even more plant varieties. Show us the results on instagram @boombigarden!

 

 

Some countries have restrictions on seed delivery, so we will be shipping empty coconut cones instead and will make sure your plants grow healthy by recommending one of our trusted seed suppliers for each country. 

 

 



 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The boombi lighting system can be easily removed for outdoor growing

 

 

 

 


 

 

 


 

 

 

We have used a realistic rendering to show the multiple colors that will be available with boombi




 


 

 

 

 

 

  1. Take your boombi out of the box, it is already assembled for you. Add water to your included pods and allow the seeds to germinate. Check on your pods every few days to see if leaves have appeared.  



 

 

 2. When you see leaves, introduce the pods into the boombi system. 

 


 

 3. Add water and nutrients to your boombi. 

 

 

 

 4. Plug the system in and let the growing begin. 

 

 

 




 

 

 

 




 

 

 

 

 

Groots was founded in 2018 with the mission of growing local and healthy food in a sustainable and innovative way. Our first breakthrough towards achieving our mission came when we developed our own vertical farming system in a forty square meter garage and began selling produce to local establishments.

 

 

Demand for our fresh produce soon exceeded our ability to produce it. At the same time, several of our customers inquired if we could build custom farming systems for them. This is how our first Boombi—designed for use in hotels and restaurants—was born. After the first successful installation of a Boombi system in a restaurant in Barcelona (OrganiQ), we continued to refine the design of our system. The goal was to get the Boombi into homes around the world.

 

 

In March 2020, we finally cracked the design on a 28-plant system. However, we still wanted to make the Boombi even more accessible and efficient. The result of that design process is Boombi Mini, now available on Indiegogo.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Over the course of development, our team of co-founders (Joaquim, Alessandro, and Carlos) has expanded to include seven new team members: Gabriela, Juan Carlos, Anas, Hamza, Jorge, Aura and Helena. We are a deeply passionate group of designers, engineers, thinkers, dreamers, and most importantly, gardeners.  

 

Groots team at the Barcelona HQ

 

 

 

 



 

At Groots we deeply believe that every company has a responsibility beyond delivering a product, we must all contribute to society in meaningful ways. 

Why? Because there are issues that need to be resolved urgently, and companies need to be a part of the solution, not the problem. Other companies are already actively attempting to improve the world, and we are following their example not only because we believe we can make a meaningful impact through boombi and vertical farming but also to inspire other people (just as we have been inspired by others) to shift their actions towards what they truly believe in.

In addition to buckling down and giving our best short towards achieving a sustainable food production method, we'll donate 1$ from every single perk to a non-profit organization.

To do that, every backer will be able to choose one of the following 2 non-profit organizations at the final survey to submit his/her donation. Let’s start a green journey together.

 

 

 


 

 

If you’ve become concerned with how your food is grown, where it comes from, and who grows it, then it’s time to bring a Boombi system into your home. Take control of your diet, your lifestyle, and most importantly, your health today. Your body and mind will thank you.

We at Groots are grateful for any and all support from the Indiegogo community. We understand that now, more than ever, where and how you spend your hard-earned money is of paramount concern. 

By backing our campaign and preordering a Boombi of your very own, you aren’t just buying a product, but supporting a movement for access to healthy and sustainable food.

Let’s start a green journey together.

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

Payment: Enter your payment information. You won't pay or choose any model at this point, you are only allowing Indiegogo to charge you the cost of the perk at the end of the campaign if we reach the initial goal.

Model, Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will receive a survey to tell us your favorite model, color and shipping information once the campaign is over.

 

 

 

 


 

 20 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the boombi community and supporting this campaign. Click one of the buttons below and tag a friend who would love to become a city farmer!





 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 All shipping fees will be collected separately once the campaign is over. Please see below for estimates: 

 

The following table assumes  purchase of one boombi with all accessories. We have listed a breakdown on shipping by region below. This is a professionally prepared estimate and prices may go up or down depending on your choice of accessories and global shipping rates when we get to the fulfillment stage.  We will do our best to reduce them once we have the final figures of the campaign. 


 

Each additional boombi: Europe: €0 | Rest of the World: +€12/boombi

 

 


 

Depending on your country, in some instances you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Boombi has been designed and will be manufactured almost exclusively using the same methods and principles used in our large scale indoor vertical farm. After 15 rounds of prototyping testing different sizes, irrigation methods, lighting solutions and materials, we have ended up with what we believe is a great design which we are comfortable manufacturing. We are especially confident because we have already worked with all the manufacturers that will be producing boombi in other projects related to our vertical farm, with excellent results. We therefore know their production capabilities and timings, and they are aware of the high quality standard that we expect.

Despite this experience, it is still possible that some sort of disruption occurs in the production capacity of our manufacturing partners. This would require us to find a new manufacturer, which we know can be a lengthy process. That is why we already have alternative manufacturers lined up for all the components of Boombi, just in case we are forced to go that route.

 

Longlasting design

To begin with, you will be growing your own food using much less water, and it will be in a system made of ABS, a material that has been chosen due to its suitability for recycling.

 

Something more

As mentioned earlier, the goal we had in mind when we founded Groots was to develop a sustainable alternative to agriculture. By purchasing Boombi you are contributing in many ways to achieving our goal. To begin with, you will be growing your own food using much less water, and it will be in a system made of ABS, a material that has been chosen due to its suitability for recycling. In addition, you will be contributing to the development of our large scale vertical farms, which basically have the same impact as your Boombi but on a much larger scale! This includes reducing food miles, eliminating the use of pesticides, reducing deforestation and eliminating soil degradation. On top of all that, all the electricity we use in our indoor farms comes from renewable sources!
story_txt:
Boombi is a self-contained, user-friendly hydroponic vertical garden that will revolutionize the way you grow and consume food. 
 
  
Boombi is modular, easy to use, and built to the highest manufacturing standards. From the moment Boombi arrives at your front door, you’ll be ready to start growing your own fresh fruits, vegetables, herbs, and much more. It’s as easy as using a coffee machine! 
 

 
 
Funded in less than 24h in Kickstarter!



 

Boombi won't be here for Christmas season- but we've got you covered!!
We don't want you to show up to the Christmas dinner empty-handed so we'll be sending you a printable personalized gift card for your beloved one! 
We can also send the lucky person an e-mail You'll just have to specify the name and language in the Survey once the campaign is finalized!
 



 

 
We hate to say it, but not everyone has a green thumb. Gardening at any scale, indoors or outdoors, is a complex and time-consuming process. Even if you take your time to research gardening tools and techniques and go through what can sometimes be a trial-and-error process of learning how to garden, worthwhile yields are never guaranteed.
 
Plus, would-be gardeners are often at the mercy of the seasons, their local environment, and all manner of unforeseen, unpredictable factors that can turn a productive hobby into a laborious chore.
We created boombi in an attempt to simplify the entire growing process by removing the unnecessary and delivering the essential: light, water, and nutrients. 
 
 
 
Once you plug in boombi, you won't have to worry about your plants getting enough water or adequate light, boombi will provide the perfect amounts for your plants automatically.
 
 
So why not just pick up your produce at the local market?
 
Well, the truth is that even your local market might not carry “local” produce. Many of the fruits and vegetables we buy at the store travel thousands of kilometers to get into our shopping carts, only to spoil quickly and wind up in the wastebasket at home.
 
 
 

 
 
Worse still, our current global agricultural system is unsustainable: contributing to pollution, climate change, soil erosion, deforestation, water waste, and labor violations all over the world. 
 
 
 

Source: https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/09/urban-fa...
 
But what if there were an easy, sustainable, and fun way to ease these problems? What if there was a tool that allowed you to grow food in your home with ease? What if you could reduce your food miles (the length travelled from the farm to your table), the amount of water you use, and ultimately the amount of food you waste week after week, month after month, and year after year?
 

 
Boombi isn’t like any other hydroponic home garden. That’s because most other gardening systems aren’t created by gardeners.
 

Groots' vertical farm in Barcelona
 
Groots, the designers of boombi, are first and foremost an urban farm in the heart of Barcelona. Boombi is based on years of experience and innovation that we’ve applied directly to our commercial efforts. We pass that experience and innovation right onto our customers.

 
 
 
At Groots we always put efficiency, sustainability, and social awareness at the forefront of our decision-making process. We believe the path towards a change in agriculture will involve a combination of people growing their own food at home and vertical farming,  which is why by purchasing a boombi you will also contribute to large scale sustainable food production in our vertical farms.
We want everyone to get behind our project and our goal of transforming agriculture, and boombi will be your and our bet for a sustainable future.
 
 
 

 
Boombi is vertical and modular. This means it takes up less space in your home, is highly efficient, and can be cleaned and maintained easily without a PhD in engineering. 
   
 
With boombi you will get a set of preseeded cones ready to start growing. These consist of an organic coconut fiber mix in the shape of a cone with the seeds already inside at the correct depth.
 
 
 
The seeds carry all the necessary nutrients for the plants to sprout, so you will just need to add water and watch your plants grow.
 
Before your first harvest, you will be able to choose the next varieties to grow through the app or the website. We recommend getting the next set of preseeded cones before you harvest so they are ready to place in boombi as soon as you harvest and no time is wasted! 
 
Don’t worry, we will have you covered on the timings.You will be able to choose among a wide variety of tasty, flavorful varieties and will also receive crop recommendations from the farming experts at Groots, so you can grow in parallel with them and receive up-to-date guidance throughout the entire process.
 
With boombi, you can grow a wide variety of edible flowers, greens, herbs, fruits, and even decorative plants. 

 HERBS: Basil, Thai Basil, Lemon Basil, Melisa, Chives, Curly Parsley, Cilantro, Bloody Sorrel, Thyme, Dill, Parsley, Oregano, Mint, Sage & Rosemary.

GREENS: Chard, Spinach, Batavia Lettuce, Romaine Lettuce, Mustard, Pak Choi, Curly Kale, Tuscan Kale & Arugula.

FLOWERS: Nasturtiums & Pansies.

FRUITS: Chili Peppers, Habanero Peppers, mini tomatoes & Garden Strawberries. 

EMPTY CONES: Although our preseeded coconut cones are convenient and easy to use, we have listened to your suggestions and will be offering empty coconut cones so you can use your own seeds and experiment with even more plant varieties. Show us the results on instagram @boombigarden!

 
 
Some countries have restrictions on seed delivery, so we will be shipping empty coconut cones instead and will make sure your plants grow healthy by recommending one of our trusted seed suppliers for each country. 
 


 

 


 
 


 
 
  
 

 
 
 


The boombi lighting system can be easily removed for outdoor growing
   
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 We have used a realistic rendering to show the multiple colors that will be available with boombi


 

 
 

 
 

 
  1. Take your boombi out of the box, it is already assembled for you. Add water to your included pods and allow the seeds to germinate. Check on your pods every few days to see if leaves have appeared.  
 
 
 2. When you see leaves, introduce the pods into the boombi system. 
  
 
 3. Add water and nutrients to your boombi. 
   
 
 4. Plug the system in and let the growing begin.

Groots team at the Barcelona HQ
