story:
Electronic devices have pervaded our lives in every aspect nowadays, by need or by choice, living or working away from home might mean time away from a power outlet, but with Pecron S1500 Portable Power Station, you’ll always have easy access to power to keep your gadgets charged and functional when you’re off the grid.

Small Yet Powerful

S1500 has made significant breakthroughs to stay powerful without compromising mobility and versatility. The high-density battery cells pack more energy into less space, and the multi-layer PCB design minimizes the overall size with no wasted space.

Super Fast Charging

The real-time charge controller (IC) inside S1500 regulates the overall flow of electricity to produce 441W of juice to quickly power up your S1500 without doing harm to the battery, which beat most of the well-known’s in the industry.

Environmental Friendly

S1500 is more environmentally friendly to use in addition to it being more efficient and powerful when compared to a traditional gas generator. 

  • You don't need to run your generator outside at least 20 feet away from your house
  • You won't get bothered by the obnoxious noise
  • No more pollution, it doesn't generate any emissions

Safety & Stability Assured

Your safety is our top concern. Each process during manufacturing has gone through 1000+ inspections. We successfully increased not only the voltage delivery of the battery but also the ability to suppress dangerous conditions.

Great Portability

S1500 weights only 25lbs with an overall size of 13.8"(L)x 7.3"(W)x 10"(H), which is similar to the size of a lid opened MacBook 13"; A sturdy handle design further enhanced its portability that allows for provision of power to the place where it is most needed in a matter of a few minutes.

Intuitive LCD Display

LCD smart display shows real-time loading power,  battery level, temperature, charging status, remaining using hours, etc. which gives users a quick view about the working status of the power station and to make alteration accordingly.

Multiple Output Ports

Though S1500 is small in size, it is equipped with eight different port options, including fast-charging 4xUSB 3.0 ports, regular 12V DC port, 3x110V AC ports.

Three Charging Methods

Charging S1500 can be done in three ways: household outlet (grid power), solar panel, or 12V DC car outlet.

Quick Refill

Our advanced charging technology enables you to fully recharge your S1500 within 4 hours through a standard wall outlet so that you can keep your power station ready and at maximum effectiveness.

Universal Solar Panel - Aurora200

Power your off-grid experiences with the 200W/36V Aurora200 Solar Panel. Made with high-efficiency monocrystalline cells that convert the most power into clean energy — with conversion efficiency rates of 21%.
Aurora200 is also a great company for off-grid applications, such as RVs, trailers, boats, sheds, and cabins — providing you with quiet power production and grid independence

 

Automotive-Grade Battery

Most power stations boast being light and portable. But do they all that portable or carry enough capacity to get the job done have been a doubt.
Adopted three-dimensional spinel based lithium-ion battery made up of first-class EVE automotive-grade power cell guarantees S1500's great stability and longevity.

Advanced Battery Manage System

The built-in BMS actively ensures that all the cells that compose the battery are kept at the appropriate voltage to prevent localized under-charging or over-charging, and assure charging /discharging cutoff protection for your safety.

The entire process from monitoring, thermal control, protection to optimization guarantees the S1500 is capable of lasting for at least 2000+ charging cycles.

 

Make Reliability A Priority

To provide a Safe, Feasible and Clean electric energy source has been our team’s ultimate goal. Each unit in production has undergone rigid inspection processes to assure safety and high performance.


Portability, Runtime, Power Delivery, Power Quality, Ease of Use, and Noise are the key measures in our labs during the each process of production.  A dozen of international certificates and safety features including ISO, FCC, CE, UN38.3, MSDS, UL, ROHS ensure S1500's reliability and endurance.


Pecron warrants our product to be free of manufacturing defects. we will pay for repair or replacement of parts and labor for 12 months from the date you receive our product. We stand behind every item we made, 100%.

 

1500W Pure Sine Wave

With 1,461.6Wh lithium-ion battery pack at its core and a built-in pure sine wave inverter, S1500 is capable of providing 1,500 watts power to run a wide range of appliances

In-Use Benchmark

This leading backup power is quiet in operation and maintenance-free. Most important, it can give you enough power to run your essential home appliances including refrigerator, juicer, projector, electric saw, or even your Tesla.

 All-Around Power Source

  • Power outages are all too common when the weather gets extreme, and a long-term power outage can be much worse than an inconvenience. When the power goes out unexpectedly, S1500 equips you with reliable power to keep your essential household appliances powered.

  • Up to 1500W power of output, S1500 enables you to operate many heavy-duty tools like electrical saw, drills and trimmer off the grid.

  • During your weekend camping trip, you’ll be able to prop your feet up, keep your devices charged, and enjoy the great outdoors to the fullest.

  • In the event of an emergency, S1500  is the perfect piece of equipment to keep your CPAP machine running all day long.

 

Competition Comparison

Specifications

Packing List

Worldwide Plug Supported

S1500 series support 4 types of domestic electrical outlet plugs in use, and we will customize voltage and frequency for different areas including North America, Europe, Oceania, and Singapore

 

Since established in 2012, Pecron has been focused on developing high-quality, efficient and environment-friendly grid-independent power solutions for customers. Today, we have developed a range of outdoor power sources for a great variety of customers, including campers, explorers, naturalists, RV or boat owners, disaster relief workers and etc.

With nearly a decade of experience and expertise in the design and development of quality portable energy storage, Pecron has collaborated with many of the most recognizable global brands in the field. We are proud and honored to have been chosen to develop and introduce this new clean energy product, which is inspired by the artistry, passion, and belief of Pecron: renewable is the future!

story:
How the ReVolt Pro-S1 came to be.

I've been a successful entrepreneur, designing, building, and manufacturing products for over 20 years. And yet, the problems and hassles caused by having to replace dead and weak batteries in my vehicles escaped my attention for most of my life.  Then a few years ago, in my garage and with some spare time, I began working on a solution for myself. About the time I had something that actually, really worked, the crowdsourced funding platforms were hot and I thought I'd take the challenge. After the first device was successfully funded, built and shipped, I went back to my busy life. But the device lived on. More people were asking about buying more units but I had none to ship.

A few years later I changed careers away from the data storage and backup industry and at the urging and help of a friend, thought I would take this to the next level. But I wanted something even better. And I wanted irrefutable proof of the effectiveness of this tool because there are so many failures and misleading products in the marketplace. I set up a retail store called the ReVolt Battery Exchange. The idea was simple. Buy dead batteries, reviving them with the ReVolt machines (like the one being offered here) and then selling those revived batteries for a profit.

And to make it even more compelling, I knew people really had to have faith in the batteries they bought back from me so I offered an unconditional full money-back guarantee. This way, if the tool and the process didn't produce real results of value, in a world where bad news gets around fast, the business would surely fail. The business has been and continues to be quite successful today - almost 3 years later! 

In the course of the development of the store, I ran out of parts to build more units, so I emailed all of my past kickstarter and other customers who had purchased the first little consumer unit a few years earlier to see if anyone wished to sell me back their unit at the price they paid for it. Only one person offered it to sell it back because he had never used it. Another teasingly mailed me back saying that I could have it when I pried his "cold reconditioned hands" from it.

 

Now others want to open businesses like ours using our exclusive equipment. But I still want this device to be available to people around the world and in a form for field and under-the-hood use, that smaller businesses or individuals can better use.  I want farmers, ranchers, people in remote areas, villagers, people who live on boats, motorhomes, car lots, auto shops, fleet owners, school districts and more to have a tool like we're using in my business today that will recover their dead batteries as well as add many more years of life to their working ones.

Yes, it works. For real. We have a profitable business that depends on these tools and has produced 10,000 case pages proving the success statistics. It's all [here].

Furthermore, Interstate Batteries of Nevada challenged us to restore a 26-year-old battery with this tool - see the video [here].

In our short time of being in operation, we have processed over 10,000 batteries developing and perfecting this tool, producing a profit along the way. For its current path, this tool will remain a production device only, and thus only sold to businesses that wish open ReVolt Battery Exchange stores to recover and renew batteries at a production level. But with your pledge and help, we can speed the delivery of this tool in a pro-sumer form to many more people and businesses around the world.

This is truly a "GREEN" product. Here in the US, we are really good at recycling lead. The figures I've seen claims that we recycle 98% of our lead. But that doesn't mean that recycling doesn't have environmental costs. The destructive recycling of automotive batteries produces quite a bit of pollution and produces a lot of toxic emissions. By extending  the useful life of automotive and other batteries, the planet definitely benefits.

The case of two "Rescue Batteries":

In 2014, when I had the crude but working version, I had been buying dead batteries off Craigslist, fixing them and selling them for a profit in my garage so I could continue to get batteries to keep testing on. During that year, both batteries in my vehicles started to fail. I thought, I want to really put the results of this to the test. So rather than extend the life of the batteries that were failing, I revived them back up and sold them. Then, took two 36 month batteries that were totally dead and even a year or two older. I revived them from the dead and put them in my two vehicles. In June of 2019, those 2010 and 2011 batteries that were completely dead in 2014 are continuing to run my two vehicles in 2019 with the help of a 4-hour "Boost" from the ReVolt unit once a year.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have invested in the production of this unit already, but without your help, this will be a much slower process because it will require more production cycles with smaller quantities produced each cycle than if we can establish a larger pool of orders for more units sooner.

An exponential ramp-up is planned, but it's the early cycles that things can really get slowed down in. For example, if we commit to producing 1,000 units the first year, then use the profits from those sales to commit to producing 3,000 the following year, we've only increased production by 2,000 units in the following year.  But if we can commit to producing 2,000 in the first year, it might be possible to go well beyond double that in the following year achieving an increase of 4,000 or more units from only a 1,000 unit increase in the first year.

What's really exciting about this product is that it's so effective at what it does that you can actually create a sustainable and profitable business off of it as we have.  Also, non-destructive battery recycling is far better for the environment and economy than destructive battery recycling.

But when I go out and now and open the hood of my SUV or my truck and see that regular 36 month battery that someone originally gave me because it was dead and could not be charged, still starting my truck after just sitting there for over two weeks, I don't know, it just really makes me feel... victorious!

By pledging your support for this product, you will be one of the first to possess it and start getting the benefits of all the batteries you can save. Your friends and family will love you too because they have batteries that die and would usually stay dead also.

 

Risks & Challenges

When I first tried this type of platform, someone pointed out that they had no assurance that they would ever receive anything from me - my word was it. I get that, I truly do. But integrity is my most cherished virtue. It's also what I've offered to my past employers. So I offer my linkedin profile here (https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomashoops1/) for anyone who wishes to really dig into my past. As I had promised them, I produced and delivered every unit that was paid for in my last campaign before, and this was before they incorporated more fraud and non-performance buyer's protections. 

Also, in my first CS funded project, the product had not yet even been developed. In this round on Indiegogo, the product has already been developed and is already in production. So your risk is minimal. Furthermore, I will give back the donation anyone pledges to me if they are not satisfied with what they receive.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word of our project here. It benefits the whole world when people can make use of something for much longer than is expected. And in many poorer countries, entire villages run off a stack of lead acid batteries. Being able to extend the lives of those batteries can help them greatly. Your support is greatly appreciated.

For its current path, this tool will remain a production device only, and thus only sold to businesses that wish open ReVolt Battery Exchange stores to recover and renew batteries at a production level. But with your pledge and help, we can speed the delivery of this tool in a pro-sumer form to many more people and businesses around the world.

This is truly a "GREEN" product. Here in the US, we are really good at recycling lead. The figures I've seen claims that we recycle 98% of our lead. But that doesn't mean that recycling doesn't have environmental costs. The destructive recycling of automotive batteries produces quite a bit of pollution and produces a lot of toxic emissions. By extending  the useful life of automotive and other batteries, the planet definitely benefits.
The case of two "Rescue Batteries":
In 2014, when I had the crude but working version, I had been buying dead batteries off Craigslist, fixing them and selling them for a profit in my garage so I could continue to get batteries to keep testing on. During that year, both batteries in my vehicles started to fail. I thought, I want to really put the results of this to the test. So rather than extend the life of the batteries that were failing, I revived them back up and sold them. Then, took two 36 month batteries that were totally dead and even a year or two older. I revived them from the dead and put them in my two vehicles. In June of 2019, those 2010 and 2011 batteries that were completely dead in 2014 are continuing to run my two vehicles in 2019 with the help of a 4-hour "Boost" from the ReVolt unit once a year.


 
What We Need & What You Get
We have invested in the production of this unit already, but without your help, this will be a much slower process because it will require more production cycles with smaller quantities produced each cycle than if we can establish a larger pool of orders for more units sooner.
An exponential ramp-up is planned, but it's the early cycles that things can really get slowed down in. For example, if we commit to producing 1,000 units the first year, then use the profits from those sales to commit to producing 3,000 the following year, we've only increased production by 2,000 units in the following year.  But if we can commit to producing 2,000 in the first year, it might be possible to go well beyond double that in the following year achieving an increase of 4,000 or more units from only a 1,000 unit increase in the first year.

What's really exciting about this product is that it's so effective at what it does that you can actually create a sustainable and profitable business off of it as we have.  Also, non-destructive battery recycling is far better for the environment and economy than destructive battery recycling.

But when I go out and now and open the hood of my SUV or my truck and see that regular 36 month battery that someone originally gave me because it was dead and could not be charged, still starting my truck after just sitting there for over two weeks, I don't know, it just really makes me feel... victorious!
By pledging your support for this product, you will be one of the first to possess it and start getting the benefits of all the batteries you can save. Your friends and family will love you too because they have batteries that die and would usually stay dead also.
 

Risks & Challenges
When I first tried this type of platform, someone pointed out that they had no assurance that they would ever receive anything from me - my word was it. I get that, I truly do. But integrity is my most cherished virtue. It's also what I've offered to my past employers. So I offer my linkedin profile here (https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomashoops1/) for anyone who wishes to really dig into my past. As I had promised them, I produced and delivered every unit that was paid for in my last campaign before, and this was before they incorporated more fraud and non-performance buyer's protections. 
Also, in my first CS funded project, the product had not yet even been developed. In this round on Indiegogo, the product has already been developed and is already in production. So your risk is minimal. Furthermore, I will give back the donation anyone pledges to me if they are not satisfied with what they receive.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please help spread the word of our project here. It benefits the whole world when people can make use of something for much longer than is expected. And in many poorer countries, entire villages run off a stack of lead acid batteries. Being able to extend the lives of those batteries can help them greatly. Your support is greatly appreciated.

story:
New Perk! Save Our Oceans Glow-in-the-dark T-Shirt

1 in 5 fish caught is the wrong fish, and 1 in 5 fish caught is caught illegally. Hi-light these issues to the world with our glow in the dark Save Our Oceans t-shirt and you'll not only be spreading the word, but also helping address the problem!

 

 

The Problem

The fishing industry is facing a global problem. Currently about 1 in 5 fish caught is discarded, that is 27 million tonnes annually. This is not only bad for the fish, it is also bad for fishermen and the global economy as a whole. This can equate to about £500K being lost per large industrial vessel per year.

 

The Solution = PISCES

We are developing PISCES, which is a light emitting device that retrofits onto the fishing nets already used by fishermen. It helps fishermen catch the right fish by emitting lights which attract the right fish and repel the wrong ones.

 

 

 

When PISCES is attached to the trawler’s nets, bycatch can be reduced by up to 90%. It retrofits to almost any type of commercial fishing gear and most vessels would only require a set of 20 lights and a charger, which then helps enable them to comply with new fishing regulations.

 

 

PISCES not only saves fish, it will also help fishermen and protect one of our most loved food sources both now and in the future.

 

How it works

Different species of fish and crustaceans are affected by lights in different ways. Some are attracted and some are repelled, and it all depends on the type of light you use. PISCES will enable fishermen to easily specify the wavelength, intensity, polarization and flash-pattern of the light it emits, to better attract the size and species of fish they are licensed to catch. It is easy to fit, recharge and is designed specifically for the fishing environment.

 

 

Why we're crowdfunding

Dan's been working on SafetyNet for 8 years and we’ve made some really exciting progress and learned a lot during that time. We’ve worked hard because we see a real need for this technology, but we couldn’t have done it without our supporters. We’re now asking for one final push to help us bridge the gap between proof of concept and a device that can be used by many more people to accelerate the science and begin having a widespread positive impact.

With the £50K, we will be able to finalise the PISCES design and produce 100 of them to give to fishing crews and scientists to run new experiments that they weren't able to before.

 

Long term plans

With all the PISCES we will be able to produce after this crowdfunding campaign ends, we will be able to accelerate the understanding of how different lights affect different species of fish. This knowledge will help the industry understand how to apply lights to make their gears far more selective.

The reduction in bycatch that PISCES will allow, will make the fishing industry more sustainable and once we have helped the British seafood industry become sustainable, we aim to roll this out worldwide! We estimate PISCES will cost about £1,000 per commercial vessel, which fishermen can make back in just one day (calculating with average industry figures). Their revenues can also increase by 20% by catching the right fish.

From a scientific point of view, we are intent on furthering and accelerating the understanding of light's usefulness in fishing. With this in mind, we will publish all our findings on how light works in different fisheries, the opportunities this represents, and how best to address them. You can see our current research on our website. We want to share the knowledge gained from this project and our larger list of useful light types with as many communities as possible so that we can speed up the introduction of light as a selectivity tool into commercial fishing.

 

Timeline

 

Supporters, Collaborators, Features:

Team

+ a shoal of mentors and experts from across science, industry and business.

 

We have been working on PISCES since 2008. SafetyNet Technologies was founded by Dan Watson who was working on a Masters project in Product Design at the University of Glasgow. He became interested in sustainable fishing when he read an article about some Scottish Fishermen arrested in Norwegian waters for throwing fish back into the sea. While the regulations said it was illegal, they lacked the tools to avoid catching the fish in the first place, leaving them in a Catch-22 position.

Over the next few years, Dan worked with fishermen and scientists and created different prototypes to test various theories about light and fish behaviour. Eventually, those prototypes attracted seed funding from the likes of Young's Seafood, Dyson and Sir Richard Branson and led to the building of a small team to continue the work.

 

Rewards

 

The Science

Below are articles that outline and discuss some of the experiments that are informing the development of PISCES:

First ever paper Dan read about light and fish behaviour

Bob Hannah, Stephen Jones and Mark Lomeli's LED experiments to remove Euchalon bycatch from the Oregon shrimp fishery (pictured above and in the video)

John Wang's UV LED experiments to lower turtle bycatch in gillnets

 

Thanks

Max Blustin of New Planet Films for all his help putting our crowdfunding video together.

Niki Bañados for all the campaign graphics and aesthetic support.

story:
What is Aqua Agro about?

What can an agricultural country do if its water supplies will dry out by 2025? 
Find out less water intensive practices in use of agriculture ofcourse!

This is exactly where Aqua Agro comes in to solve the pain and crisis the farmers are facing and introduce them how technology can help them grow crops with 50% less water.

We need Pakistanis to fund our cause to deploy Aqua agro on 50 farms for free so as to build farmers' confidence and have successful case studies on a variety of crops.

 

 

More about the product

The Aqua Agro system has been built over a research period of 3 years. The node is an IOT/AI enabled solar powered device, a cloud with a decision support system and an app for the farmers for easy access and monitoring. 


 

What We Need & What You Get

We want to deploy our system for free for the farmers who can either not afford the device or are to reluctant to adopt a completely new technology in their farms. The money you fund us with will go into production and deployment of our device in the farms in Pakistan. We have currently 6 deployments in southern Pakistan but we need to do a bigger case study to have results from a variety of crops and we can't do it without your help.



The success of the project will open a new door for Pakistan to enhance its agricultural practices without much water intake and will help sustain the country with the water crisis in hand. We cannot immediately bring water to meet our needs, we need to learn how to do with less.

If we don't reach our entire goal, we will still be deployed on as many farms as we are able to raise funds for! The devices will go to the small farmers who are unable to afford the device currently or are reluctant to invest in an all-new technology.

Aqua Agro - Cofounder's Pitch

 

The Impact

The impact Aqua Agro will create is un-measurable. According to PCRWR, Pakistan is facing an acute water shortage and may run dry by 2025. The agricultural based country has already dropped its agricultural GDP from 49% in 1949 to 19% in 2016.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have developed the product over 3 years of research in affiliation with the German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (dfki.de). We have already 6 deployments on farms with great result. So we are confident about the system. However, we may have to see how a large scale deployment can be done in a justifiable amount of time and we are excited to see how the sytem will behave on a variety of crops.

Outstanding Team

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't however back us, we would really like your help to share the word around with your network and friends. Please use the Indiegogo share tools given on our page. Thanks!

story:
https://mpowerco.org

By supplying and handling modular cold storage, mPower synergizes income empowerment and food security.

Gautam is a farmer in Uttar Pradesh, India, who reached out to us once he heard we had a cold storage solution. Each harvest season, his strawberries rot during unpredictable heat waves. While he keeps them in a shaded area of his house, it’s not enough. To buy a cold storage unit of his own would cost 15 million rupees, prohibitively expensive for a small scale farmer like him.

India currently has a 90% supply shortage of cold storage facilities. Only 3,000 refrigerated trucks for fruits and vegetables exist to serve the entire nation, most owned by multinational corporations and used to refrigerate processed foods rather than crops from farm to market.

The Problem

The issue is three-fold:

  1. Current models rely on renting to farmers, forcing them to shoulder prohibitive cost burdens
  2. Current technologies rely on large refrigeration warehouses, an ineffective solution for small scale farmers -- 92% of all farms in India are small-scale
  3. Current solutions rarely focus on cooling crops from rural farms in transport, instead using expensive and bulky refrigerated trucks to service inter-city routes 

The Indian government has traditionally banned farmers from selling their crops to unlicensed middlemen. However, recent regulatory changes to Agricultural Produce Market Committee laws this year have legalized outside buyers, making this a unique time of change and potential.

There is a desperate need for a solution, a more accessible, point-to-point cold storage system that can connect the high agricultural potential of rural farms to the incredible need for food across the country and the world.

mPower is that solution. We have designed and are currently iterating a revolutionary prototype of a modular refrigerator to transport produce more cost-efficiently and sustainably, transforming the supply chain of fresh produce in India.

mPower is affordable, sustainably developed and implemented, and synergizes with governmental regulations and imperatives to ensure long-term outcome achievement and delivery of impact. mPower saves farmers from taking on exponentially increasing costs to store their produce and low prices from cyclic middlemen taking commission while completely mitigating the risks involved with storage and transport. We’re harnessing the power of energy to empower the people of the world, one farm at a time.

What We Need & What You Get

To start manufacturing the mPower modular cold storage units and establish a logistical presence in India, we need $4000. This step is essential to ensure that mPower penetrates efficiently into our pilot provinces and meets the standards set by the Indian and worldwide energy communities.

We have already completed our first field mission to India, finalizing partners, prototype design, and distribution channels to achieve cultural adequacy and environmental accuracy of the design and distribution. Having worked closely with the communities we intend to serve, we know exactly the iterations of our design and distribution model that we need to implement in India to ensure the maximum achievement of our impact.

Your gift will prove transformational to mPower. Contributing at this stage to mPower will guarantee efficient implementation of the technology and distribution model. All use of gifted money will be clearly documented and will primarily fund expansion of our pre-existing pilot, iterating design, and connecting and empowering the people we hope to serve to together achieve impact at scale.

Gifting to mPower comes with several fun perks! See the sidebar to see what you get if you donate a gift of $5, $10, $25, $50, $75, $100, $300, $500, or $1000.

The Design

mPower’s competitive differentiation lies in our combination of technological and logistical distribution solutions. We’ve designed a modular cold storage unit that can store various kind of produce and then transport them without any refrigeration or costly refrigerated trucks for up to 24 hours with only 1 degree Celsius of heat loss. The technology is proven, and nearly identical to current refrigeration technologies: the only differences are in scale, implementation, and effectiveness.

  1. Scale: The design of our hubs consists of one central cooling unit, which works like a traditional refrigerator, connected to and cooling insulated modules attached to the fridge. These modules have a 6150 kg capacity, enough to collect 1 acre of produce from 10 farms. Because they are modular, scaling up only requires increasing the number of insulated modules, rather than adding expensive cooling units.
  2. Implementation: Modularity of these cooling units enables us to transport just the small cubic units from cooling hub to the market using traditional methods of transportation in rural farms: pickup trucks and tractors. This allows us to navigate and deliver produce even in poor infrastructure conditions. mPower’s cooling technology also relies on passive cooling in transport, which acts as an additional line of defense against infrastructure conditions. To passively cool our produce, we wrap the modular units in a heat-reflecting plastic film, which reduces temperature by an additional 10 degrees Celsius.
  3. Effectiveness: Different produce requires different controls for temperature and humidity. By creating modularity, we can uniquely control and optimize for these conditions. All in all, mPower’s modular units can extend the life of produce by up to 2 weeks, uniquely enabling a flexible cold storage distribution system.

We think the most empowering aspect of mPower lies in its business model. Instead of forcing farmers to pay for our product, we pay them. Our plan is to purchase produce directly from farmers and take advantage of crop price differences in different locations and different times in the harvest season to generate profit.

We parsed data from state mandi boards (agricultural markets) to find daily crop data. We are currently in the process of developing a predictive algorithm to determine future crop prices, but right now we use this data to create historical models to determine profitable transportation routes. After initial data analysis, we have identified 5 routes. All of these routes yield profit, even when factoring in transportation and maintenance costs. While crop prices are obviously volatile and fluctuate from region to region, these price trends generally hold so that we always receive 1.5-8x price differentials on each route.

The Impact

mPower has the potential to transform lives with its advantage over current competitors.  Due to our modular and scalable design, we can set up our storage hub for 20% of the setup cost of traditional refrigerated warehouses, and our operating costs are 30% lower as well.  As a result of these cost savings, we allow farmers to invest in productivity and human development, ultimately improving their socioeconomic status in the long run.

mPower’s technology and distribution model has already been explained and approved by relevant politicians and institutions in India. Unlike other businesses that try to implement without full support and falter out, sometimes doing more harm than good, we first ensured maximum sustainability of our models before implementing, ensuring that our partners are able to trust and believe in us.

Our technology utilizes accessible materials that are sustainable and locally available. This allows for quick-and-easy setup and efficient impact achievement. We strive to reduce the time that our communities wait before they are able to tangibly witness results.

Synergizing agricultural productivity, food security, and income empowerment, mPower offers farmers the complete package to begin the journey to improving the overall quality of life for themselves and their families.

Who We Are

We're an interdisciplinary group of students at Duke University, united by a common love of entrepreneurship, technology, and food. Our partners and mentors include the Hult Prize, the Duke Energy Initiative, the Kenan Institute of Ethics, and the Duke Innovation and Entrepreneurship Initiative. All team members are current undergraduates at Duke University, coming from economics, public policy, mechanical engineering, and computer science backgrounds.

Saheel Chodavadia, Operations | Saheel is a thinker with an analytical mind. He has been heavily involved in vulnerable population economic development and policy reform, working alongside different governments and the United Nations to inform protectionary and preventionary policy around the world. He believes in long-term outcome achievement through a combination of grassroots ideology and political positioning.

Sherry Feng, Operations | Sherry is a technologist with a big-picture mind. She has been deeply passionate about rural community development ever since she spent a summer teaching entrepreneurship to Indigenous tribes in the Australian Outback, and previously co-founded a microfinance startup and expanded operations to 12 states and 6 countries.

Harsh Sanghi, Technology | Harsh is an innovator with a creative mind. He has worked extensively in different aspects of the energy and agriculture sector, leading undergraduate energy efforts at Duke as the president of the Energy Club. He is an entrepreneur who wants to innovate sustainable technology with business opportunity. His diverse backgrounds in engineering, economics and energy allow him to think across multiple systems to solutions.

Jason Wang, Technology | Jason is a futurist with a huge passion for designing technology that motivates social and political change. With a background in conservation technology and having built products at Facebook that reach millions around the world, Jason is an avid explorer of how small details can shape and affect the cascading impacts of any company.

The mPower team is currently competing in the international Hult Prize Competition, striving to harness to power of energy to empower farmers and reduce food waste, sustainably transforming 10 million lives by 2025. This past March, they placed first in the Mexico City Regional Competition,  joining only 30 other teams out of the 100,000 that applied to advance to the Hult Prize Accelerator in London for the summer.

Now,  the mPower family consists of more than fifty different individuals and institutions, who have contributed as mentors, supporters, advisors, and friends. Join the family! With your donation and support, we can spread the mission of mPower and change the world: one farm at a time.

mPower in the News

Pratt School of Engineering

India West

Universal News Network

Duke Today

Duke Economics

Duke Mechanical Engineering and Material Science

Other Ways You Can Help

Please visit our website and spread the word of our enterprise! There are huge issues with the current agricultural supply chain in India, and bringing awareness to the entire issue is crucial towards addressing the problem.

Learn More

https://mpowerco.org

We think the most empowering aspect of mPower lies in its business model. Instead of forcing farmers to pay for our product, we pay them. Our plan is to purchase produce directly from farmers and take advantage of crop price differences in different locations and different times in the harvest season to generate profit.
We parsed data from state mandi boards (agricultural markets) to find daily crop data. We are currently in the process of developing a predictive algorithm to determine future crop prices, but right now we use this data to create historical models to determine profitable transportation routes. After initial data analysis, we have identified 5 routes. All of these routes yield profit, even when factoring in transportation and maintenance costs. While crop prices are obviously volatile and fluctuate from region to region, these price trends generally hold so that we always receive 1.5-8x price differentials on each route.

The Impact

mPower has the potential to transform lives with its advantage over current competitors.  Due to our modular and scalable design, we can set up our storage hub for 20% of the setup cost of traditional refrigerated warehouses, and our operating costs are 30% lower as well.  As a result of these cost savings, we allow farmers to invest in productivity and human development, ultimately improving their socioeconomic status in the long run.
mPower’s technology and distribution model has already been explained and approved by relevant politicians and institutions in India. Unlike other businesses that try to implement without full support and falter out, sometimes doing more harm than good, we first ensured maximum sustainability of our models before implementing, ensuring that our partners are able to trust and believe in us.
Our technology utilizes accessible materials that are sustainable and locally available. This allows for quick-and-easy setup and efficient impact achievement. We strive to reduce the time that our communities wait before they are able to tangibly witness results.
Synergizing agricultural productivity, food security, and income empowerment, mPower offers farmers the complete package to begin the journey to improving the overall quality of life for themselves and their families.

Who We Are
We're an interdisciplinary group of students at Duke University, united by a common love of entrepreneurship, technology, and food. Our partners and mentors include the Hult Prize, the Duke Energy Initiative, the Kenan Institute of Ethics, and the Duke Innovation and Entrepreneurship Initiative. All team members are current undergraduates at Duke University, coming from economics, public policy, mechanical engineering, and computer science backgrounds.

Saheel Chodavadia, Operations | Saheel is a thinker with an analytical mind. He has been heavily involved in vulnerable population economic development and policy reform, working alongside different governments and the United Nations to inform protectionary and preventionary policy around the world. He believes in long-term outcome achievement through a combination of grassroots ideology and political positioning.
Sherry Feng, Operations | Sherry is a technologist with a big-picture mind. She has been deeply passionate about rural community development ever since she spent a summer teaching entrepreneurship to Indigenous tribes in the Australian Outback, and previously co-founded a microfinance startup and expanded operations to 12 states and 6 countries.
Harsh Sanghi, Technology | Harsh is an innovator with a creative mind. He has worked extensively in different aspects of the energy and agriculture sector, leading undergraduate energy efforts at Duke as the president of the Energy Club. He is an entrepreneur who wants to innovate sustainable technology with business opportunity. His diverse backgrounds in engineering, economics and energy allow him to think across multiple systems to solutions.
Jason Wang, Technology | Jason is a futurist with a huge passion for designing technology that motivates social and political change. With a background in conservation technology and having built products at Facebook that reach millions around the world, Jason is an avid explorer of how small details can shape and affect the cascading impacts of any company.
The mPower team is currently competing in the international Hult Prize Competition, striving to harness to power of energy to empower farmers and reduce food waste, sustainably transforming 10 million lives by 2025. This past March, they placed first in the Mexico City Regional Competition,  joining only 30 other teams out of the 100,000 that applied to advance to the Hult Prize Accelerator in London for the summer.
Now,  the mPower family consists of more than fifty different individuals and institutions, who have contributed as mentors, supporters, advisors, and friends. Join the family! With your donation and support, we can spread the mission of mPower and change the world: one farm at a time.
mPower in the News
Pratt School of Engineering
India West
Universal News Network
Duke Today
Duke Economics
Duke Mechanical Engineering and Material Science

Other Ways You Can Help
Please visit our website and spread the word of our enterprise! There are huge issues with the current agricultural supply chain in India, and bringing awareness to the entire issue is crucial towards addressing the problem.
Learn More
https://mpowerco.org

story:
Edge is our innovative reinterpretation of the classic universal power adapter.

We have enclosed in one single object many characteristics that make Edge unique.

Created by Italian designers, it has been made to be seen, to be placed on your desk, to attract attention from people in your surroundings, and not hidden away.

 

 

 

Edge has been created with personal style in mind, its simplistic and sleek aesthetics has been
created by Italian designers, with functionality and sustainability in thought, with its cover being customizable to personal style but more importantly, it is made out of recycled plastic.

 
 

 

Edge has been created with the idea of lasting over time. The time to constantly change
power adapters have reached an end, Edge has been equipped with detachable and
exchangeable cords to give it better resistance and to last longer.

Each kit comes with a number of available cords that you will be able to choose.

The cords of Edge are made from fiber textile and have increased longevity of their endurance.

 

The detachable cords not only makes Edge last longer as a power adapter, but all cords are
exchangeable making it functional with all your devices, from your game console to your
smartphone to your laptop.

Edge comes with a power of 100W, which means that it is ready to transmit energy to all devices that can already be found on today’s market.

What is GaN technology?

It is a new technology based on the usage of gallium nitride substituting the silicon in the realization of the power adapter.

The advantages of this technology can be summed up in:

-          Better conductivity, and therefore less energetic waste.

-          Reduction of weight and dimensions.

-          Less overheating of the power adapter.

 

 

 

 

When connecting Edge to your device Edge is able to measure the exact amount of energy
needed to change it, its intelligence is helping the environment by hindering energetic waste.

 

 

 

 

 

Edge is all ready to begin production. The prototype to this sleek minimalistic power adapter has been finalized.
Our trusted supplier is ready to begin production when we say go, all we need is your support.

 

El3mentz is not just any technology startup, it was founded in 2019 by Valeria and Nicola, who
come from different professional backgrounds, but with one vision: the awareness towards the
earth and its inhabitants. Their mission is to make day to day life easier, stay ecologically
sustainable, creating products that will combine their passion of innovative technology, sleek
design, and environmental awareness.

 

 
 
 
.    .    .    .    
 
 

If your question wasn’t answered in the faq? Hit the button below to connect with our team on Skype. If we are busy, leave a message and we will respond to you as soon as possible.

story:
Why do we want to create Synthetic Palm Kernel Oil?
 

In the last decades, the palm oil industry increased on an extreme level and, because of great demand, it still does.

The consequences for the environment are devastating: The deforestation of the rainforest, increasing CO2 emissions and the destruction of habitats for numerous animal and plant species. Furthermore, social injustice and land conflicts are daily fare.

Photo by Marianne Klute

 

 

How do we want to achieve our goal?
 

The production of fatty acids and their esterification to triglycerides as energy storage is a natural process in all organisms.
We make use of this natural way of synthesis by modifying the expression of fatty acids with appropriate carbohydrate chain length on a molecular level. The overall combustion of the triglycerides represents the main characteristics of the product - The Palm Kernel Oil.

 

Step 1 - The Fatty Acid Production:

 

We want to change a conventional laboratory strain of the bacteria E.coli to be able to create the desired fatty acid pattern.

We are using the crispr cas9 system to replace an unwanted gene with a set of our chosen genes.

By carrying a short RNA sequence we can guide the system to the matching sequence in the Bacterial DNA. When the target is found the Cas9 protein cuts the strand giving us the opportunity to insert our wantet DNA sequence. 

 

With this method we’re introducing mutations in the tesA gene in order to receive the desired fatty acids lauric acid, myristic acid and oleic acid.

 

 

Step 2 - The Esterification:

 

In a second step, we are engineering the triglyceride pathway by upregulation of the genes plsB, pgpB and fadD as well as deletion of the gene dgkA. Apart from the modification of these genes we are integrating the gene atfA from the strand acinetobacter baylyi to advance esterification.

 

With these modifications the E.coli Bacteria should be able to build triglycerides out of the produced fat acids.

Those represent the basic characteristics of palm kernel oil!


 

Why we need your help!

 

The whole organization and the financing of the project is planned by us students, with the knowledge of some professors and the support from the Technical University and the Karl-Franzens-University Graz.

Besides the costs for laboratory materials and chemicals, there are also very high registration and participation fees for the iGEM contest (see FAQ). In order to realize our project, we therefore depend on the financial support of innovative companies and sponsors as well as subsidies.

Thank you a lot!

story:
Linear LED’s on the market can be summed up into 2 categories: Plug & Plays are simple to install but are very unreliable and require more frequent maintenance, or a Ballast bypass rewire, that’s much more efficient and reliable but a lot more labor is involved and many safety issues can occur. What the current LED Retrofit solutions all have in common are their many uncertainties and complications.

What I'm excited to introduce is what I believe will become an unrivaled solution to the LED retrofit market, the Uluxus Link. The very first solid solution for T12 & T8 fixtures. Our system will work instantly regardless of any ballast type and condition. In a matter of two steps, you’ll have successfully converted from fluorescent to LED with 100% reliability and safety. The Uluxus Link comprises of 2 parts, the Leo Links and our UT8 LED Tubes. Here's the installation process:

Go Green in a "Snap"! NO rewiring required. 100% Compatible with all unmodified fixtures & single-end, double-end & non-pin modified fixtures.

STEP 1: Simply attach the Leo Links to the ballasts Neutral and Line power wires by snapping them closed.

 

STEP 2: Connect the Link LED Harness, first to the Leo Links, then to the UT8 LEDs. Your conversion is complete!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

LinkedIN: https://www.linkedin.com/in/leokwok/

The founder of ULUXUS, Mr. Leo Kwok, is a seasoned Silicon Valley engineer and entrepreneur devoting his team’s effort to energy conservation product innovation and development, after extensive working experience with large organizations such as IBM and Siemens. When he finds down time, he spends it with his family and with his soccer team. 

ULUXUS has been in the lighting industry for over 5 years starting in Hong Kong as an R&D specialty house for energy efficiency products. ULUXUS launched its first North American branded, unique, A19 LED product in 2015 after having the product obtained the Energy Star and UL certifications. To learn more about our A19, please visit Uluxus.com, HomeDepot.com or Amazon.com. 2015 is also when ULUXUS LLC formally registered as a California corporation.

 

 

 

Leo Link injection molded complete with internals and harness

Leo Link snapped closed

Leo Link harness

Leo Link connected to fixture, quickly bypassing ballast.

Uluxus LED Harness connected to Leo Link

LED Harness plugged into Uluxus 4ft UT8 LED Tube

 Retrofit complete. The very first solid solution for T12 & T8 fixtures. The Uluxus Link will work instantly regardless of any ballast type and condition.

Click Here to Participate

 

Since we’ve been developing and manufacturing LED lighting products for more than 5 years, we are confident about our supply chain management and production capacity. For the past year, we’ve been dedicated to mastering the development of the Uluxus Link System with the patented Leo Links and are ready to ship immediately if our campaign is a success.

We are also committed to making your experience with us the best it can be and put customer care as our top concern. We promise honest & realistic timelines, to be accessible, provide timely responses, and to always keep you informed. If at any time you need to reach us directly, please contact us by Email at support@uluxus.com.

story:
If you are like us, you like options. You appreciate your 18 inch Aero wheel covers but would love to have the option to quickly change the look of your Tesla Model 3 without sacrificing efficiency. 

And it's not just the Aero wheel covers. The 18 inch Aero base alloy wheel has so much going for it too - smooth ride, low risk of pothole tire damage, low risk of curb rash rim damage, all season stock tires, low initial cost, low cost of replacement tires, and efficiency.  There are so many advantages with the 18 inch wheel but just one option in wheel covers. Time to change that. Introducing Orbital wheel covers.

 

 

 

Fits Tesla Model 3 18" OEM Wheel Part #104422100 and #104426100 (2021 Redesign).

Yes, it does fit the new 2021 redesigned wheel. 

 

 

  It literally takes seconds. No trip to the tire shop required.

 

 

 

 

 

 

By almost a full inch. 

 A larger wheel tends to look better, inspire performance, and somehow pull a trick on your eyes and make the car look sexier. We designed the Orbital wheel covers with size in mind.

 

 

 

 

A clean look is easy on the eyes. So we kept it clean and eliminated seams and gaps.

If you have it, it's okay. We don't judge. 

Orbital wheel covers extend all the way to the tire hiding any existing curb rash. 

 

 

With no rim exposed Orbital wheel covers protect against further curb rash damage.

 

 

 

 

 

Patent pending five point snap clamps and center lock mounting system ensures you will not lose another wheel cover again.

 

 

 

 

 

Combine the highly engineered mounting system with a thermoplastic base material that is fine tuned to have an ideal mix of impact and thermal properties and you get a wheel cover that will stay on in any weather condition and look good for a long time.

 

 

 

 We simulated and designed and simulated and tested until we got a similar wh/mi performance to the Aero wheel covers. 

We tested in beautiful Cleveland weather. We did highway round trip to minimize the wind interference and during night time since there was little to no traffic to interfere. First test was done in the upper 50F and the second in the upper 30F. We also trialed different speeds: 65 mph and a 70 mph. The faster the vehicle travels the more the aerodynamic coefficient of the vehicle will impact the efficiency.

 

 

 

Align, snap in, and install the center cap to lock the wheel cover to the wheel. Done.

 

 They are also easy to remove. 

Use a suction cup or a flat head screw driver to remove the center cap and unlock the wheel cover. Now you can remove it from the wheel just like you do with the Aero wheel covers.

 

 

 We engineered them to be made out of one single material that can be easily recycled. No metal clips and springs or any other inclusions present.

  

 

A good part of the electricity in our grid still comes from fossil fuel burning power plants. These plants generate large amounts of carbon dioxide and other harmful gases that contribute to the increase of the greenhouse effect. 

Keep the wheel covers on and the coal in the ground!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The fine print: Tesla logo, Tesla and Model 3 are trademarks of Tesla Inc. The Orbital wheel covers are only compatible with the Tesla Model 3 18"  Aero base alloy wheels OEM Part #104422100 and #104426100 (2021 Redesign). They are designed only for these wheels and they will not work with any other wheels.

story:
“We have not inherited the Earth from our parents, we have borrowed it from our children.”

The International Union for the Conservation of Nature, World Conservation Strategy.

 

Sustainable Coastal Development

Sustainability is the heart of our invention and we care about protecting and revitalising coastal communities, generating and storing renewable energy and providing healthy food for the world’s growing population.

CPE Global was formed by Peter Tse to promote his pioneering coastal protection system – the Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef – which harnesses the power of the ocean to generate and store renewable energy while enabling sustainable land and water-based development.

Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef

The Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef acts as a defence protecting the coast from waves, storms, floods, and erosion. It generates and stores energy using multiple Seawater Exchange and Storage Systems (SESS) joined together to reach the desired area mass for each unique location where it will be placed. 

The Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef provides a calm, controlled, lagoon environment which can be used for watersports and leisure.

It creates an environment for marine biodiversity in the same way as a natural barrier reef.

The Seawater Exchange and Storage System

The Seawater Exchange and Storage System (SESS) harnesses the untapped potential of the ocean using pump hydro storage and hydroelectricity to generate and store energy until needed.

It is a circular structure with turbines to move seawater around three reservoirs to create a continuous energy-generating loop.

Most places have two tides a day which gives additional energy generating potential.

The system can meet variable demand as energy can be released from one or more reservoirs depending on what is needed.

 

Be part of a Revolution, not just a New Year's Resolution

We launched the project as the clocks brought in New Year in Kiritimati (31 December 2017 10 am GMT).  Kiritimati Island was originally used as a stopping point for Pacific Ocean travellers since AD 400 and was discovered by European mapmakers in 1537. Rising sea levels and coastal erosion is having a devastating effect on Kiritimati,

Its population of 5115 people and the rest of the islands that make up the Republic of Kiribati have plans now in place to relocate islanders across neighbouring nations in the Pacific including Fiji if a solution cannot be found in time.

As planet Earth wakes up to 2018, a new horizon will pass across many nations and lands directly affected by rising sea levels, global temperature rises and changes to our weather patterns affecting food growing and animal habitats.

Start the new year in 2018 by being part of a positive change movement, a collection of like-minded individuals who believe in Climate Change and want to take action to change things for the future.

We are looking for Eco-Warriors - is that you?

“Solving the climate crisis is within our grasp, but we need people like you to stand up and act.”

Al Gore, Founder and Chairman, The Climate Reality Project.

How do you get involved

We are gathering support to put into place our action plan for change which in 2018 will

1. Gather international support for the creative global climate solution  

2. Build a working model in a Scottish coastal area.

3. Meet with influencers to share our groundbreaking invention.

4. Publish feasibility study report.

5. Work with Human Survival Foundation to share knowledge and raise awareness.

“There is no question that climate change is happening; the only arguable point is what part humans are playing in it.”

David Attenborough

State of the Ocean

 

About Me

My name is Kwong Shing Tse but I usually go by the name Peter and I live in South Lanarkshire, Scotland.

As an inventor whose parents were climate refugees, l look at the world in a different way.

The human being is the most intelligent life in this solar system as far we know. Curiosity and innovation are part of our identity and within this sometimes artificial world we live in today, everything we use is made from nature. from our toothbrush to the space shuttle.

Many of our great visionary and inventor changed and shaped our world to where we are today and in the 21st century, we are breaking new ground daily. Digital technology has given us this amazing opportunity to connect every corner of the world and share knowledge and thoughts.

This is the perfect chance to bring the world together, to achieve the common goal of fulfilling our true human potential. Human nature has always desired to pass on knowledge, and care for the young and vulnerable.  Many philanthropic organisations are doing great work all around the world but that still is not enough!

Today over 7 billion people are living off this wonderful planet. Every one of you has a unique story. but when it comes to the story of human survival- we only have one.

It is up to us to choose what role we play, and how we contribute to this magnificent human story.

Today I invite you to join me, to open a new chapter of our civilization.

Let the history-making began.

About CPE Global and The Human Survival Foundation

CPE Global is our engineering company that will take forward this new invention with our charity The Human Survival Foundation taking forward our education and campaigning work. Our main objective is to transform this invention into a reality that would cater to sustainable and international coastal economic growth.

What causes sea level rise?

The two major causes of global sea level rise are thermal expansion caused by warming of the ocean (since water expands as it warms) and increased melting of land-based ice, such as glaciers and ice sheets. This additional meltwater will cause a rise in sea level which will be seen as a large coastal erosion increase globally.

What is coastal erosion?

Video of coastal erosion in Pacifica.

2018 update of coastal erosion in Pacifica- 9 months later

Coastal erosion is the wearing away of land and the removal of beach or sand dunes sediments by rising sea levels, wave action, tidal currents, wave currents, drainage or high winds.

Coastal erosion plays a huge part in our earth system if we understand how the weather system works, when ice melting causes rise in sea level, it leads to faster erosion than before while raising the sea temperature due to shallower water at the shore.

The earth's  weather system has four key fundamentals: earth rotation, gravity, thermodynamics, and hydrodynamic.

The problem of land loss can be exaggerated if sea level rises relative to the land (either due to true sea level change or geological sinking of the coastline).

The ocean is 71% of the earth surface Now imagine the ocean surface increase to 80%.

Due to rising sea levels globally, many low-lying island and coastal communities are at risk.

In the UK alone, we are suffering from 17% coastal erosion in Scotland and 30% in England.

 

Global Example: Southeast Louisiana, USA

In just 80 years, some 2,000 square miles of this coastal landscape have turned to open water, wiping places off maps, bringing the Gulf of Mexico to the back door of New Orleans and posing a lethal threat to an energy and shipping corridor vital to the nation’s economy.

The landscape is washing away at a rate of an american football field every hour, 16 square miles per year. Two years ago, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) removed 31 bays and other features of the landscapes from local maps, some of which had been named by French explorers in the 1700s.

What is the global focus on climate change?

At the Paris climate conference (COP21) in December 2015, 195 countries adopted the first-ever universal, legally binding global climate deal. The agreement sets out a global action plan to put the world on track to avoid dangerous climate change by limiting global warming to well below 2°C. It set a new plan to call Sustainable Development Goal (SDG)to address the consequence of the carbon-based economy from the first industrial revolution.

We are in the beginning of the  Forth Industrial Revolution

We need your support. We believe in our ability to change the world and hope you do too. 

Donate now to make the difference and be connected to the global change movement. 

Thank You

Peter and The CPE Team
story_txt: “We have not inherited the Earth from our parents, we have borrowed it from our children.”The International Union for the Conservation of Nature, World Conservation Strategy. Sustainable Coastal DevelopmentSustainability is the heart of our invention and we care about protecting and revitalising coastal communities, generating and storing renewable energy and providing healthy food for the world’s growing population.CPE Global was formed by Peter Tse to promote his pioneering coastal protection system – the Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef – which harnesses the power of the ocean to generate and store renewable energy while enabling sustainable land and water-based development.Ecological Artificial Barrier ReefThe Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef acts as a defence protecting the coast from waves, storms, floods, and erosion. It generates and stores energy using multiple Seawater Exchange and Storage Systems (SESS) joined together to reach the desired area mass for each unique location where it will be placed. The Ecological Artificial Barrier Reef provides a calm, controlled, lagoon environment which can be used for watersports and leisure.It creates an environment for marine biodiversity in the same way as a natural barrier reef.The Seawater Exchange and Storage SystemThe Seawater Exchange and Storage System (SESS) harnesses the untapped potential of the ocean using pump hydro storage and hydroelectricity to generate and store energy until needed.It is a circular structure with turbines to move seawater around three reservoirs to create a continuous energy-generating loop.Most places have two tides a day which gives additional energy generating potential.The system can meet variable demand as energy can be released from one or more reservoirs depending on what is needed. Be part of a Revolution, not just a New Year's ResolutionWe launched the project as the clocks brought in New Year in Kiritimati (31 December 2017 10 am GMT).  Kiritimati Island was originally used as a stopping point for Pacific Ocean travellers since AD 400 and was discovered by European mapmakers in 1537. Rising sea levels and coastal erosion is having a devastating effect on Kiritimati,Its population of 5115 people and the rest of the islands that make up the Republic of Kiribati have plans now in place to relocate islanders across neighbouring nations in the Pacific including Fiji if a solution cannot be found in time.As planet Earth wakes up to 2018, a new horizon will pass across many nations and lands directly affected by rising sea levels, global temperature rises and changes to our weather patterns affecting food growing and animal habitats.Start the new year in 2018 by being part of a positive change movement, a collection of like-minded individuals who believe in Climate Change and want to take action to change things for the future.We are looking for Eco-Warriors - is that you?“Solving the climate crisis is within our grasp, but we need people like you to stand up and act.”Al Gore, Founder and Chairman, The Climate Reality Project.How do you get involvedWe are gathering support to put into place our action plan for change which in 2018 will1. Gather international support for the creative global climate solution  2. Build a working model in a Scottish coastal area.3. Meet with influencers to share our groundbreaking invention.4. Publish feasibility study report.5. Work with Human Survival Foundation to share knowledge and raise awareness.“There is no question that climate change is happening; the only arguable point is what part humans are playing in it.”David AttenboroughState of the Ocean About MeMy name is Kwong Shing Tse but I usually go by the name Peter and I live in South Lanarkshire, Scotland.As an inventor whose parents were climate refugees, l look at the world in a different way.The human being is the most intelligent life in this solar system as far we know. Curiosity and innovation are part of our identity and within this sometimes artificial world we live in today, everything we use is made from nature. from our toothbrush to the space shuttle.Many of our great visionary and inventor changed and shaped our world to where we are today and in the 21st century, we are breaking new ground daily. Digital technology has given us this amazing opportunity to connect every corner of the world and share knowledge and thoughts.This is the perfect chance to bring the world together, to achieve the common goal of fulfilling our true human potential. Human nature has always desired to pass on knowledge, and care for the young and vulnerable.  Many philanthropic organisations are doing great work all around the world but that still is not enough!Today over 7 billion people are living off this wonderful planet. Every one of you has a unique story. but when it comes to the story of human survival- we only have one.It is up to us to choose what role we play, and how we contribute to this magnificent human story.Today I invite you to join me, to open a new chapter of our civilization.Let the history-making began.About CPE Global and The Human Survival FoundationCPE Global is our engineering company that will take forward this new invention with our charity The Human Survival Foundation taking forward our education and campaigning work. Our main objective is to transform this invention into a reality that would cater to sustainable and international coastal economic growth.What causes sea level rise?The two major causes of global sea level rise are thermal expansion caused by warming of the ocean (since water expands as it warms) and increased melting of land-based ice, such as glaciers and ice sheets. This additional meltwater will cause a rise in sea level which will be seen as a large coastal erosion increase globally.What is coastal erosion?Video of coastal erosion in Pacifica.2018 update of coastal erosion in Pacifica- 9 months laterCoastal erosion is the wearing away of land and the removal of beach or sand dunes sediments by rising sea levels, wave action, tidal currents, wave currents, drainage or high winds.Coastal erosion plays a huge part in our earth system if we understand how the weather system works, when ice melting causes rise in sea level, it leads to faster erosion than before while raising the sea temperature due to shallower water at the shore.The earth's  weather system has four key fundamentals: earth rotation, gravity, thermodynamics, and hydrodynamic.The problem of land loss can be exaggerated if sea level rises relative to the land (either due to true sea level change or geological sinking of the coastline).The ocean is 71% of the earth surface Now imagine the ocean surface increase to 80%.Due to rising sea levels globally, many low-lying island and coastal communities are at risk.In the UK alone, we are suffering from 17% coastal erosion in Scotland and 30% in England. Global Example: Southeast Louisiana, USAIn just 80 years, some 2,000 square miles of this coastal landscape have turned to open water, wiping places off maps, bringing the Gulf of Mexico to the back door of New Orleans and posing a lethal threat to an energy and shipping corridor vital to the nation’s economy.The landscape is washing away at a rate of an american football field every hour, 16 square miles per year. Two years ago, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) removed 31 bays and other features of the landscapes from local maps, some of which had been named by French explorers in the 1700s.What is the global focus on climate change?At the Paris climate conference (COP21) in December 2015, 195 countries adopted the first-ever universal, legally binding global climate deal. The agreement sets out a global action plan to put the world on track to avoid dangerous climate change by limiting global warming to well below 2°C. It set a new plan to call Sustainable Development Goal (SDG)to address the consequence of the carbon-based economy from the first industrial revolution.We are in the beginning of the  Forth Industrial RevolutionWe need your support. We believe in our ability to change the world and hope you do too. Donate now to make the difference and be connected to the global change movement. Thank YouPeter and The CPE Team

story:
FAQ

What is the Ologram device Used for?
Economy and fast way to market your product and services.  Pure fun and quick customer attention guranteed.

How does it work?
The device wings rotate and produce holographic effect on any pictures or 3d videos imported and played through our dedicated mobile app. It looks impressive for videos with black background.

What is the display size of the device?
46cm

Do we have size variants for the product?
At the moment, No. But soon we are expecting to launch bigger size variants.

Does it have speakers?
No, but it can auto-connect to any nearby bluetooth speakers.

Does it runs on battery or Main powered?
At the moment the product is main powered. 

What is the general voltage supply device can run?
110v/230v. 

What is the weight of the device?
1.5 kg

Is any other color variant available?
Sorry, no. The only design is matte black. New color variants to be released soon.

How is the content played through device?
We have a dedicated mobile app where jpeg images, mp4 videos and gif could be imported and played.

Is this portable?  
Yes, it is. Additionally you can also attach to wall like LED tv.

How is the device visibility under sunlight?
It still looks good but it may have reduced holographic content visibility.

Is it waterproof and dust resistant?
No 

Where is it manufactured?
China

Who are the recommended ages to use the device?
We recommend the user's age to be 17 years and up. Children under 17 years needs to be under the Adult's supervision.  Please make sure you play at a 3 metre distance from the audience to avoid any accidental damage. Always care about your surroundings if played without acrylic protection shell.

When does shipping begin?
Approximately by first week of March 2018

What is the ETA to my door?
ETA will be 7-10 days

Do I have to pay Import/ VAT / GST charges?
Yes, it may vary based on your country.

How do I choose more than 1 device?
If the quantity is not editable at the checkout, please make a new contribution for each perk.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?
Please Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered on Indiegogo to check the status. Otherwise, the ETA of the device will remain as advertised.

What is the refund policy?
We cannot offer refund due to manufacturer purchase limitations and logistics commitment towards each perk. So please take utmost care for details before perk contribution is made.

What is your return / exchange / warranty policy?
At the moment return / exchange / warranty options cannot be supported due to maintenance and reverse logistics limitations.

I am interested in a distribution/investment partnership?
Please reach out to support@ologram.in

If I have other questions, who should I contact?
support@ologram.in

Risks and Challenges

SAFETY
Please make sure the device is placed at a 3 metre distance from the audience to avoid any accidental damage. Always care about your surroundings if the device is played without acrylic protection shell.

LEGALITY 
Please check your local legal requirement of the electric hologram devices before you use it, the laws and regulations vary by countries, states or counties.

Other Risk or Challenges 
Ologram has sourced good suppliers and manufacturers who make the components for us. Certain suppliers might have different lead time and their own peak season production circle, Our biggest challenge is to
control the lead time better. To be able to do so, we need collect enough funds in front to pay demand to meet the suppliers' MOQ (minimum order qty) requirement to have the suppliers prioritize our purchase order.
The shipping lead time and ETA could change from above if there is any facts out of Ologram's control form outside parties such as the carrier, Customs held or any other law and regulatory factors etc.
