story:
Short Summary

We have been thinking ,it  would be much easier if you have a multifunctional USB Hub to work in office ,that is certainly more convenient .So we have been focusing on designing one unique product different from the others on the market .And here we are .

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need $ 500000 to start the prototype and produce mass products.

  • 1. The Original Premium USB C HUB+WIRELESS CHARGER, better than other usb c hub. 

    2.Helper - When you need to connect at home, in the office, or on the road, this 8-in-1 hub is your perfect work assistant that helps you get fast access to your USB devices, SD/TF cards and more.

    3. Power pass through - Get more juice for your iPhone, Bluetooth headphones, and other devices.

    4. Rugged cable With the premium nylon braided you can be sure you always have a connection handy.

    5.5Gbps Data Transfer With 3 USB 3.0 ports, you could connect your keyboard, mouse, thumb drives, etc. at the same time. And the transfer rates up to 5Gbps, which allows you to upload and download photos, music, and other files quickly.

    6.Safe: Engineered in full compliance with standards, ensuring safety for you and your devices.

  • Full amount of funds will  go back to your PayPal accounts if we don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

  • We are currently a small business ,which needs your financial help to get our project successfully  done ,after that we are going to give you a full refund ,and you can also buy a discount product form us .

Risks & Challenges

 The sole overcome we need to overcome is financial issue.

  • Once we obtain the fund we need for ,we are going to start our plan immediately .

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are unable to do us financial help ,the least you could do is advertise our item by word of mouths.
  • Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary
We have been thinking ,it  would be much easier if you have a multifunctional USB Hub to work in office ,that is certainly more convenient .So we have been focusing on designing one unique product different from the others on the market .And here we are .
 

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

We need $ 500000 to start the prototype and produce mass products.

1. The Original Premium USB C HUB+WIRELESS CHARGER, better than other usb c hub. 
2.Helper - When you need to connect at home, in the office, or on the road, this 8-in-1 hub is your perfect work assistant that helps you get fast access to your USB devices, SD/TF cards and more.
3. Power pass through - Get more juice for your iPhone, Bluetooth headphones, and other devices.
4. Rugged cable With the premium nylon braided you can be sure you always have a connection handy.
5.5Gbps Data Transfer With 3 USB 3.0 ports, you could connect your keyboard, mouse, thumb drives, etc. at the same time. And the transfer rates up to 5Gbps, which allows you to upload and download photos, music, and other files quickly.
6.Safe: Engineered in full compliance with standards, ensuring safety for you and your devices.

Full amount of funds will  go back to your PayPal accounts if we don't reach your entire goal.


The Impact
We are currently a small business ,which needs your financial help to get our project successfully  done ,after that we are going to give you a full refund ,and you can also buy a discount product form us .

Risks & Challenges
 The sole overcome we need to overcome is financial issue.
Once we obtain the fund we need for ,we are going to start our plan immediately .

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to do us financial help ,the least you could do is advertise our item by word of mouths.
Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Why Oonnati

In India, 9 million pumps used for irrigation are diesel-powered, costing farmers $4 billion per year. These pumps are a huge financial burden on farmers, most of whom cannot afford to invest in alternatives. Diesel pumps are also highly polluting, accounting for a staggering 5% of India’s carbon emissions. Lack of affordable irrigation solutions has led to an irrigation crisis, keeping agricultural yields low, limiting farmers' meagre incomes, and trapping them in a cycle of poverty. 

Solar pumps are a cost-effective and sustainable solution, but 90% of farmers - mostly poor and marginal farmers with less than 1 hectare of landholding - cannot afford the upfront investment. 

Oonnati, which means "progress" in Hindi, is a disruptive solution to make affordable low-carbon solar pumping technology accessible to these farmers. We install, operate and maintain Community Solar Pumps that can be shared by a group of 15-30 farmers with adjacent landholding. Any farmer with land near to a solar pump can sign up to Oonnati irrigation services and access water year-round without any upfront cost. Farmers buy water on a pay-as-you-go basis at a tariff that is 20% cheaper than diesel-powered irrigation. They can more effectively irrigate their land, increase crop yields by up to 50% and diversify to grow high-value crops - thus potentially doubling their incomes. 

In addition to providing water services, Oorja also operates and maintains the solar pumps for their full lifetime, ensuring sustainability. 

 

The Plan

Oorja is running this campaign to launch Oonnati in Assam, India, where only 20% of farmland is under irrigation, with the remainder being rainfed. Almost 70% of the population of Assam is directly dependent on agriculture as a source of income. Farmers grow mostly rice, wheat, oilseeds, pulses and some vegetables and fruits. There is potential for high agricultural yields, but this is constrained by erratic and uncertain rainfall.

With your contribution, we will install six Community Solar Pumps in Bongaigaon district, Assam, helping irrigate approximately 120 acres of farmland. This project will meet the irrigation water needs of a community of about 1,000 people. It will reduce their irrigation expenses by over 20%, prevent 5,000 litres of diesel from being burned annually and save 13,400 kg of CO2 from being emitted each year. We will also create 4 full-time jobs in the  community. 

We have partnered with Seven Sisters Development Assistance (SeSTA), a local NGO that has been active in livelihood promotion in Assam for the past eight years. They will assist us with community mobilisation and formation of farmer groups. SeSTA will also train farmers on effective irrigation and cultivation of high-value crops to help maximise the benefits farmers receive from solar pumping.

This project is a critical milestone in our mission to build inclusive, prosperous and climate-resilient rural economies. It is important because it will help us demonstrate the viability of Oonnati in a new market, gain traction among farmers, and scale up to deploy 1000s of solar pumps. In contributing to this campaign, you will not just be supporting a project. You will be helping us build a movement so that we can replicate this model all over India and Africa to impact millions of farmers.

 

What We Need

Your donations will be used for the deployment of one Cluster of six Community Solar Pumps (each 3 HP in capacity) in Assam. We require £25,000 to cover the costs of solar pumping equipment, borewell construction, labour and material for installation and travel to Bongaigaon district, Assam for site selection, project implementation and training. With support from SeSTA, we have already collected preliminary data on local groundwater levels and cropping patterns and obtained buy-in from the farming community. Once we receive the funds, we will be ready to proceed with procuring equipment and implementing the project so we can start Oonnati irrigation services this summer. The costs of operating and maintaining the pump Cluster (technician and operator salaries, spare parts, repairs, etc.) will be covered by the water fees collected from farmers.

A breakdown of the use of funds is provided below:

In case we only partially meet our funding goal, we will install a reduced number of solar pumps on a pro rata basis after covering our essential costs (£3,500 for travel and overheads). On the other hand, if we exceed our funding goal, we have several more feasible sites in the pipeline, where we can implement additional Clusters. In short, more funds equal more pumps deployed and more farmers impacted!

You can monitor the progress and the impact this project will have in three ways: through our live Impact Dashboard on our website, by signing up to our newsletter, and by following our social media channels (@oorjasolutions).

 

Who Are We?

We are Oorja Development Solutions (Oorja), an award-winning social enterprise based in New Delhi, India, that has been active since 2017. Our mission is to develop solar energy solutions to combat poverty and climate change. Oorja has a passionate team of four people with 25 years of total experience in sustainable development, renewable energy, finance and climate change: Amit Saraogi, a seasoned social entrepreneur; Dr Clementine Chambon, a renewable energy expert; Lanvin Concessao, a green energy engineer; and Pushpendra Kumar, a solar technician with deep connection to local communities.

Our team is extremely capable and resourceful, having gained considerable ground experience in the planning and execution of community-based solar projects. This project builds on three successful Community Solar Pumping pilots installed by us in Uttar Pradesh, India in late 2018. Around 450 people from two different communities are benefiting from cheaper and reliable irrigation. As groundwater can now be accessed in the dry season, many farmers have started a third cropping cycle and are growing high-value peppermint, sugarcane and maize. 

 

The Perks

In exchange for your contributions, we are offering a number of exciting perks that you can claim as a way of appreciating your support. In case you wish to remain anonymous, you do not have to claim the perk in exchange for your contribution and we will ensure your privacy is respected.

In case you do not feel able to donate, we encourage you to tell your friends, family and colleagues about this campaign and to share it in your networks and on social media - just spreading the word can make a huge difference. Thank you!

story:
LiONCooler uses advanced battery technology which means, users can SAY GOODBYE to the hassle of buying bags of ice that will eventually melt. 

Barbecues, fishing and boating trips, backyard parties, school sports events, road trips, tailgating and picnics just got a whole lot better. 

Also, it's the perfect gear for a soccer mom!

 

Features

  • LiONCooler chills to -4°F and is equipped with quality LG compressors to ensure performance.

 How It Works 

173Wh Rechargeable 

  • LiONCooler takes 4-6 hours to fully charge. 
  •  The easy “snap-in/out” battery has a 10-hour life  to keep the chill.  
  • This luggage-style design makes LiONCooler easy to move without having to lift. 
  • The 6" durable wheels make transportation easy across all terrains.
  • The removable insulating lid lets you wash it when needed or detach for easy and quick access when with a group.
  •  Use AC, 12-volt DC in the car, or solar panels. 
  • The battery only depletes when you use LiONCooler in portable mode. If you are connected to a power source, the battery will stay fully-charged.
  • If temperature outside changes, you can adjust the cooler’s temperature using the digital LCD display or remotely with the free Bluetooth App available for iOS or Android.

 

Partnership

Warranty

CES 2019, Las Vegas

Why We Started?

The PhD founder's personal story originated during hours spent at the sidelines supporting his children at school sports events and the simple everyday need for chilled drinks to refresh the kids. 

ACOPower  development team has 20 years experience in electronics and solar power. The ACOPower team based in Walnut, California designs, supplies and manufactures innovative “smart” consumer electronics with a strong element of solar-powered know-how at the heart of everything we do.  We strive to satisfy customer needs — ranging from people who like camping, RV or boat owners, to disaster relief workers.

ACOPower wants to supply well-priced and top-quality products, as well as offer customer service and technical support. As the leading portable power supplier, we are confident that you will enjoy our new products, and we can’t wait to hear what you think!

story:
TechKlo - Self clean Litter box

Brand new fully automatic cat toilet. Your new furniture in your house ..

This model, which your cat will need for toiletries, is very different from other models on the market in terms of design, usage and materials

Before passing to the properties, we want to talk about the design. The material used in the design of the product we made in the present is wood and the outer surface is ultra "bright white". It is aimed at the demands of elite customers who do not want to use plastic at home. Made from easily cleanable, non-staining material.

Other wood colors are available.

The purpose of our campaign;

Because the wooden model is produced at a high price and the sale is offered at a price that can not be obtained by every cat owner, we want to go to production of our product with plastic for the purpose of addressing wider sections. We need $ 150,000 for production.

Plastic Model Drawing ;

If you help us with this capital, we would like to pay with 3 options below.

1- If you would like to donate $ 500 to the ready-made wood model I will send it to you within 1 week,This product is made of 100% wood and is not a cat toilet that you can see at all. The product has a 1 year warranty. There is a refund on delivery damage. Make a high donation and have a private cat toilet.

2- Donate $ 150 and we will send you one of the first products after plastic production. The sales price of plastic products will be $ 240. We will send you the product for free for $ 150 donation because you are helping us by ordering a preliminary order to my project. We need 2 months to be able to send our product donors after the campaign has been successful.

3- For $ 20 or more we will send cat hair removal gloves to you for donations. With this special glove we produce, you will collect the pussy spilled fluffy. If you prove that it does not work, we give your money back.

Technical specifications of our product;

1- works automatically after the cat relieves itself and separates the feces from the sand and throws it into the garbage in the front section. You only change the bag inside by opening a drawer every 3-4 days. As long as the cat does not come out of the toilet, the mechanism does not work and the mechanism stops when the cat goes back into the toilet.

The 2-drawer rubbish bin is on average 3-4 days old.

3- Electricity usage is very low, you can also work with an external battery.

4- do not give out smell,

5- It is very easy to change the sand and clean the interior thanks to its special design.

6- Materials used are Class 1 grade.

7- Desired interior color can be used with led lighting.

Why the automatic cat toilet?

1- It has benefits in respect of hygiene, removes the contact with the cat feces.

2- Pregnant women do not have to give up their cat because they are away from feces and odours.

3-You will have the time to clean the cat toilet on your daily plans.

 

Let's not forget that you can use it for your little dogs.

 

Buy a wooden model with high donation immediately if you desire, donate / pre-order for plastic model if you desire special for your donate donations made in small quantities we send a special design feather cleaning glove ..

Thanks for your interest

story:
Short Summary

This solar powering unit is a time switching battery powered solar charged circuit, used to power an Arduino Uno and some peripherals. The solar powering unit presented here is energy efficient. When we talk about Arduino, it consumes lots of energy in displays and other work that are not important. The solar powering unit presented here has a timer which turns on the Arduino in regular intervals. When you have a project like weather station, remote data logger, etc. or applications like this, you do not have to keep your Arduino on all the time. And of course in all this applications, powering is the major issue. If you turn on the Arduino in 1 minute or any interval, it can save a lot energy. This unit is variable i.e. you can decide the time delay! The unit can also power your Arduino when there is no sunlight(at night) as it has a rechargeable battery inside.

It's not just a solar powering unit and not just a timer. It's a combination of both of them!

 

Features:

  • Time switching device 
  • Variable i.e. you can change the time delay
  • Can also work without sunlight!
  • Easy to use
  • Switch for using power from batteries
  • Highly compatible with Arduino and its peripherals
  • Long battery life
  • Detachable solar panel
  • Less charging time
  • Portable
  • Clean energy

The unit actually contains a timer which is variable and the time delay can be adjusted by Potentiometer. The maximum time delay you can set is 5 minutes. The minimum time delay is 30 seconds. If there is no proper sunlight, a switch is provided to run your Arduino on Batteries! The port for this is different.

Night mode:

In night mode, the unit powers your device in absence of sunlight. Based on the applications, there are two types of unit:

1. With timer in night mode:

It is ideal for applications like weather station, data loggers, leakage detection, etc.

2. Without timer in night mode:

It is ideal for applications like theft detection where probability of theft is high at night.

Applications:

Weather Stations

This unit can be used to power weather monitors. Here it is not necessary to keep the sensors working 24/7. They can be made working using specific time delay which can save a lot power. 

Data logggers

The unit can also be used to power data loggers. They can collect data at specific time delays saving energy.

Powering copper pipe theft alarm

Copper pipe theft is increasing day by day increasing demand of copper. For prevention of this, copper pipe theft alarms are placed in industries.

"There's no question the theft has gotten much, much worse," said Mike Adelizzi, president of the American Supply Association, a nonprofit group representing distributors and suppliers in the plumbing, heating, cooling and industrial pipe industries.

This unit can be used to power the alarm system. In daytime we can use timer mode as the chances are lower for theft at daytime. For night time, special switch is placed in unit which keeps Arduino awake all the time. Thus, saving energy at daytime and using it at night.

Leakage detection

The unit can be used to power leakage detector circuit. This will check the leakage every specific time interval thus, saving energy.

In industries:

The timers are necessary to time the tasking and production which then enables to calculate costs and other elements.

But here, it's not just a timer it is power saving timer which powers your equipment.

Rates:

The unit is available in just 9.5$. 

1 unit = 9.5 USD

2 units = 19 USD

4 units = 36 USD

8 units: 72 USD

10 units: 89 USD

 

Battery Life Calculation:

Arduino ON time: 1 seconds

Arduino OFF time: 1 min. = 60 seconds

Power(when ON) = 1/3600 x 3mA = 0.0042 mWh

Power(when OFF)= 1/60 x 0.2mA = 0.167mWh

Operating Voltage: 5V

Power(ON+OFF): 0.17mWh

Li-Ion Battery: 2100mAh

Battery Voltage: 2.4V

Power: 2100 x 2.4 = 5040mWh

Battery Life: 5040/0.17 = 30k cycles

Note: Power consumed by power booster is not calculated here.

Thus, timer circuit saves a lot energy and also saves energy by cutting power of sensors, displays, etc. In sleep mode, the power consumed by ATMEL micro controller will reduce.

Without timer mode:

An Arduino Uno runs less than one day on a 9 V battery because it uses about 45 mA current. 

Source: http://www.home-automation-community.com

We want to raise fund to start the production of this solar powering units. Please share it as much as possible!

 

Thanks

The timers are necessary to time the tasking and production which then enables to calculate costs and other elements.
But here, it's not just a timer it is power saving timer which powers your equipment.
Rates:

The unit is available in just 9.5$. 
1 unit = 9.5 USD
2 units = 19 USD
4 units = 36 USD
8 units: 72 USD
10 units: 89 USD
 
Battery Life Calculation:
Arduino ON time: 1 seconds
Arduino OFF time: 1 min. = 60 seconds
Power(when ON) = 1/3600 x 3mA = 0.0042 mWh
Power(when OFF)= 1/60 x 0.2mA = 0.167mWh
Operating Voltage: 5V
Power(ON+OFF): 0.17mWh
Li-Ion Battery: 2100mAh
Battery Voltage: 2.4V
Power: 2100 x 2.4 = 5040mWh
Battery Life: 5040/0.17 = 30k cycles
Note: Power consumed by power booster is not calculated here.
Thus, timer circuit saves a lot energy and also saves energy by cutting power of sensors, displays, etc. In sleep mode, the power consumed by ATMEL micro controller will reduce.
Without timer mode:
An Arduino Uno runs less than one day on a 9 V battery because it uses about 45 mA current. 
Source: http://www.home-automation-community.com
We want to raise fund to start the production of this solar powering units. Please share it as much as possible!
 
Thanks

story:
All products created and brought to life through S.A.L. are marketed through the Stratos Aviation social entrepreneurial initiative where profits are redistributed as education grants to students pursuing STEM related studies in aviation and aerospace in both Canada and the United States. Students directly involved in the development and creation of a market worthy product are awarded full education grants.

 

 How does VENTUS work - Energy?

Ventus produces energy by using the air flow which enters the venting system to turn a fan blade attached to a micro turbine designed for the Ventus to produces a 5V current.

How does VENTUS work - Cooling?

Ventus uses pure science and precise angulation to create the perfect venturi. Air, when rushed through a venturi, will naturally decrease its temperature due to the increase of pressure at the tip of the “cone”. The Ventus will decrease the ambient temperature by 3-5 degrees Celcius,depending on the speed of the aircraft and outside air temperature.

Ventus and the Stratos Aerospace Lab are the brainchild of Shoushi Bakarian, a Syrian-Armenian refugee born and raised in Aleppo, Syria. Shoushi spent studying grades 11 and 12 in a city that had no electricity or running water, yet it didn’t stop her from excelling in her studies. In early 2016, her family was granted refugee status in Canada, where she immediately enrolled in Aerospace Engineering at Concordia University in Montreal, Canada. Stratos Aviation is honored to have discovered this humble gem whose dedication to promote STEM education to the next generation is commendable. Shoushi is a model to follow for today’s youth and embodies all the values Stratos Aviation and S.A.L stand for.

 

 

Product Warranty  

We stand 100% behind our products. Ventus comes with a 1 year manufacturing defect policy. If we can't fix or repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the product. Ventus was built with aviation and safety in mind therefore returns are only possible if the original box was never opened. Ventus - "On the Ground"  comes with a 60 day return policy, if you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product, simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked.

Customs & duties information  

We cannot mark orders as gifts. This is illegal, so we will not be able to do this. For Canada and the United States there will be no customs or duties. This may apply to other countries as well, but you have to know your local laws, rules and regulations.

Prices DO NOT include taxes (Not applicable for the US and Canada)

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. You are responsible for all freight and duties or taxes. We decided to make Ventus available worldwide, but it is impossible for us to build into Indiegogo pricing all shipping, duties and taxes fees. For international customers who are required to pay customs, either the shipping company (UPS, FedEx, DHL  etc..), or your local customs authorities will be asking for payment to have your order processed through customs.  Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery. 

Shipping procedure 

All Ventus shipments will leave from our location in Montreal, Canada. Once your order enters your country it will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International orders will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. Canada and US Domestic (48 contiguous states) shipments will take 3-7 business days. 

Shipping policy 

Once you receive your tracking number, it is your responsibility to insure reception of the shipment, please keep an eye out for the package. If one of our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, provided the wrong address, moved without notification, and the package returns back to us, you will be responsible to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. 

Risks and challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen situations when creating a new product There are so many components involved in creating a new product from scratch, everything needs to be managed accordingly . Our team is composed of serial inventors and entrepreneurs who have brought many products to the market and have been sold in over 90 countries around the world. We can proudly say that we have experience in this process and have developed systems and processes to reduce the risks and obstacles that will arise. We always work hard to deliver on our promises and when possible we will outdo ourselves.

Ventus - "On the Ground" was designed for anyone and everyone to be able to use and operate. 
Ventus - "In the Air" was designed for a series of Cessna aircrafts. Please make sure that you aircraft has the proper air ventilation system to accommodate the Ventus.

story:
Our Founders Story

Growing up in Texas in the 1960s and 70s Mark Poullos was surrounded by friends and family members in the aviation and oilfield industries. 

Mark’s father Milton was a researcher, who constantly introduced him to the latest and greatest in material science. This led Mark down the path to become an engineer. In 1984, while working on an off-shore oil platform Mark realized the potential to use laser powder coatings technology to solve the challenge of quickly corroding metals with plastics in harsh conditions.

Over 30 years later, Mark and his team of master laser engineers have created a one-of-a-kind patented laser technology that revolutionizes the way that both hobbyists and industrial companies add paint coatings to almost any object. We now debut the first at-home colorizing system, the Colorizer™.

 

How it works

  • Step 1: Upload your artwork to your PC
  • Step 2: Use the software to choose the colors in your image
  • Step 3: Add color powder to your object
  • Step 4: Run object through the Colorizer™. Repeat Step 3 and 4 for each color layer
  • Step 5: Cure object in oven to permanently affix your image

Benefits vs traditional painting and printing

  • No messy paints, brushes or cleanup solvents
  • No paint fumes
  • Highly durable finish 
  • No toxic paint or hazardous chemicals
  • Use on different surfaces
  • High speed and low cost
  • Custom imaging from home

 

Your participation in this campaign is important! 

  • Join the march towards environmentally responsible painting, reducing the negative impact from traditional chemical heavy solvent-based paint and energy hungry powder coating.
  • Become an early adopter of this personalized technology that is set to turn the painting and coating industry upside down. 
  • Your contribution will help us fund the first commercial steps of Photofusion to scale production and meet the first commercial needs.
  • Support an American technology and production.

 

Specs

  • Resolution: 150 DPI
  • Colorizer™ precision laser technology
  • Dimensions: 17 in. x 9 in. x 9 in. (430mm x 230mm x 230mm) 
  • Weight: 11 pounds
  • Laser spec: 2.5 watts Blue 445nm 
  • Printable area dimensions: Installed floor print dimensions are 7in x 9in. (180mm x 230mm).    If floor is removed, the printable area is variable depending on height of object.

story:
The POWER 1 , an off-grid solution to your power need.

It's hard to imagine living without electricity. Devices that are powered by electricity, such as phones and laptops, have become day-to-day essentials. And sometimes, having electricity can be live-saving in certain situations, such as unforeseen natural disasters or accidents. Whether you are camping,  taking a trip with your friends, finding yourself in an unexpected power outage, you will want to make sure you have an alternative power source to keep going.

 

POWER 1 is a powerful multi-functional portable power bank . It’s designed and crafted with both portability and usability in mind. On top of many other useful features, POWER 1 is equipped with three charging types to help you stay connected with friends and family.

 

The battery of the POWER 1 is extremely reliable. POWER 1 uses battery made by CATL (the battery supplier of TESLA) with 26800mah battery capacity, which can be recharged more than 1000 times.

 

POWER 1 equips with AC, DC, and USB charging

Most portable chargers on the market have low voltage power outputs (30/50/60W). When charging any device that requires a high output, it either won't charge the device or it will take much longer than expected. POWER 1 packs up to 100W of  power delivery, which is sufficient to supply power to small household appliances and personal electronics.

 

 

Operating Temperature

P01 power bank can sustain any temperature from -4°F to 140 °F. When being placed in an extreme environment, it can still demonstrate its exceptional charging power.

 

2.625lbs  Light and Portable

The lightweight design of POWER 1 is easy for anyone to carry everywhere.  Wherever being used indoors or outdoors, all electronics and small household appliances can be plugged in and used right away, making life better without the shortage of power.

 

Take it anywhere, and never let your favorite device run out of battery.

 

Now think back on your past...

 

Or did the battery in your car ever suddenly die?

 

POWER 1 could jump start any vehicle up to 5.0L Gasoline and 3.0L Diesel engines.

 

Smart Safety Protection

POWER 1 is equipped with many safety precautions. When any abnormal condition occurs, security measures will be activated. Not only is your safety ensured, but damages to devices are also prevented.

 

Never Spend a Dime by Solar Charging

In addition to recharge the power bank through the wall outlet, POWER 1 can also connect to solar panels, which makes it environmental- and budget-friendly. If you need to go on a wild adventure where access to outlets may be limited, take POWER 1 and solar panels with you and they will never cease to provide power.

 

 

Saving the Earth One Charge at a Time

With an ever increasing demand on energy,  most people are spending a huge amount of money every year on electricity, and the resulting waste is causing distress on the planet. Solar charging is a true renewable energy source. The need to reduce energy consumption is a never-ending problem, and using a portable solar panel is a great way to help the environment.

 

Five LED Lighting Modes

POWER 1 also comes with embedded lighting capability that can serve many purposes.

1. Strong flashlight

2. Soft flashlight

3. SOS distress signal

4. Warning light

5. Reading light

 

 

Flight Friendly

In compliance with TSA regulations, POWER 1 can safely board any aircraft, making it an ideal companion for frequent travelers

 

 

 

Current Product Stage: in Production

 

Constant Innovation is proud to partner with Roommi to bring POWER 1 to the mass market. Roommi is founded by a group of lifestyle enthusiasts who hope to combine "beautiful design" with "quality electronics" to create a more convenient and comforting living space. This power bank packs a great deal of features: AC, DC, and USB charging, jump-start capability, certified flight friendly, embedded LED flashlight, and solar input charging.

 

We will reveal our stretch goal when POWER 1 reaches $100k in funding, and stretch goal rewards will be available to all our project supports when POWER 1 reaches $200k in funding, so stay tuned for our big revelation!

 

Ideas never get realized? Issues finding a factory for production? These things would never happen with our project, because we've put in the effort to put our ideas into reality and we already have the first batch of products in hands. We have established a long-term working relationship with the factory for many years, and for many of our existing products. However, we do aware of possible risks that can still impact the most well-planned project. For example, sometimes a machine or tool could break, factory loses power due to weather condition, or suppliers deliver wrong materials. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our products. Maybe we will get a million orders and our factory may not produce all the goods on time. Sounds like a good problem to have and we hope we get there, and we will do our best to keep our promises on the delivery time frame. Shipping could be delayed due to COVID-19 or other issues occurred during transit. We promise to give you full transparency whenever a problem occurs. We will keep you up to date with our latest news and deadlines.

However, we do aware of possible risks that can still impact the most well-planned project. For example, sometimes a machine or tool could break, factory loses power due to weather condition, or suppliers deliver wrong materials. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our products. Maybe we will get a million orders and our factory may not produce all the goods on time. Sounds like a good problem to have and we hope we get there, and we will do our best to keep our promises on the delivery time frame. Shipping could be delayed due to COVID-19 or other issues occurred during transit. We promise to give you full transparency whenever a problem occurs. We will keep you up to date with our latest news and deadlines.

story:
EPO-90 is a liquid-powered emergency power supply for USB devices that can operate independently of the weather and time of day and provide enough power to handle a potential emergency. If you fill the epo with liquids and connect with your cellphone, you can extend the phone's operating time, you will be able to call for help, you can be found for hours, and you don't have to wait to get help, or not.

The EPO-90 can be used up to 100+ times with the exact instructions in its manual. It is primarily designed for emergency use. All EPO-90 is dry-ionized with minerals, which guarantees safe operation (without any additional ions) for the first 1-2 times. For any further use, natural mineral salts may be required. In the case of operation with natural or ionized liquid, it is not necessary to add any additives, as it has a natural amount of dissolved minerals.


- All types of USB devices can be used for emergency operation and safety charging.
- Even in the most extreme conditions, it is fool-proof.
- It can be stored for up to 25 years in dry (standby) state, so it is always ready for
immediate operation during this period.

For someone to get into an emergency, you don't have to climb, fly, or go to sea. An unexpected situation can happen anywhere, anytime, anywhere. For example road accidents, situations caused by storms, sea or water accidents, power outages, avalanches, etc. Be prepeared to have a good chance handle such emergency situations!

The mobile phone is already there for everyone, we can use it in an emergency, but if it is discharged we can't get help. We can get lost in the woods, we can't use it as a light source. There are two types of emergency: unexpected and predictable.

The EPO-90 helps you manage the situation. 

Managing an emergency consists of three important elements:
1. Ensuring Communication - Independently from the weather conditions EPO helps you to charge instantly your mobile, radio or walkie-talkie in case a low, or empty battery so you can call for help
2. Positioning - The power consumption of devices with a large display, or apps with detailed graphics is very high. With our emergency power unit you can charge your GPS, or phone to specify your exact position and help the rescue team to find you.
3. Visibility - To use your mobile device’s flashlight for a longer time has a very high power consumption. If you need to make yourself visible, or need to make light in a dark environment you can use EPO to charge your device and extend the working time of your device for hours. With an extension part you are able to make light with your EPO.

The spirit of the EPO-90 is the energy cell based on SWES Technology, which is specially designed for producing energy from ionized liquid and completed with custom control electronics. This is a galvanic system that when immersed in liquid, produces the necessary energy by electro-chemistry.

EPO-90 has been developed to be able to operate (with the exception of acids and alkalis) with any oil and fat-free liquid. All EPO-90 are dry-ionized, guaranteeing immediate operation with any liquid.

The EPO-90 is suitable for direct operation or charging of any device with an A-type USB connector.

For example, for charging mobile phones, tablets or even battery banks, as well as for direct operation and operation of USB lights, E-books, fans, GPS and Walkie-Talkies, smart watches, photo cameras. So it can be used with any electrical device that has a USB power connector.

 

 

If it is used in accordance with the regulations, it can be used up to 100x, otherwise it can work for 25 years, so you can get ready for an emergency, for natural disasters and you should order now, because they are getting cheaper during the campaign. 

We provide standby warranty for EPO-90 is 25 years and 1 year standard guarantee. The standby warranty is valid till the first usage of the product. The guarantee doesn’t cover any freight or shipping charges.
Please note that a repair issue will NOT be covered by this warranty if: 

1. The warranty issue is caused by misuse or poor maintenance. Please refer to the instruction booklet for guidance on EPO-90 use and maintenance. 

2. Repairs or modifications are carried out by customer or a third party. 

3. EPO-90 is purchased from an unauthorized retailer, or purchased a pre-owned item.

4. EPO-90 damaged as a result of an accident by customer or a third party.

Please note that while the warranty may not be honored, some replacement parts will be available for purchase.

1 x EPO-90 „For emergency situations”

  • max. 5VDC / 1650mW
  • Only to charge or operate one device
  • Mobile charging up to 50% (depending on mobile type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • Other charging function max 2,5 hours
  • Direct operation of manual GPS approx. 8-10 hours
  • Lighting plant (depending on the light source) max. 15 hours

2 x EPO-90 with 4/2 bridge

  • max. 5VDC / 3300mW
  • Only to charge or operate one device
  • Mobile charging up to 100% (depending on mobile type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • Other charging function max 2,5 hours
  • Direct operation of manual GPS approx. 12-15 hours
  • Lighting plant (depending on the light source) max. 20 hours

3 x EPO-90 with 4/2 bridge

  • max. 5VDC / 4950mW
  • Charging or operating one or two devices simultaneously
  • 1 x Mobile charging up to 100% (depending on mobile type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • 2 x Mobile charging up to 100% (depending on mobile type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • Other charging function max 2,5 hours
  • Direct operation of manual GPS approx. 12-15 hours
  • Lighting plant (depending on the light source) max. 20 hours

3 x EPO-90 with 3/1 bridge

  • 12VDC / 4800mW
  • Only to charge or operate one device
  • Other charging function max 2,5 hours
  • 12VDC GPS or VHF radio (depending on device) direct operation max. 8 hours
  • Lighting plant (depending on the light source) max. 20 hours

4 x EPO-90 with 4/2 bridge

  • 5VDC / 6600mW
  • Charging or operating one or two devices simultaneously
  • 1 x Mobil charging up to 100% (depending on mobile type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • 2 x Mobil charging up to 100% (depending on mobile type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • 1 x Tablet or Ipad charging up to 80% (depending on type) - usage time max. 2,5 hours
  • Other charging function max 2,5 hours
  • Direct operation of manual GPS approx. 12-15 hours
  • Lighting plant (depending on the light source) max. 20 hours





Worldwide shipping will begin in  May 2019.  Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes, customer pay all freight and customs, duties, taxes.

We will inform all customers individually about the actuel valid shipping prices. Please note that shipping prices may vary depends on the shipping location, weight and amount of ordered products, etc. Ordering more perks to the same address may reduce the shipping cost per unit.

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will be contacted by the shipping carrier.

As soon as your order was shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and shipping details. We use TNT, UPS and GLS for shipping and handling.

If the shipping carrier attempts delivery and customer is not there, or the address is wrong, or you moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to the factory, it will be customer’s responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. 

Return Policy
Products may be returned within 15 days of receipt in new, unused condition. Simply send it back and we will refund it, no questions asked. Returns will be credited for the product only. The cost of returned shipping will be payed by customer.

Our team has been developing, designing and manufacturing ionized liquid power based electronic products since 2011.
We have electro-engineers, a factory expert, diving experts, a designer and some other experts and professionals in the team, who are passionate about the SWES Technology, about this new, Green Energy Source.
We have an in-house developing and manufacturer team and also a customer service.

 

From the very first time our idea was to develop products which are running with salt-water or with other ionized liquid, so they can be used in the sea without any further charging or battery. We have been developed the SWES Energy Cell in 2011. which can produce sustainable, green energy with any ionized liquid. The products powered by SWES Energy Cell don’t need batteries, they don’t need to be charged and they can be used in about 25 years. Our very first, salt-water powered product was an underwater light designed for divers.

Sourcing, manufacturing, and logistics have all been sorted out. We have strict quality expectations towards our suppliers to assure the quality and schedule of the production. Despite our best effort, there could still be unforeseen issues in the production or in the logistic. We are prepared to solve these challenges and give the best shopping experience to our backers and customers.

The revenue from this campaign will be used towards production and further development of the product.
We will keep informed our backers on the progress of every step of the project.

We look forward to helping you in an emergency situation with our EPO-90 Emergency Power Supply Unit.
Don’t forget, always be prepared!

Share our campaign and help others to be prepeared for emergency situation!

Looking for more information? www.swes-epo.com
story_txt:
EPO-90 is a liquid-powered emergency power supply for USB devices that can operate independently of the weather and time of day and provide enough power to handle a potential emergency. If you fill the epo with liquids and connect with your cellphone, you can extend the phone's operating time, you will be able to call for help, you can be found for hours, and you don't have to wait to get help, or not.


The EPO-90 can be used up to 100+ times with the exact instructions in its manual. It is primarily designed for emergency use. All EPO-90 is dry-ionized with minerals, which guarantees safe operation (without any additional ions) for the first 1-2 times. For any further use, natural mineral salts may be required. In the case of operation with natural or ionized liquid, it is not necessary to add any additives, as it has a natural amount of dissolved minerals.
- All types of USB devices can be used for emergency operation and safety charging.- Even in the most extreme conditions, it is fool-proof.- It can be stored for up to 25 years in dry (standby) state, so it is always ready forimmediate operation during this period.


For someone to get into an emergency, you don't have to climb, fly, or go to sea. An unexpected situation can happen anywhere, anytime, anywhere. For example road accidents, situations caused by storms, sea or water accidents, power outages, avalanches, etc. Be prepeared to have a good chance handle such emergency situations!
The mobile phone is already there for everyone, we can use it in an emergency, but if it is discharged we can't get help. We can get lost in the woods, we can't use it as a light source. There are two types of emergency: unexpected and predictable.

The EPO-90 helps you manage the situation. 
Managing an emergency consists of three important elements:1. Ensuring Communication - Independently from the weather conditions EPO helps you to charge instantly your mobile, radio or walkie-talkie in case a low, or empty battery so you can call for help2. Positioning - The power consumption of devices with a large display, or apps with detailed graphics is very high. With our emergency power unit you can charge your GPS, or phone to specify your exact position and help the rescue team to find you.3. Visibility - To use your mobile device’s flashlight for a longer time has a very high power consumption. If you need to make yourself visible, or need to make light in a dark environment you can use EPO to charge your device and extend the working time of your device for hours. With an extension part you are able to make light with your EPO.

The spirit of the EPO-90 is the energy cell based on SWES Technology, which is specially designed for producing energy from ionized liquid and completed with custom control electronics. This is a galvanic system that when immersed in liquid, produces the necessary energy by electro-chemistry.

EPO-90 has been developed to be able to operate (with the exception of acids and alkalis) with any oil and fat-free liquid. All EPO-90 are dry-ionized, guaranteeing immediate operation with any liquid.

The EPO-90 is suitable for direct operation or charging of any device with an A-type USB connector.

For example, for charging mobile phones, tablets or even battery banks, as well as for direct operation and operation of USB lights, E-books, fans, GPS and Walkie-Talkies, smart watches, photo cameras. So it can be used with any electrical device that has a USB power connector.
 

 

If it is used in accordance with the regulations, it can be used up to 100x, otherwise it can work for 25 years, so you can get ready for an emergency, for natural disasters and you should order now, because they are getting cheaper during the campaign. 

We provide standby warranty for EPO-90 is 25 years and 1 year standard guarantee. The standby warranty is valid till the first usage of the product. The guarantee doesn’t cover any freight or shipping charges.Please note that a repair issue will NOT be covered by this warranty if: 
1. The warranty issue is caused by misuse or poor maintenance. Please refer to the instruction booklet for guidance on EPO-90 use and maintenance. 
2. Repairs or modifications are carried out by customer or a third party. 
3. EPO-90 is purchased from an unauthorized retailer, or purchased a pre-owned item.
4. EPO-90 damaged as a result of an accident by customer or a third party.Please note that while the warranty may not be honored, some replacement parts will be available for purchase.
